111.content: Choose a place this will take place...
111.title: Place

1111.content: You are a doctor. However, it's your time off and you are at the local wax museum. It's not much, but it's a break and well needed. As you look around the main hall, you observe two wings, the East wing, and the West wing. Which way will you go?
1111.title: The Wax Museum

choices: Explore the rest of the museum.
11111.content:
âWhy are we visiting a wax museum on the East End of London in 1963, grandfather, when we can take the TARDIS anywhere and when in time we wish to go, and why this particular museum anyway, why not Madame Tussauds instead of this old rundown place?â

âYou have always been so headstrong and impetuous, my dear Susan. You have never been one to savor the moment. I am after all 650 years old. This old body needs a rest once and awhile from all that traveling about and besides, Madame Tussauds is too familiar. I did help her gather together her original models, or have I already told you?â

âMany times, grandfather. Remember, I posed for her as Jeanne dâArc.â

âAh, yes, I keep forgetting, but let us enjoy the ambience of where we are, shall we?â

âOh, grandfather, did you notice something odd about this place? Does it not feel almost like the TARDIS, larger on the inside than it is on the out?â

âNonsense, girl, no one else we know of outside of Gallifrey possesses that type of temporal technology. The chameleon circuit alone on such a craft to allow it to pose as a museum would have to be extremely powerful like that of a Mark IV at the very least.â

âI know ours is just a barely functional type 40.â

âA fact I am painfully aware of, Susan!â

âSorry, grandfather.â

âThough you may be right about one thing, something is amiss about this museum and its exhibits. There are 10 wax figures on display here and the first one looks remarkably like myself, if I may say so.â

âThere is a slight resemblance.â

âHush, now! I know I am flattered, although I am somewhat perplexed.â

âWell, grandfather, your reputation precedes you. Maybe it is on loan from Madame Tussauds.â

âThat may very well be the case, though they likely would have to take it out of storage, and that seventh figure looks vaguely familiar, as well. I keep thinking of the Hand of Omega for some reason ─ oh, oh never mind.â

âSeems like the game is afoot, grandfather.â

âYou do know I gave that phrase to Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, do you not?â

âYes, grandfather, I was there.â

âOh. You were.â
11111.title: The Exhibit of Naxos

1112.content: The Tardis landed in a dusty old house, the howl of the engines came and went and the police box doors opened and from the Tardis came the Doctor, an elderly old man in a black frock coat. Followed by Ian Chesterton, Barbara Wright and...
1112.title: an old house

11121.content:
Susan, a teenage girl and Grand daughter to the Doctor.

“Where are we Doctor?” Ian asked

“I don’t know my boy” he said “But it appears to be earth again.”

Ian walked towards the door an measured it with his hands. The Tardis crew had just come from an adventure where they were all shrunk down to an inch because of a fault with the Tardis doors and Ian wanted to see if they were really back to the correct height.

“It’s very dusty” Barbara said sweeping off some dust from the table.

Who is the giantess in this story?
11121.title: Who's the giantess?

choices: She goes back to the Tardis
She goes back to the house
111211.content:
Susan Foreman wore tight jeans with a black and white stripped polo shirt with the sleeves rolled up.

“Well now” said the Doctor “I think this is close enough to the twentieth century.” The Doctor had been trying for years to get Ian and Barbara back to their home time with little success.

Ian pulled apart the curtains, but the window appeared to be boarded up. Checking all the doors and windows it appeared they were all boarded up.

“This is odd” Ian said now trying the door, it turned and Ian Chesterton stepped out into a street, a very desert like street. All the houses were in a state of disrepair. “Come and look at this Doctor.”

The Doctor went out to look, Barbara hesitated and watched Susan go upstairs to explore before joining Ian and the Doctor.

As Susan went upstairs she had a look in every room and had a quick look around. She took a few steps forward when something crunched underfoot. She took a step back and looked at what she had stepped upon. It looked like a tiny doll, she knelt down and picked up the thing, it felt clammy and almost real. It was a horrible doll that looked like someone dying of hunger.
Susan gasped and dropped the doll to the floor, it was actually a tiny human person
Susan turned and ran down the stairs looking for her grandfather to tell him.

The Doctor, Ian and Barbara were outside in the twin suns, one was brighter than the other and they were both setting. They were outside for no more than a minute when they felt their skin start to feel dry. Then there was pain and all three screamed. The three looked around and saw that everything was starting to get bigger, or appear to get bigger. They were all shrinking!

The three saw Susan framed in the door looking right at them. For some reason she was not shrinking.

“Stay back Susan!” the Doctor shouted as she watched the Doctor, Ian and Barbara shrink until she couldn’t see them anymore.

A shadow moved over the street, Susan could hear a tiny squeal for screaming that stopped once the suns had set.

Susan emerged from the house and walked towards three tiny dolls standing in the middle of the road, three dolls that looked like Ian, Barbara and the Doctor.

“Here we go again” said Ian to the Doctor.

“Oh well, we have an advantage this time” the Doctor said nodding behind Ian “Susan hasn’t been affected.”

Ian turned to see an amazed looking Susan as tall as a 100ft story building walk towards them.

“Grandfather, Ian, Barbara!” she said in horror.

“Susan! You’re normal” Barbara shouted.

“Susan, get back!” Ian shouted “What got us might get you to.”

“Don’t worry Ian” the Doctor said “I think we shrank because of the light from those suns, now that they have set we need not worry about the same happening to Susan.”

“I can’t hear you” said the giantess. Very gently she laid her hands down on the ground for Ian, Barbara and the Doctor to climb on. Susan then stood up and raised her cupped hands up to her chest. Now Susan could hear them.

What happens next?
111211.title: Susan

1112111.content:
Clutching her companions to her chest she went back into the Tardis and into the large interior it contained. Ian grabbed onto a giant black button on Susans shirt to keep his balance as she ran back to the Tardis. The Doctor and Barbara had grabbed folds of her shirt to stay steady, but she was holding them all firmly to her chest so they wouldn’t fall out. She laid her friends on a near chess table once in the Tardis and they all tried to figure out how to get out of this.

Susan had to lean over them to catch what they were all saying. From their point of view the sky was her whole face and the nearest wall was her chest.

“What if we were to take off again?” Ian asked “Maybe it’ll reverse it like last time”

“It could work” the Doctor said “But if the solution is here the Tardis could never bring us back here” the Tardis never worked as the Doctor never knew how to pilot it properly and neither did Susan.

Should they risk taking off and going somewhere else?
1112111.title: She goes back to the Tardis

choices: The TARDIS continues to its destination but something is wrong
The TARDIS is well and truly stuck.
112.content:
The Doctor fiddled with the various controls whimsically as he fondly watched Jamie and Victoria talking about the strange people of slyzer 7. The Doctor chuckled at the thought of there three eyes and jelly like legs. Then returning to reality he turned around still grasping the Tardis controls and said to his companions. "I do believe its time to visit our friend the brigadier again" he shrugged. "We promised we`d drop by, and" he said as if the two needed convincing "it would be nice to see him on purely a plesureble note, since that buisness with the cybermen we havent even said hello, o how dreadful of us".
"Doctor your rambling again" insisted Victoria. "Me, never" he replyed indignatly turning out his pockets with his thumbs. "Doctor, why cant you just go back in time a week after the last time we saw him" asked Jamie. "Well that would be poor show indeed" he replyed and "besides we cant have the old brigadier seeing us too often or he might start to rely on us" he chortled a laugh.
"Theres a reason were going is`nt there" said Jamie stepping towards the Doctor.
"No, no reason" he said clapping his hands and producing a wide heart warming smile. "Shall we go then?" you could tell he appreciated thier nods.
"Then lets" he smiled, pulling the lever. The column rose and the TARDIS stopped.
"What was that?" yelled Jamie. "I, I dont believe it" the Doctor replied. "This shoundnt be happening". "What, what whats wrong?" asked the cry stifling Victoria.
"Well", he said quite simply "Were stuck."
112.title: Were Stuck

122.content: How about Sarah Jane Smith?
122.title: Sarah Jane Smith

1221.content:
Life was really quite funny. One day, everything was as normal as possible. The next, the Doctor had gone from a white haired gentleman into a bohemian brunet. But life was change and Sarah Jane could accept that. Odd day aside, she was ready to get back out into the universe. If only the Doctor could resist making poor Harry Sullivan look like a fool.

"Doctor." Sarah nudged as a warning before she doubled over, clutching at her stomach much to the worry of the two men.

"Sarah?" They both asked, rushing towards her.

"I'm fine. I'm fine." She waved off before she stood upright. Instantly, she noticed something was very wrong, most notably that she was now level with both her friends.

"Oh dear." The Doctor gasped before he turned to Harry. "Have I gotten shorter in my new regeneration? My second body was a bit shorter than normal I grant you but I don't think a physical change should take quite this long-"

"Or do you maybe think that Sarah Jane is growing? The effects that caused K-1 to grow might have had a delayed effect on Sarah's human biology?" Harry asked.

"Yes. That's probably it." The Doctor smiled before he turned to the now 10 foot tall girl, "We should probably get you outside."

"You think?" She asked before ran out of the lab, feeling her clothes starting to rip, rushing past the shocked UNIT agents, emerging outside at 15 feet tall, her clothes shreeded.

"Oh. Well that seemed a bit premature." She noted before she suddenly felt herself shooting up to 20 feet, the remains of her clothes falling all around her.

"You know Harry," The Doctor said in a far too casual tone as Sarah continued to grow "I owe you an apology. It appears you were quite on the mark about Sarah's growth." The medical doctor didn't answer, too focused on the now 40 foot Sarah's breasts. "Harry?" The Doctor asked, snapping his fingers, "I'm giving you a rare compliment. You should take it."

"Doctor what is the meaning of-" The perpetually irate voice of Brigadier Lethbridge Stewart began before he trailed off, noticing the 50 foot tall and naked Sarah Jane Smith who smiled awkwardly as she tried to cover up her breasts.

"Well it's quite clear that Sarah Jane is now ten times taller than she normally is." The Doctor casually remarked. The Brigadier rubbed his temples as he tried to fight off a migraine. "I'm going to leave you to this and quarantine the area." He muttered as he went back inside.

Sarah rolled her eyes as she knelt down, one arm still trying to hide her breasts from Harry. "So any ideas?" She asked.

"None." The Doctor instantly replied, shaking his head. "It will take some time in the lab." Without missing a beat, he smacked Harry upside the head, shaking him out of his lusty trance. "Come along Harry. Back to the lab."

"What am I supposed to do!?" Sarah snapped, shooting back up to her full height before covering up her breasts when Harry's eyes returned to them.

"Just wait here." The Doctor waved off before dragging Harry back into the building.

"Well isn't that just wonderful." Sarah deadpanned. "Just wait here. Wait here while you've inexplicably been turned 50 feet tall. Your naked body exposed to every pervert in the base." She grumbled as she began walking off, unknowingly exposing her tank sized pale ass to the base and all the cameras inside.

Lost in thought, Sarah wasn't paying any attention to her surroundings and didn't notice herself falling into a pond until it was too late, the water not even reaching up to her belly button. "Well how could this get any more embarrassing?"

Her request was answered as she let loose a small, to her, fart and every dweller of the lake suddenly emerged dead on the surface. "I had to ask." She muttered.

What happens next?

1) Sarah is kidnapped by Rose Tyler who was trying to shrink the Doctor's most important companions out of jealousy. As the dumb blonde tries to figure out how to salvage her evil plan, Sarah is dumped in a cell with an equally large and naked Clara Oswald.

2) Sarah was supersized by the Time Lords who intend for her to be the Doctor's weapon on his mission to avert the Daleks' creation.

3) Something in the water causes Sarah to get even bigger.
1221.title: Sarah Jane Smith

1511.content:
Rose Tyler, traveler to the end of the world. Rose Tyler, who was the daughter of the woman who had personally bitch-slapped the Oncoming Storm. Rose Tyler had seen many strange worlds with her journeys with the Doctor. The two were very closer...almost like a couple even. But they weren't a couple. Far from it. And yet, there was an attraction. The Doctor simply wasn't interested in Rose that way, but Rose was only human. After Rose had 'saved' her dad from being killed, the Doctor was furious with her. However, when it was all over, the two grew closer.
Right now, The Doctor was showing other worlds to Rose that was light-years away from Earth. The Doctor admitted that his favorite planet was Earth, but there were a lot more interesting planets out there. Rose was enjoying her travels with the Doctor.
"Where are we going next?" asked Rose after the pair had visited a planet where the trees could move and talk.
"Dunno, really" said the Doctor. "let's go where ever the solar wind takes us"
He fiddled about with the console of the TARDIS, and they were gone from the planet they had been on. About a minute after, the TARDIS jerked around wildly.
"What's happening?" asked Rose, holdig onto the console and trying not to fall down.
"Something yanked the TARDIS out of..." the Doctor's voice fell as he examined the read-out on the console.
"What can yank the TARDIS around like that?!" asked Rose. The jerking stopped then, as quickly as it begin.
"Very few things" said the Doctor. "we're landing to find out what"


A blue police box materialised on a big grassy plain. The police box opened and the Doctor and Rose came out.
"What planet is this?" asked Rose. "looks like the Earth"
"It IS the Earth" said the Doctor, and he didn't sound happy about it. "around the year 340,000 A.D."
"How can you tell this is Earth?" asked Rose.
The Doctor gave Rose his trademark grin. "I recongize this gravity"
"How can you recongize gravity?" asked Rose.
The Doctor was about to answer, when a giant foot came down next to the TARDIS. It was an unclothed foot, and was about the same size as the TARDIS. The Doctor and Rose looked up to see the foot belongs to a woman in a fur bikini. The woman had red hair and big green eyes.
"Um.." said the Rose. "I think we're in trouble"
1511.title: Planet of the Giant Women

choices: The Doctor heads to the distant city to look for a solution
The Doctor takes to the TARDIS to look for somewhere else
15111.content:
The giant woman leant down, and eyed Rose with suspicion.

"Don't move" the Doctor whispered, fearing the worst.

The woman straightened up, grunted something and pulled out a strange looking device from a fur pouch. The Doctor and Rose had never seen anything like it.

Without any warning, the device emitted a bright green flash, striking Rose directly. The Doctor ran over to her, worried something awful had happened, but after a close inspection, she seemed to be fine. Roseclimbed back on her feet. The giant woman was nowhere to be seen.

Rose looked around, feeling slightly uncomfortable. Suddenly she winced in pain, realising something was desperately wrong. In a mater of seconds she was taller than the Doctor, her clothes growing tight. Eventually she burst out of her jeans and her top followed suit shortly. She covered herself, looking around for any nearby cover. She eventually spied a fur bikini, similar to that of the other giant woman. Both the Doctor and Rose realised that it wouldn't have been there for anyother reason than if she planned to grow her.

The Doctor shouted up "We're in a bit of a predicament. I don't have the tech to sort you out at the moment. I'm so, so sorry. I promise I WILL be back!"

Rose could feel the vibration of the giant footstep in her bones. Suddenly she was grabbed by the Doctor, who pulled them both into the relative safety of the TARDIS' doorway. They stared up a pale well muscled leg like a tree to an imperious face tilted upward to the distant horizon. The foot rose showering them with dust and pebbles and the titanic savage lumbered away, oblivious to the tiny travelers in their tiny box.

"EARTH?!" gasped Rose, "EARTH?!"

The Doctor hastily removed his hands from Rose's person and spoke.

152111112.content:
Just as the Doctor reached the top of the roof he spied a flash of something which made him duck behind the nearest avialiable cover. Hovering on the roof were three Daleks, one of a Black design.

"RE-PORT." The Dalek Supreme twirled its eyestalk at its two company of Daleks.

"THE TIME TRA-VEL-LER KNOWN AS ROSE TY-LER HAS BEEN SUC-CESS-FUL-LY EN-LARGED." One of the Daleks spoke in its typical monotone voice, devoid of all emotion save hate. "WITH THIS EX-PER-I-MENT THE DA-LEKS HAVE THE RE-QUIR-ED TECH-NOL-OGY TO EN-LARGE SOME OF OUR OWN. WHEN THE IN-VAS-ION FLEET IS REA-DY, THE CHOS-SEN DALEKS WILL BE EN-LARGED TO OP-TI-UM SIZE AND EX-TER-MIN-ATE ALL EN-EM-IES."

"EX-CELL-ENT!" The Dalek Supreme barked in some form of triumph. "THE DA-LEKS WILL AT LAST CON-QUER EARTH AND ITS SO-LAR SYST-EM! VICT-ORY FOR THE DA-LEKS!"

The Doctor listened in horror at the very idea that Rose had been some sort of test by the Daleks to see if enlarging a subject would work. With Daleks the size of skyscrapers on the planet, a troop of fifty Daleks could destroy all life on Earth in a very short space of time. Plus, the fact that Rose had been identified as a time-traveller meant the Daleks knew the Doctor was here...

"HALT!" The Doctor hadn't spotted the forth Dalek in time, hovering in the air above him, its energy weapon aimed straight at his head. "I-DENT-IFY YOUR-SELF!" Before the Doctor could even start to reply it seemed to know.

"YOU ARE THE DOC-TOR! YOU MUST BE EX-TER-MIN-ATED!"

The Doctor had recently saved a planet from the wrath of the Yonkons. The planet was full of scientists. "Right thank you very much but I have to get going now."

After about two hours of reading he heard a faint voice shouted Daddy. he put a bookmark in his book and started to look around the TARDIS to see if he could find anyone. Then when he got to the table where he had left the glass dish there was a woman sitting in it. She looked human. She had chest length brown hair, brown eyes. "Thank you Daddy." She runs into the wardrobe. About an hour later she came back out. She was wearing a red t-shirt and red mini-skirt and pink flip flops. She had painted her toe nails red She also wore a few rings and a necklace. "Does this look alright Daddy?"
"Yeah they look great."

1522212111212111211121112111.title: Too dangerous

15222121112121112111211121112.content:
“Please Daddy I can take care of myself,” said Lisa.
“If you were bigger I’d believe that,” replied the Doctor. “But right now you’re still way too small to protect yourself.”
“Please Daddy.”
She then held onto his arm. The Doctor tried to take her off but she wouldn’t budge. He was surprised at this. He continued to try and get her off with all his strength. But it wasn’t doing anything.
“Lisa let go of my arm,” said the Doctor.
“Don’t leave me Daddy please?” replied Lisa.
“Ok you can come with me.”
“Really?”
“Yes as long as you stay out of trouble.”
“Ok Daddy.” She then let go of her grip on him and she was happy again. She smiled at him. “Thank you.”
“Try to stay safe.”
“Ok.”
15222121112121112111211121112.title: Lisa stays

152221211121211121112111211121.content:
But then Lisa felt something grab her. She couldn’t see what it was and neither could the Doctor. It seemed like it was an invisible hand. But it soon began to take Lisa away from the Doctor.
“Daddy!” she shouted.
“Lisa,” replied the Doctor.
He began to run after her but she was being taken too quickly. In a matter of seconds she was gone and the Doctor stopped running. He could still hear her but then everything went silent.
“Don’t worry Lisa!”
But now things for the Doctor had gotten a lot more urgent. He was worried about her and he tried to think of a way to find her. But he still wasn’t sure what had just taken her. He didn’t think it was natural.
“My Kingdom for Lisa,” he said to himself.
“I can help you,” replied a Voice.
The Doctor then looked and saw a man up a tree. The Doctor was amazed to see him up there of all places.
“Err Hello.”

Who is he?
152221211121211121112111211121.title: Taken away

1522212111212111211121112111212.content:
The Doctor wasn’t sure what to do now. He had lost Lisa and he had to rescue her as soon as he could. But he knew that this wouldn’t be an easy task. She could literally be anywhere around him.
“Come on think,” he said to himself.
But meanwhile Lisa was been taken away. She was struggling and she was using all of her strength to break free. Her tiny body was a little stronger then it looked. She seemed to be breaking free.
But then a gas hit her in the face and it knocked her out cold. She was now extremely helpless against her captives.
However the Doctor had thought up of something to get Lisa back. He got his sonic Screwdriver out of his pocket and he put it towards the ground. Then like stage lights he began to see a trail on the ground. He had struck lucky.
“Bingo,” he said.
He then began to follow the trail as best as he could. But he seemed to be going around in circles. But eventually he got to what seemed to be a cave. He carefully went inside to see if he could find anything.
“Daddy!” cried a voice.
1522212111212111211121112111212.title: A random person

15222121112121112111211121112121.content:
“You shouldn’t go there,” said the same voice.
The Doctor looked around but he couldn’t see anyone. Last time he thought that it had simple been in his head. But now he realised that he wasn’t imagining it. He frantically looked around.
“Who said that?” he asked.
“I did,” replied the Voice.
“Show yourself.”
“As you wish.”
Just then a white figure appeared before the Doctor. It caught him a little by surprise but he was able to keep himself to himself. But he was curious to see what he was seeing. He didn’t recognise it.
“Who are you?” asked the Doctor.
“I have no name,” replied the Figure. “Who are you?”
“I’m the Doctor.”
“Doctor Who?”
“Just the Doctor. But what are you?”
“I am nothing.”

Will anything happen?
15222121112121112111211121112121.title: I am nothing

152221211121211121112111211121212.content:
“You can’t be nothing,” said the Doctor.
“But I am,” replied Nothing.
“But everything is something.”
“I am not a something. I am a nothing.”
“Ok then what does that make me?”
“A time lord.”
“What but how?” The Doctor was truly amazed by this.
“I can sense two heart beats on you. There is only one creature who ahs two hearts and that is humanoid is a Time Lord. But aren’t they suppose to be Extinct?” he was very curious about this.
“I’m the last one of my kind.”
“Shame. But now I can help you.”
“Why would you help me?”
“Because I know you’re worried about your companion. She seems to be in a lot of distress right now.”
“Do you know where she is?”
“No but I can find out.”
152221211121211121112111211121212.title: Help

1522212111212111211121112111212121.content:
Nothing stood there for a moment. The Doctor wasn’t sure what was happening. Nothing glowed for a moment and the Doctor took a step back in case it was anything dangerous.
But seconds later the glowing stopped and Nothing looked towards the Doctor. He wasn’t sure what was about to happen.
“Your Companion is safe for now,” said Nothing.
“Where is she?” replied the Doctor.
“She is currently two miles south.”
“Two miles but its only been a few minutes.”
“Whatever took her is extremely fast. I don’t think anything could take her that quickly. Maybe we should be cautious.”
“I know that but I need her back. I’m all she has in the world.”
“Do not fear your companion will be back in due time. But for now we should go to where she is.”
“How do we get there?”
“Take my hand.”
“Why?”
1522212111212111211121112111212121.title: She is in no danger for now

15222121112121112111211121112121211.content:
“All will be answered,” said Nothing.
The Doctor reluctantly held the hand of Nothing and then he saw a white light. But before he knew it the white light was gone. He could see that they were in a cave and right in front of him he could see Lisa. She jumped with joy at the sight of him and she held out her arms.
“Daddy!” shouted Lisa.
“Lisa,” replied the Doctor.
He then picked her up and gave her a hug. She began to cry a little and he tried to comfort her a little.
“Don’t worry Lisa I’m here for you,” said the Doctor.
“I thought I’d never see you again,” replied Lisa.
“I’m here now.”
“But we have to get out of here.”
“What’s wrong?”
Just then they heard a roaring sound. Lisa began to become very panicky and she grabbed onto the Doctor for dear life. He was getting a little scared himself. But he couldn’t let that bother him.
15222121112121112111211121112121211.title: Together again

152221211121211121112111211121212111.content:
“I want to go Daddy,” said Lisa.
“We will,” replied the Doctor. “But there’s something I need to do first.”
“What’s that?”
“Whatever this thing is we need to stop it here and now.”
“Can’t we just hope it goes away?”
“I wish I could.”
The Doctor made sure Lisa was safe. He then went running down the corridor and Nothing followed him. But he wasn’t afraid at all. In fact he wasn’t feeling any emotions whatsoever.
“Daddy that guy scares me,” said Lisa.
“He’s a friend,” replied the Doctor. “He’s here to help.”
“Ok Daddy.”
“He won’t hurt you.”
“It is close,” said Nothing.
“Where is it?”
“Just ahead.”
“Good.”

What is it?
152221211121211121112111211121212111.title: Scared

152221212.content:
After another couple of hours reading the Doctor had another disturbance. This time the T.A.R.D.I.S started to shake violently. The books began to fall off the shelves. The Doctor put down his book and ran to the controls. he tried to get the T.A.R.D.I.S back to normal but it was no use.
Meanwhile in her room Lisa was woken up by the shaking. She quickly got out of bed. She saw that everything seemed the same size. But when she left the mind room she found that everything in the T.A.R.D.I.S seemed smaller. She then found out she had grown to 4 1/2 inches tall. She quickly ran to the Doctor.
"Daddy what's happening?" she asked.
"The T.A.R.D.I.S is out of control," replied the Doctor.
"Is that bad?"
"Depends on where it's gonna drop us off."
"Where is it gonna drop us off?"
"I don't know yet."
Then suddenly the T.A.R.D.I.S stopped shaking.
"It looks like we've landed," said the Doctor. He then picks up Lisa. "It looks like you've grown again."
"Yes Daddy. Soon I'll be as big as you."
"Ok now to see where we are."
The Doctor carries Lisa to the T.A.R.D.I.S doors.He then opens them.

But where are they?
152221212.title: Drop off

1522212121.content:
"Hmmm, London," Said the Doctor.
"Whats a London daddy," Asked Lisa.
"It's a city on a Planet called Earth," The Doctor replied.
"Oh, Why are we here then," Lisa asked.
"The Tardis picked up a disturbance round about that way," The Doctor answered. Then He and Lisa walked around looking for the disturbance while telling Lisa some of the adventures he had had Rose and his other companions.
"AAh, accordind to the Tardis the Disturbance should be just about here," The Doctor said. The Building they were outside was old and and Derelict. "Right, Lets go in then. As soon as he went in he heard something.
1522212121.title: London

15222121212.content:
"Cmon ,Cmon," Yelled the voice.
"Wait, that voice I recognise it, it's a Yonkon," Said the doctor with a confused expresion on his face." Whats a Yonkon doing here," the Doctor asked. He walked around the corner and indeed it was a yonkon. He was standing next to a strange machine. On the side were letters in a strange language, fgkfbtsdibfdgtakfgbazb, the Tardis translated it into Time Teleporter 1000.
"Excuse me but what are you doing here Mr," said Lisa. "My machine broke down, and I got stuck here and if you wouldn't mind Doctor could you tell me where here is,"
"You know me, " asked the doctor.
"Well I should, you did save our planet from the Vagarii," said the Yonkon.
"Well yes i suppose ,oh, and the answer to your first question to London, Earth, 2006 but about the year 45678 to you," Answered the Doctor. "how did you get here,"
15222121212.title: Yonkon?

152221212121.content:
"I was on my way to the Hart Nebular," said the Yonkon. "But I ran into trouble and crash landed on this planet. Now I have a question for you Doctor. Who is that little woman on your shoulder?"
"Oh her?" replied the Doctor. He takes Lisa off his shoulder and shows her to the Yonkon. "This is my new companion Lisa. Say hello Lisa."
"Hi," said Lisa. Then she grew an extra few inches.
"Wow she grew," said the Yonkon.
"I know she has a growth spurt every few hours," said the Doctor. Then he puts her back on his shoulder. "Soon she'll be as big as me."
"That'll be very soon Daddy," replied Lisa.
"So Yonkon tell me have you noticed anything weird around here?"
"Not of such," replied the Yonkon.
"Strange the T.A.R.D.I.S bought us here due to a disturbance. It's never been wrong before."

Is this Yonkon a good guy?
152221212121.title: The Doctor and the Yonkon

1522212121212.content:
Deep down the Yonkon was bad news. He had known about Lisa and what was happening to her. He wanted to use her as a living weapon. But getting her from the Doctor would be the difficult part. She had absolute loyalty to him.
"So Doctor may I see your T.A.R.D.I.S?" asked the Yonkon.
"What for?" replied the Doctor.
"I was just wondering how you got everything to work in there."
"Alright."
The Doctor takes the Yonkon to the T.A.R.D.I.S. When they get there the Yonkon looks around it. The Doctor kept his eye on him. Lisa still sat on his shoulder. She couldn't wait until she was larger.
"Daddy this Yonkon's scaring me," said Lisa.
"I don't trust him either," replied the Doctor. "There's something he wants. But what?"
1522212121212.title: The Yonkon wants Lisa

15222121212121.content:
Then Lisa grew another couple of inches. She was now 8 inches tall. The Yonkon carefully watched her. He saw that the Doctor and Lisa were practically inseparable. He had to find a way to split them apart. He had one thing on his side though. Yonkons could see in the dark.
He wondered off. he told the Doctor that he was having a quick look around. Eventually he finds some kind of fuse box. He switches it off and all the lights go off. Lisa began to panic, she had a bad feeling about this.
The Doctor tried looking for the fuse box. he also talked to Lisa but he got no response. He feared that she had fallen off.
He found the fuse box and switched it back on. He saw that Lisa was no longer on his shoulder as he feared. He retraced his steps to see if she had fallen off but there was nothing. Then he realised the Yonkon had also disappeared.

Who will save Lisa?
15222121212121.title: Fuse box

choices: beats the Yonkon within an inch of his life
152221212121211.content:
The Yonkon took Lisa into a derelict building. She was trying to escape the Yonkon's grip. But she too small.
"Let me go," said Lisa. "When my Daddy finds you he'll..."
"He'll what?" interrupted the Yonkon. "You're precious Daddy can not hurt me."
"I swear when I grow big you'll be a red stain at the bottom of my flip-flop."
"Oh that'll be the day. Well since you can't stop I may as well tell you what I'm going to do with you. You see I have created a mind control device that'll make me able to control everything you do. I'm gonna make you destroy everything on Earth so the Yonkons can take over."
"No you won't my Daddy will stop you."
"He won't. Because I'm gonna make you crush him like a bug."
This hit a nerve in Lisa. Her body became to vibrate violently. "No one threatens my Daddy." The Yonkon dropped her as she began to grow. But this spurt was bigger than the others. The Yonkon dropped her but she became to big to be hurt by the fall. he watched her grow taller and taller and taller. Soon she was more than 9 feet tall.

What does she do now?
152221212121211.title: The master plan revealed

1522212121212112.content:
The Yonkon was really scared. But before he could react to Lisa's change in size she had already punched him in the face. Before he hit the ground Lisa kicked him with her over sized foot.
"You will never hurt my Daddy," she said.
"Please have mercy," begged the Yonkon.
"Would you have shown my Daddy any mercy?" She kicks him. "Would you have shown this planet any mercy?" She kicks him in the face. "Would you have shown me any mercy?"
The Yonkon was badly beaten. One more of Lisa's powerful kicks would kill him. She went to give the final blow.
"No Lisa wait," said a Voice.
She turns around and sees the Doctor standing right behind her. She then picked him up and hugged him. "Oh Daddy. I'm so glad you're alright."
"Err I won't be if you squeeze me any harder."
"Oh sorry." She loosens her grip but she still hugs him.
"Now you can put me down." Lisa does so but now she I really happy.

What do they do with the Yonkon?
1522212121212112.title: Attack of the 9 foot Lisa

15222121212121122.content:
"What do we do with the Yonkon Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Leave him," replied the Doctor. "If i know a Yonkon they can't tolorate failure. They'll leave him here."
"Ok Daddy." The two of them start walking back to the T.A.R.D.I.S. The Yonkon isn't too happy but he can barely move.
"Come back," he cried. "I swear I'll kill you both even if take my life I'll see you dead!"
The Doctor and Lisa didn't really take any notice of the Yonkon's threat. Instead they just carried on and didn't have a care for him.
It doesn't take them long to get back to the T.A.R.D.I.S. Lisa now had to bend down to get through the doors. She didn't mind, all she cared about was the Doctor being safe. But she was a little unsure about something.
"Daddy why did I just suddenly grow like that?"
"Well my guess is that you slowly grow naturally. But when you're angry it is dramatically increased. If you hadn't of grown then, well we probably wouldn't have won that little battle."
"Thank you Daddy."
15222121212121122.title: I'll see you dead

152221212121211221.content:
"Now lets get going," said the Doctor.
"Where are we going Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Where ever she takes us."
He then goes over to the controls and activates them. The T.A.R.D.I.S then begins to move through time and space. No one knows where it'll go next. But the Doctor and Lisa needed to do something to keep themselves occupied while they waited for the T.A.R.D.I.S to stop somewhere.
"So can you cook?" asked the Doctor.
"I think so Daddy," replied Lisa. "But there doesn't seem to be a kitchen round here."
"You thought this T.A.R.D.I.S didn't have a kitchen. It has everything in here, bedrooms, Computer room even a comic room."
"Where is the Kitchen?"
"I'll show you."
The Doctor takes Lisa to the Kitchen. Unfortunately for her it had a low ceiling so she banged her head. She was almost in tears through the pain. But she was able to bottle it up.

What will she make?
152221212121211221.title: The T.A.R.D.I.S has a kitchen

1522212121212112212.content:
"Here we have the kitchen," said the Doctor. "You have every food and ingredient imaginable and everything you need to cook them."
Lisa's face lit up. She could see the endless possibilities that she could do. "Err Daddy if you don't mind can you leave me in here alone I want to cook something as a surprise."
"Sure. And don't worry about fires here it's put out before it's even started."
The Doctor then leaves the kitchen. Lisa looks in the cupboards and finds all the ingredients she wants. She turns on the oven first and gets a grease pan. Then she makes some dough and cuts them out to the shape of gingerbread men. he makes one of them bigger than the others.
When the oven came to temperature she put the gingerbread men in and waited for them to bake. When they were done. She took them out and they were a nice golden brown.
She then decorated the gingerbread men,. They all looked the same but two were different. She made one of them look like the Doctor. The other one that was larger than the others she designed to look like her.
Now it was time to give them to the Doctor.
1522212121212112212.title: To make a gingerbread man

15222121212121122121.content:
The Doctor was sitting in his chair reading a book by Roald Dahl. He then noticed his very tall companion standing by him. She had a tray of gingerbread men in her hands.
"Do you want a gingerbread man Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Yeah sure," replied the Doctor. Lisa lowers the tray and he takes one. He takes a bite out of it. It tasted delicious, he didn't know how good she was. "These are lovely."
"Thank you Daddy."
"Have you tried one?"
"Not yet."
"Go on have one." She tried one and she thought the same as the Doctor. "Wow I didn't know i was this good."
They eat almost all the gingerbread men. the only two that were left was the one of her and the Doctor.
"I couldn't eat another one," said the Doctor.
"But these two are special." The Doctor takes a look and sees the Gingerbread men of him and Lisa.
"Hey it's us."
"A shame we can't keep them forever."
"Oh but we can." He then stands up. "Follow me Lisa."

Where do they go?
15222121212121122121.title: Nice Gingerbread men

152221212121211221211.content:
The Doctor took Lisa to a strange room. Unfortunately for her it had an 8 foot ceiling. She had to bend down a little. But in the centre of the room she saw a large white beam of light.
"What's that Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"It's a stasis field," replied the Doctor. "Just put the gingerbread men in it."
"Ok." She walks over to it and puts the gingerbread men in it. She watched them float in the field. "Wow daddy."
"It'll preserve those gingerbread men forever now. So when ever you want to look at them or even eat them if you want just come in here."
"I'll remember that."

What happens next?
152221212121211221211.title: Stasis

1522212121212112212111.content:
Then the Doctor and Lisa felt the T.A.R.D.I.S shake a little.
"What was that Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"We've landed," replied the Doctor.
"Where?"
"Let's find out."
The Doctor and Lisa go to the T.A.R.D.I.S doors and open them. they then walk out and they seem to be on Earth.
"Where are we Daddy?"
"Well from the look of the atmosphere we're in the West Midlands of England. And judging from the smell I would say it’s the 16th of August 2010."
"What is there here?"
"Well you have Stoke to the North, Birmingham to the South, Wolverhampton to the west and Leicister to the east. Nice place this is where the industrial revolution started."
"The what?"
"You'll find out later Lisa. Anyway let's have a look around. We'll see if there's anything interesting happening around here."
1522212121212112212111.title: West Midlands

15222121212121122121111.content:
The Doctor and Lisa were in a small town. She loved seeing all the buildings. They were all new to her since she had never been to Earth before. But what she did notice was that everyone stared at her when she walked past them. This made her feel uncomfortable.
"Daddy why are all these people looking at me?" asked Lisa.
"Well Lisa," replied the Doctor. "You're 9 feet tall."
"So?"
"At his time in history the average man is 5'10 and the average woman is 5'6. So you're 3 foot 2 inches taller than an average man."
"It's their fault they shouldn't be so short."
"Now calm down. Let's go and get something to eat. That may calm you down a little."
"Ok Daddy."
The Doctor and Lisa find a quiet cafe in a back street. There wasn't many people inside and the food was cheap. Unfortunately the table and chairs were too small for Lisa but they had to make do. The Doctor ordered their meals and he sat down and waited.

Will they get the meal right?
15222121212121122121111.title: They shouldn't be so short

152221212121211221211112.content:
The Doctor and Lisa waited for 15 minutes for their meals to come. But when they did it wasn't what they had ordered. It was some slimey tentacles. The Doctor looked at the waitress who had just bought their meals.
"Err waitress this isn't what we ordered," said the Doctor.
"I afraid it is," replied the Waitress.
"No it isn't," snapped Lisa. "I wanted apple pie."
"That is apple pie." The waitress then walks away.
The Doctor and Lisa just looked at the food. Their faces began to turn green.
"For some reason I don't think I'll be eating any of that," said the Doctor.
"I feel sick Daddy," replied Lisa.
"Come on Lisa we're leaving."
They both stood up and left the cafe. When they looked at other cafes it was all the same thing. And there were some even grosser meals.
"What's happening here Daddy?"
"I don't know but I plan to find out."
152221212121211221211112.title: Gross food

1522212121212112212111121.content:
"Where do we start Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Well that I'm not sure of. Maybe we should try and get jobs in a kitchen."
"Why would we do that?"
"Then we can see what's going on behind the scenes. Anyway we're great cooks we should be fine."
The Doctor and Lisa searched the town for anywhere that needed new chefs. After half an hour they find a small restaurant that needed them. The Doctor used his psychic paper to say that they were highly qualified chefs.
What was strange was that they started straight away. They didn't even say anything about their clothes.
When they got into the kitchen they could see all the different foods that were being made. They were all barely eatable. Lisa threw up all over the floor but no one seemed to notice. In fact someone got some of it and put it on some food.

What's going on?
1522212121212112212111121.title: Chefs

15222121212121122121111211.content:
The Doctor and Lisa spent several hours in the kitchens. They both tried to prepare th food the best way they could but Lisa couldn't stand the sight of it. She walked back a few steps and she accidentally elbowed someone in the face. The collision resulted in the man's face falling off. His natural face looked alien. He had two small eyes for every one human eye. It didn't have a nose and it had sharp teeth. It had green skin. Lisa just stared.
"What's wrong with you?" he asked. "Have you never seen Klooco before?" He bends down and picks up his human face and puts it. "And next time watch where you're going you giant clumsy fool." He then walks away.
Lisa just stood there in sheer disbelief. "Daddy what was that?" she asked.
"That was a Klooco."
"What is a Klooco?"
"I don't know I've never encountered them before."
"What are we gonna do Daddy? I can't stand being here any longer."
"Don't worry we won't be here much longer."
15222121212121122121111211.title: Klooco

152221212121211221211112111.content:
The Doctor and Lisa went back to the T.A.R.D.I.S. When they got there the Doctor went to a special computer.
"What's this Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"This baby has information about every species in the entire universe. Right from the Humans to the Daleks."
"What's a Dalek?"
"Believe me you don't want to know." Then he starts typing away. "Now let's see. Here we go Klooco. It says that they're a humble race. But they have a sinister habit. They remove the primary species of a planet and put them in a special cell block in another world. Then they imitate the species on their home world. When they get bored of the planet they blow it up and search for their next victim."
"Oh my."
"Well Lisa it looks like the planet's in trouble as usual."
"What do we do Daddy?"
"We'll have to find the real humans. That shouldn't be too hard for the T.A.R.D.I.S." Then he goes to the controls. "Now hold on tight."

Will they find the real humans?
152221212121211221211112111.title: To destroy planet Earth

1522212121212112212111121111.content:
A few minutes later the T.A.R.D.I.S lands on what seemed to be a prison block. When the Doctor and Lisa left the T.A.R.D.I.S they were surprised to find no guards. This was strange but the Klooco might have thought this place was so secure that they didn't need guards.
There were several different cells. When they had a look inside they didn't anything. But when the Doctor got his super magnifying glass he could see a microscopic alien species. There were billions of them.
He went to another cell and did the same. But this time he found microscopic humans.
"Oh God," said the Doctor.
"What is it Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"All these cells are full with alien species and humans. The Klooco must shrink them so the can all fit in one cell per species."
"So what do we do?"
"We can release them all at once. There would be too many of them."
1522212121212112212111121111.title: Microscopic people in cells

15222121212121122121111211111.content:
"We could teleport them away," said the Doctor. "But I can only teleport them to one spot."
"So what do we do?" asked Lisa.
"We need to find out how the Klooco did it. If we do that then maybe we could find a way to reverse the process."
"And that would put the people back and at full size?"
"Theoretically yes."
"How do we do that Daddy?"
"I'm not sure yet. It's best we look around the complex and see if there's anything we can find."
"Ok Daddy. But what if we bump into one of those Kloocos?"
"We just say that we're in disguise."
The Doctor and Lisa then begin to look around the complex. The Doctor told Lisa that they should split up. Lisa reluctantly agreed but she hated being away from him.

What do they find?
15222121212121122121111211111.title: Next plan of action

152221212121211221211112111111.content:
Lisa looked in the places where the Doctor had told her. A first she didn't find anything. But she got to a type of control room. She find man controls that seemed very interesting. She had no idea what they meant so she called for the Doctor. he came running to her.
"What is it?" asked the Doctor.
"I found these controls Daddy," replied Lisa.
He takes a look at them. "This is brilliant."
"What is Daddy?"
"This stuff is so high tech I'm impressed. They use this stuff to keep their prisoners alive. It gives them the gases, food, water and other them alive. But some of these other controls takes them back to where they came from."
"So you can take them back."
"I'm not sure. It may take me a while to figure everything out."
Just then about five heavily armed Klooco barge into the room.

What do the Doctor and Lisa do?
152221212121211221211112111111.title: Controls

choices: Lisa has had another growth spurt
1522212121212112212111121111112.content:
The Kloocoes had advanced weapons. Even Lisa with her enhanced size, strength and durability would be killed instantly by them.
The Doctor held his hands up and Lisa did the same. Then two Kloocoes go behind them and cuff them. One had a problem with Lisa. Her arms were too big so they had to get some extra large cuffs.
"Take them to separate cells," said A Klooco. "And make sure they're locked tight."

he then went to Lisa's cell. He gets it open.

The Doctor got out of the cell and he saw Lisa begin to stand up. She was knocking the walls to make room. She literally exploded out of the cell. She accidentally destroy another cell in the process.
The cell were one level and then there was a 50 foot ceiling. Lisa looked down at the Doctor and smiled.
"Why didn't you do that in the first place?" asked The Doctor.

She bends down and picks up the Doctor. She then gives him an unbreakable hug. He didn't try to break free. He also how much Lisa was enjoying so he just waited until she had finished.
The hug last 10 minutes but she put him back on the ground. She still had a huge smile on her face.

Will she find the Doctor?

The Doctor was reading his book for half an hour. He was thinking that Lisa had stopped looking for him. He hadn't heard her for a while so he kept reading.
Then he felt two huge hands around his waist and he was picked up. Before he knew it he was face to ace with Lisa's huge face.
"I found you Daddy," said Lisa. She had an innocent smile. The Doctor couldn't help but laugh.
"Good girl you found me," laughed the Doctor. "I'd thought you'd given up."

The Doctor could tell that Lisa loved him. Not in a husband wife love but a father and daughter love. Also by now he knew that while hugging Lisa don't resist because it gets you nowhere.
A minute later Lisa stopped hugging him and put him back in his seat. Then she stepped in front of him and sat down.

An hour later he finished telling the stories. Lisa had a huge smile on her face.
"That was amazing Daddy," said Lisa. "I don't even know what an elephant is but I still thought it was good."

The Doctor and Lisa saw that they were on the Grasslands of Africa. It was the dry season. Lisa could hear all the noises of the place and she also saw some monkeys in a tree.
"Look Daddy," said Lisa. "Little people."
"No they're monkeys," replied the Doctor. "And from the looks of them they're Chimpanzees."
A chimp walked up to them. Then it climbed up Lisa's long legs and into her arms. She could resist hugging it.
"Daddy it's so cute. Can we keep it?"
"I'm not to sure about that. He can stay with you until he wants to go. But for now let's look at the hippos."
The Doctor takes Lisa to a lake where they could see some hippos enjoying themselves in the warm sun. Lisa wanted to go in and join them. But the Doctor forbid it. He knew how dangerous they were when they were scared.
The hippos weren't the only animals at the lake. There was a lioness having a drink. They saw fish swimming in the water. Even a rare bird landed on Lisa's shoulder
152221212121211221211112111111211112111.title: We're here

The Doctor than began to run towards where the sound came from. Lisa only had to walk to keep up with him. The sound subsided just when they got close to it.
When they got to there they found nothing. Lisa was even more confused then before. the Doctor was a little puzzled himself.

Will they hear the noise again?

The Doctor and Lisa quickly make their way to where the sound came from. This time they saw something there. But then it disappeared. the chimp climbed out of Lisa's arm and onto her shoulder.

Will they find the Alien?

“Well last time he was in 2007 and then he was back here. Meaning…”

“Very good Lisa. When we get the T.A.R.D.I.S back you can have all the chocolate you can eat.”
“What’s chocolate?”
“You’ll find out soon enough. But for now just take us to where the Master was.”
“Ok Daddy.”

Will they find the Time travelling device?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: How the master got there

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa then made her way back to the sea. When she got there she dived in and she started to swim. She put the Doctor in her mouth where there was some oxygen. And it also protected him from the pressure.
Eventually she got to the base where the Master had been and she put the Doctor in there. He then put her in the dome and she looked at him.
“We’re here Daddy,” she said.
“Yes and now to find how the Master got here,” replied the Doctor.
He began to walk out the corridor and he hoped to find what the Master had used. He kept an eye out for what ever it was. He didn’t know whether it was a big machine or merely a wrist device.
Eventually he comes across what seems to be a wrist device. He took a look at it and he saw that it was in fact able to time travel. But its batteries were flat.
“What do we do now Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“Well my Sonic Screwdriver should be able to power it up,” replied the Doctor.
“It can do that?”
“Believe me it can do a lot Lisa.”
“Can it make me smaller?”
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Time machine found

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"I don't think so," said the Doctor. "Now let's get out of here." He then used the Sonic screwdriver on the time device and they disappeared.
The Doctor and Lisa appeared in modern day London. The Doctor then used the sonic screwdriver to try and locate the T.A.R.D.I.S. It showed that the T.A.R.D.I.S was here somewhere.
“The Master is definitely here,” said the Doctor.
“Where is he daddy?” asked Lisa.
“I’m not too sure,” replied the Doctor. “Last time he came here he became Prime Minister. “I doubt that he’ll try it again.”
“What’s a Prime Minister?”
“I’ll tell you a little later. But right now we really need to find the Master before he tries to destroy the world again.”
“He’s tried it before?”
“Yes and many times he’s almost succeeded.”
“Then we must stop him. I like this planet.”
“I like it too but it’ll probably be a hump of rubble if we don’t find him.”
“But how do we do that Daddy?”
“Time Lords have different heartbeats and everything to regular humans. Maybe I can pick him up that way.”

How long will it take to find the Master
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Different time

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor and Lisa looked everywhere for the Master. The Doctor was picking up traces of a Time Lord who was different from him. Lisa wasn’t looking in particular. She had been distracted by a butterfly that flew by her dome. She couldn’t help but look at it and admire its beauty.
Then the Doctor got a strong lead on something. He followed the trail to a small alley. He was excited with what he was about to find.
“Where are we Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“Right now we’re in an alley,” replied the Doctor. “And hopefully finding the Master.”
He began to get closer to the signal. He then turned a corner and he was amazed to see the T.A.R.D.I.S in all of its glory.
“Daddy that’s your time machine,” said Lisa.
“I know and hopeful the Master is inside.”
The Doctor then opened the door and he went inside. The Master wasn’t inside but everything was the way it was.The Master hadn't destroyed anything or made anything dirty.
"Wow this place is actually clean," said the Doctor.
"But what aboth the master daddy?" replied Lisa.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Search for the Master

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor then checked all of the controls on the T.A.R.D.I.S. they all seemed to be functioning properly and all he had to do now was find the Master. But he was a little confused with why the Master even came here.
He left the T.A.R.D.I.S with Lisa and they had to go and look for the Master. They knew that the Master would have left something if he had been there. The search however would be nearly impossible. It was like trying to a needle in a thousand foot tall hay stack.
“Where is this Master daddy?” asked Lisa.
“I don’t know,” replied the Doctor. “The only Time Lord thing I can pick up is myself and the T.A.R.D.I.S.” he then thought for a moment. “That’s it he’s still in the T.A.R.D.I.S.”
“What?”
“He must still be in the T.A.R.D.I.S. That’s the only explanation to all this. We have to go back.”
The Doctor then went back to the .T.A.R.D.I.S. He knew that the Master was in there somewhere. But where was an entirely different matter. The T.A.R.D.I.S was almost infinite in size. There were even places that the Doctor hadn’t explored yet. The Master could be anywhere.


Will they find him in the T.A.R.D.I.S?

Eventually the Doctor and Lisa get back to the T.A.R.D.I.S. They start to look around everywhere for the Master. He could be anywhere in the infinite space of the T.A.R.D.I.S. the Doctor thought that it was best for Lisa to go into the Mind Room. She wasn’t much use to him on this search and she needed some rest.
The Doctor continued to look in the T.A.R.D.I.S. He looked in every room but he was coming up short every time. He feared that the Master was going to have the better of him. But in one room he saw flying sparks and he figured that the Master was there.
He took a look inside and he saw the Master working on a device. He sensed the Doctor’s presence and he turned around and looked at him.
“So you found me Doctor,” said the Master. “I expected you sooner.”
“What’s this all about?” replied the Doctor.
“Well I just needed to create this little device. And only you had the right parts. But there’s one part I’m missing. Where is it?”
“I’m not telling you anything.”
The Master then grabbed the Doctor and pinned him to the wall. He had an evil smile on his face.
“Where is the quantum transmitter?”
“It’s in the Mind Room.”
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: The Master is found

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"Thank you Doctor," said the master.
The Master ran towards the Mind Room. He soon got there and he expected to see the room full of tools. But instead he was in a giant bedroom. One of a typical girl. He saw stuffed toys everywhere and a bed that was taller than a skyscraper. He knew that he had been tricked and he wanted to get out.
But then a huge pink flip flop came crashing down in front of him. He looked up and he saw Lisa. She smiled down at him and she squatted down.
"Daddy got me a new toy," said Lisa. She then went to pick up the Master and he fired his laser screwdriver at her. This caused her a slight pain. "You're not very nice are you? Don't worry I'll teach you how to be nice." She then picked him up.
"Put me down you overgrown freak!" shouted the Master.
"Not if you say it like that. Now we are going to have a tea party and you can learn how to be nice."
Lisa then walked over to her bed and she sat onto it. She arranged some of her soft toys and she got some plastic tea cups. Then the Master used his Laser screw driver to blow the head off one of the toys. This disappointed Lisa a little but then the toy grew another head.

Will the Master escape?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: The Master and Lisa

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"That's a bad weapon," said Lisa. She then took it out of the Master's hands. "I'll have to put it over here for now." She then put it on her table.
"Hey you overgrown freak that's one of a kind!" shouted the Master.
"Shouting gets you no where." She then started to pour juice into the tea cups. She passed one to the Master. But he just knocked it out of her hands. "Now that wasn't very nice." She then poured him another one. "Now let's try again."
"I'm not going to drink that."
Lisa then held the Master and she poured the juice down his throat. "See that wasn’t so bad."
"I hate you."
"No using the word hate. You'll upset the guests."
"What guests they're inanimate objects. They don't have feelings and they can't think."
"Don't say that. That's very naughty."
"I don't care and you're the biggest freak of them all. The Doctor only keeps you here because he pities you."
This made Lisa cry and all her tears were falling on the Master.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Tea Party

choices: Hugs one of the stuffed toys
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa cried for a little but she was able to make herself feel happy again before the Master was drowned. Then she continued to try and make the Master a nicer person. The Doctor could see everything that was happening from a camera in the room. He couldn’t stop laughing at what he was seeing. The Master was completely powerless over the sweet giantess. She was still making him be nice.
“No Mr Master that’s not how you be nice,” said Lisa. “You say please and thank you.”
“I’m not saying that to you,” replied the Master.
She then raised her hand over her head and she put on a pretend angry face. “Say it or else you’ll be a pancake.”
“Ok please can I have some tea?” He said it in a gruff.
“What was that?”
“Please can I have some tea?”
“That’s better.”
Lisa then poured the Master some tea and he drunk some of it.
“What did you forget to say?”
“Thank you.”
“There you go.”

What does she do now?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Please and thank you

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa then got off her bed. She looked down at the Master.
"I'm going to get us some cookies," said Lisa. "Don't go anywhere."
She then went into her kitchen and got some cookies that she had made earlier. She then went back to the bed and she was happy to see the Master had stayed.
"Oh so you're still here. That's good."
"Well I can’t get away from here anyway," replied the Master.
"A smart man just like Daddy." She then gave him a cookie. He then began to ea it and she cleared her throat.
"Oh thank you."
"Good."
Then the Doctor walked in. He looked up at the bed and saw Lisa. He shouted over to her and she picked him up and hugged him. He laughed at the Master.
"I can't believe it the Master is actually having a tea party," said the Doctor.
"Well I didn't have a choice," replied the Master. "Your companion can be very forceful on issues."
"And that's why I love you."
These words made Lisa hug the Doctor a little more.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Forceful on issues

choices: To when the Romans conquered Britain
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“I know you’ve been trying to teach the Master to be nice,” said the Doctor. “But it won’t work on him.”
“But daddy I’ve gotten him to say please and thank you,” replied Lisa. “That’s gotta credit for something.”
The Master went to his wrist. He had a secret device on his wrist and he was about to activate it. He then teleported away.
“Until next time Doctor,” said the Master.
Lisa went to grab him but he was gone. She looked at the doctor a little confused.
“Where did he go Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“I’m not too sure,” replied the Doctor. “But we’ll see him again. “I know it.”
“And I can continue teaching him to be good.”
“You’ll be teaching him that for a long time.”
“Don’t worry daddy. I have all the time in the world.”
The Doctor couldn’t believe how kind Lisa was being. The Master was one of the most evil beings in the universe and Lisa still wanted to teach him how to be nice. She was by far the sweetest and definitely the biggest companion that he had ever had. And she was bonded to him like none of the others. They were like father and daughter.

Where do they go after this?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Bye bye Master

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor then set the controls to go to France in 2007. He wanted to go there in the summer so Lisa could get some fresh air. He’d also set it to an isolated area so she would be able to leave the dome and stretch her long long long legs.
Lisa was in her room and she was hugging some of the stuffed toys she had on her bed. It was a stuffed rabbit she was hugging. But then she felt the T.A.R.D.I.S shake. It was powerful enough to throw her off her bed. She landed quite hard on the ground but she was able to get to her feet.
“Daddy what’s happening?” asked Lisa.
Then the Doctor came in and shot Lisa with the ray gun and she appeared in the dome.
“Ok Lisa you deserve a holiday,” said the Doctor. “So we’re in France 2007.”
“Thank you Daddy.”
The Doctor then took Lisa to the doors. But as he opened it there was a loud explosion. It knocked him off his feet but he soon got back up again.
“Oops,” said the Doctor. “We’re in France alright but 90 years too early.”
“What’s happening?”
“It’s World War 1.”
“A what?”
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: WW1

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"World War 1 took place between 1914 and 1918," said the Doctor. "Looks like my traveling was off by a century."
"Is this a dangerous place Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Yes it is we better get out of here."
The Doctor then took Lisa back into the T.A.R.D.I.S. He then tried to use the controls to get out of the area. But for some reason they wouldn't work. He tried frantically but there was still nothing.
"Daddy what's wrong?" asked Lisa.
"It's not working," replied the Doctor. "Looks like we're stuck here for a while." Just then they felt giant footsteps. "Now that wasn't you was it?"
"No Daddy I'm too small."
The Doctor then went outside and saw a giant robot. It was being shot by machine guns but it didn't do much good. It was attacking soldiers and they were running away from them.
"That's not right," said the Doctor. "Since when were their giant robots in World War 1?"
"Shall i stop it?"

Will Lisa fight the robot yet?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Stuck here for now

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:

"Yes Daddy."
"Good now let's find someone who can help us."
The Doctor then began to run towards the British trenches. They had to be careful that they didn't go on any of the mines or else the Doctor would have lost a leg and Lisa would be released from her dome.
He eventually got to the trenches and he was spotted by some soldiers. They were about to fire but they heard him speak English. He had an appropriate accent and it definitely wasn't German. They let him into the trenches.
"Who are you?" asked a Soldier.
"I'm the Doctor," he replied.
"Doctor Who?"
"Just the Doctor. Now can I see your commanding officer?"
"You don't have the authority."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Race to the trenches

choices: Trying to think of a tactic
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“I have to see him,” said the Doctor “It’s an emergency.”
“I’m sorry I still don’t have the authority to see him,” replied the Soldier.
Then the Doctor got the physic paper from his pocket. It put him as a high ranking officer of the British army.
“Ok this is all I need to go and see him,” said the Soldier. “But we must confiscate your doll in the bottle.”
“No that stays with me and if you try to remove it from me you’ll be court marshalled by Field Marshall Haig. Do I make myself clear?”
“Sir yes sir.”
The Doctor then walked down the trenches towards the hut of the Captain. He kept Lisa close and he was luck that he didn’t have her taken away from him. If that had happened Lisa would have grown as rapidly as she did in London.
Eventually he reached the small hut. There were some soldiers guarding the entrance. He showed them the papers and they let him in without a fuss. The Doctor saw the Captain looking at maps on his desk.
“Who are you?” asked the Captain.
“I’m the Doctor.”

What is the Captain doing?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: To see a captain

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“I’m just the Doctor,” said the Doctor. “Now I see you’re having a problem with giant mechanical monsters.”
“Yeah the Germans came out with them over last week and every attack I’ve tried has done nothing against them,” replied the Captain. “Not even a dent.”
“What are you doing about it?”
“Well I’m trying to figure out a way to stop them. But that thing has taken out some of my best men. I’m running out of troops.”
“I might have something that will help.” He then got Lisa out and showed him to the Captain. He laughed at her.
“How can she help us she’s a doll in a glass dome?”
“She’s alive and believe me she can get a lot bigger.” Then they felt the ground move.
“Oh my God they’re coming.”
The Doctor went outside and he saw the 100 foot tall robots coming towards them. He looked at Lisa and she knew what he wanted her to do. He threw her onto the battlefield and the glass smashed. Everyone was astonished to see the once doll sized gril become the size of a small mountain.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Lisa's time to attack

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The robots were like tiny dolls to Lisa. She began to stomp on them with her giant sized flip flops. Some fired at her but the bullets simply bounced off her legs. They couldn't penetrate her thick skin. She even turned around and picked up the Doctor. She put him on her huge shoulder. Now she didn't have any danger in growing if she got too far away from him.
"Ok Lisa I need you to mildly damage one of them," said the Doctor. "I need to know what's running it."
"Ok Daddy," replied Lisa.
She then grabbed one of the robots and she roved the head. The robot was basically dead but the parts were still in tact. Lisa has succeeded in what she wanted to do.
She crushed the rest of the robots with ease. She could hear cheers in the British trenches.
"What are they doing Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"They're cheering you," replied the Doctor. "To them you’re a heroine. In fact you are a heroine."
"Thanks Daddy."

What does Lisa do now?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Lisa in charge

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa sat down and relaxed. She set off one or two mines but they didn't really hurt her. They were like peashooters to her and she ignored them. She put the Doctor in the trenches and she gave him the head of the robot. The Doctor wouldn't be that far away from her anyway so she wouldn't start growing.
The head was too big to move by man so the Doctor had to examine it from where Lisa had put it. He looked all over it and he was puzzled by it. Some of the soldiers were watching him as he looked through the big metal head.
"What is it Doctor?" asked a Soldier. "Is it a monster?"
"No it's a little like a tank," replied the Doctor. "Except its remote controlled and can walk."
"We've got nothing like this."
"And the Germans shouldn't as well. Technology like this shouldn't be available for another 500 years." He then looks at the other Soldiers. "People when these things attack you again stay hidden. They have heat vision. Stay below and they will not see you."
"Just leave the giantess here. She can protect us."
"Believe me that would be a bad idea."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Examining the head

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"Why is she going to destroy us or something?" asked the Solider.
"Yes in a sense," replied the Doctor. "But she won't do it intentionally. If she's a certain distance away from me then her body rapidly grows. Once I left her and she went from 75 to 1,000 feet in a few minutes. But at this size I'd hate to think what would happen."
"Ok you've made your point Doctor."
The Doctor then used the device to put Lisa back into her dome. She was happy to be close to the Doctor again.
"What do you suggest we do now then Doctor?" asked the Captain.
"I need to get to the German trenches undetected."
The soldiers then laughed. "Doctor we've been trying that for 3 years. It's impossible."
"For a human yes but not a time lord."
"But No Man's land is too dangerous. You'll lose your leg with a mine even before you get to the German trenches."
"I'm well aware of the risks Captain but I really must go."
"Your funeral Doctor."

Will the Doctor reach a mine?

The Doctor got out a device from his pocket that detected things in the ground using sound. He was able to pick up the mines easily and he walked past them. Lisa was also in his pocket and she was a little worried. But she trusted the Doctor with her own life so she felt that she was safe.
Eventually they reach the German trenches. At first they were going to shoot the Doctor. But then he began to speak fluent German. He sounded like a native and he didn't have a British accent. They let him into the trenches.
<Translated from German>
"<What are you doing in No Man's Land?" asked a Soldier.
"<I was on my way here but I kinda lost my way>," replied the Doctor.
"<Be careful those mines are for those no good British>"

"<It was going well at first. But then the British had a giant girl. She was huge as big as a mountain>."
"<This maybe a problem>."
"<Take me to your commanding Officer Private>."
"<Yes Sir>!"

The Doctor was led to the German captain. He was happy to see that there was a man who wasn’t a soldier seeing him. He had almost had enough of this war.
“<Captain Wagner I have brought the Doctor with here to see you>,” said the Soldier.
“<Very well bring him in>,” replied the German Captain.
Then the solider brought in the Doctor. He stood there and looked at the German Captain.
“<Hello there Doctor>,” said the German Captain. “<What brings you here>?”
“<I am here under strict orders of the Kaiser>,” replied the Doctor. “<He wants to know why you haven’t had a breakthrough with our secret weapon>.”
“<Well the British are more resilient then expected. But I assure you that they will fall in tine>.”

“<Yes sir>.”

“<Yes we have more on their way>.”
“<Where from>?”
“<The aliens>.”

Which aliens are they from?

“<I am unsure what they called themselves now>,” said the German Captain. “<I think they were called Daleks>.”
The Doctor’s spine shivered in terror. “<Did you say Daleks>?” replied the Doctor.
“<Yes I did. Is that a problem>?”
“<Yes that is a problem you need to stop communicating with the Daleks they are very dangerous>.”

But the Doctor got Lisa and he looked at her through the doom.
“What’s wrong Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“We’re in big trouble the Daleks are behind this,” replied the Doctor.
“What’s a Dalek?”
“You’ll find out sooner or later. But believe me when I say. You don’t ever want to mix with them.”

"What do they do?" asked Lisa.
"They're evil and they won't stop until the human race is dead," replied the Doctor. "I've fought them numerous times."

"But you're my Daddy you can do anything."

What does the Doctor suggest?

What happens?

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Inside the base

The soldiers then opened the doors and there were laser bullets from the Daleks. They quickly shut the door. They all looked at the Doctor.
