“I don’t think we’ll be able to hold them for much longer.”
“Don’t worry I won’t need much time.”
The Doctor then went to the door panel. He got Lisa out of his pocket. He looked at her and she smiled.
“Ok Lisa. I need you to do something for me,” said the Doctor.
“What is it Daddy?” replied Lisa.
“I’m going to release you now in that room. I want you to destroy every Dalek you see.”
“Ok daddy I’ll try.”
“That’s my girl.”

What happens?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Cornered

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor then quickly opened the door and threw Lisa inside. He told the soldiers to run for it to the exit.
Inside the room Lisa's done had opened and she was expanding rapidly. The Daleks were firing at her but they weren’t hurting her. But they were being crushed by her expanding body.
The Doctor and the soldiers quickly got to the exit and they got out. But then they saw Lisa grow right out of the ground. She was still growing rapidly and her feet were still in the base.
After a few seconds she was back to her full size of 4,500 feet. She gently picked the soldiers and the Doctor up with her one finger and she brought them up to her eye so she could see them.
"There you go daddy," said Lisa.
"Good work Lisa you're a real Heroine,” replied the Doctor.
"What's a heroine?"
"I'll tell you a little later. But first we need to get rid of any evidence that the Daleks were there."
"Ok Daddy."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Lisa destroys Daleks

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa then bent down and picked the Dalek base out of the ground. It took all of her mighty strength but she was able to do it. She then threw it over the horizon and it seemed to go out of the Earth's atmosphere along with the other Daleks. She watched it go out of sight and she looked down at the Doctor. He could barely see him so she squatted down to him. She then picked him up with her little finger and brought him up to her level.
"There you go Daddy no more mean Daleks," said Lisa.
"Well remind me to let you have a mountain of sweets when we get back to the T.A.R.D.I.S."
"Ok Daddy."
But before Lisa walked back to the T.A.R.D.I.S she took the troops back to the trenches. She wanted to take the Germans out but the Doctor forbid it. He didn't want to interfere with time anymore. Besides they would win by themselves.
When Lisa got to the T.A.R.D.I.S she was put back into her dome and taken into the mind room. There she was released but everything still seemed normal to her. She sat down on her bed and started to think about the Daleks. She didn't think they'd see them again."

Where do they go next?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Bye bye daleks

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor then messed with the controls a little and the T.A.R.D.I.S began to travel through time and space. After it started traveling the Doctor went into Lisa's room. She was sitting on her bed painting her toenails. She was enjoying doing this and she saw the Doctor come in. She picked him up and gave him a hug.
"Hi daddy," said Lisa.
"Hi Lisa," replied the Doctor. "What are you doing?"
"I'm painting my toenails Daddy. Do you want me to do yours?"
"No I'm fine thank you."
"Ok. It would have been difficult to do it anyway. I would have had to take your shoes off."
"Yeah for your feet you don't have to take your shoes off."
"The miracle of these things you call Flip flops."
"Anyway Lisa I'm proud of what you did today. Not many can say they've killed a Dalek."
"I don't really like killing Daddy."
"Neither do I but there are times when you've got no choice but to kill. I'm sorry to say that."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Painting the toenails

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Eventually Lisa finished painting her toenails and she looked at them. She even moved her toes a little.
"There all done now Daddy," said Lisa. "So how do they look?"
"They look fine Lisa," replied the Doctor. "If you were normal size then you would be a beautician."
"What's a beautician?"
"Someone who uses make up to make other people look better. You'd be perfect for that."
"Thanks Daddy."
She then raised the Doctor up to her lips and she gave him a kiss. She was very careful with him. She didn't want to accidentally swallow him. That would be heartbreaking for her.
Then the T.A.R.D.I.S shook once more and then it stopped. The Doctor grinned in excitement.
"Lisa looks like we've landed."
"Where are we Daddy?"
"Well I set us to go to..."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Landed

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
They had landed in January 917 in Russia. It was cold so the Doctor wrapped up warm. Lisa was alright in her dome. She didn't feel the cold. But instead she saw people rioting. She was a little confused.
"Daddy where are we?" asked Lisa.
"We're in Russia," replied the Doctor. "Just weeks before the revolution."
"What's a revolution?"
"A big change. The people want the Tsar out of power."
"What's a Tsar?"
"It the name for the Russian King. He wasn't too popular and now he's paying for his unpopularity."
The Doctor and Lisa then walked away from the T.A.R.D.I.S There were several people trying to get bread from a shop but there wasn't enough to go around. They were smashing the glass and taking the bread.
"Why's everyone so angry?" asked Lisa.
"Well it's been going on for years and years," replied the Doctor. "There's too much to explain right now I'll tell you in full another time."
"Ok Daddy."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Revolution

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Then Lisa noticed all the snow around them. it was on the buildings and everywhere. She was a little confused.
"What's all this white stuff Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"That's called snow," replied the Doctor.
"What does it do?"
"Nothing much but you can make snowballs out of them and snowmen."
"Can I make a snowman?"
"Yes but to make one the same size as you would take a lot of snow."
The Doctor then walk around a little. He could hear people shouting for the Abdication of the Tsar. The war was still going on in the west and Russian soldiers were still getting killed. This as making the Tsar even more unpopular.
But Lisa saw a cake in the window and she licked her lips and tried to get out of her dome. But like before it was unbreakable from the inside.
"Daddy can I have some cake?" asked Lisa.
"Maybe a little later," replied the Doctor. "I'll buy it for you and then enlarge it. How does that sound?"
"Great Daddy."

What happens next?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Cake

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa then saw what seemed to be a small car. It was typical of the time period. Only rich people could afford it but she was jumping up and down in joy. But eventually she hit her head on the top of the dome.
"Daddy what's that over there?" asked Lisa.
"That's a car," replied the Doctor. He then saw a man come out of it. But he recognised him. "I know him. That's King Charles II of England."
"Wow another King."
"But he shouldn't be here."
"Why Daddy?"
"Because he died in the 17th century. Something's not right here."
"What could it be Daddy?"
"I'm not sure but we'll find out."
The Doctor then put Lisa's done in his pocket and he went over to king Charles. He was wearing the normal wear for royalty of the 17th century. He looked at him a little.
"Can I help you?" asked King Charles II.
"Yes my name's the Doctor," replied the Doctor.
"Doctor Who?"
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Charles II

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"It doesn't really matter," said the Doctor. "But there's something I really need to ask you."
"What is it?" replied King Charles II.
"Are you King Charles II?"
"Yes I am. Why?"
"Well no offence but shouldn't you be dead by now? Come on how old are you?!"
"I'm 287 years old."
"Wow you look good for a man who's that age."
"Thank you. But now I must bid you farewell. I have business to attend to."
King Charles II then walked away and the Doctor looked at him. But then he heard a knocking on Lisa's dome. He took her out of his pocket and looked at her.
"What's going on Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Well people who should have died more then two centuries ago are walking around as healthy as a horse."
"What does that mean?"
"I'm not too sure but I'll find out soon."
"How?"

How will the Doctor do it?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Should be dead

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor decided to follow the thought dead King. He was still extremely suspicious of him. But he needed to get the information he needed before he could do anything else.
He followed Charles II into the palace. There he began to see other King and Queens from around the world who were suppose to be dead. The Doctor now was more puzzled then ever.
"What's going on here then?" asked the Doctor to himself.
"Is anything happening Daddy?" replied Lisa.
"I'm not too sure but I'm about to find out."
The Doctor then got into a position where he could see and where no one else could see him. He was extremely interested in what was happened. Then in the corner of his eye he caught a glimpse of Tsar Nicolas II. He seemed to be in the centre.
"Kings and Queens from around the world we are in trouble," said the Tsar. "The war is starving us and the people rebel."
"Hang them all," said Queen Mary I
"Patience."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Others

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor couldn't believe what he was seeing. There were all supposedly dead rulers in one room. They all seemed alive and well. Lisa was taken out of the Doctor's pocket and she could see what was happening.
"Who are all these?" asked Lisa.
"People who are suppose to be dead," replied the Doctor.
"Don't be silly Daddy. If they're dead then why are they all here?"
"I don't know but I will find out."
The Doctor then looked even more. He could hear the Tsar talking about trying to repress the rebellion. He didn't know what to do but just to sit there and watch.
"Send in the soldiers like you did last time," said King Edward II.
"No that caused more trouble then it was worth," replied the Tsar. "We need something that can stop it without me looking bad."
"What is there?"
"A little mind control."
"Have you gone completely mad? They can't be trusted."
"Do not disrespect them. They gave you life again and you don't want to trust them?"

What happens next?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Them

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor continued to watch what the former King and Queens were doing. Lisa was still as puzzled as ever but she felt a strange twitch in her nose. She knew that she was about to sneeze but she tried to keep it in. But it came out.
It was louder then she had expected and she caught the attentions of everyone around her. Everyone looked around but saw nothing.
"We have intruders," said the Tsar. "Send the guards to search for them."
Then the guards started to look for intruders. The Doctor knew that it was time to move. if he stayed he would surely be caught and probably tortured. He kept Lisa with him as a secret weapon.
He tried to get to the doors but he was stopped by some guards. They got their guns towards him.
"We have located the intruders," said One of the Guards. "Raise your arms."
The Doctor raised his arms and he still had Lisa in his hand. They looked up at her. "I surrender," he said.
"What's that?"
"My companion."
"Drop it."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Discovered

choices: I need to talk to the Tsarina
There's someone there I need to speak with
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"I don't think you want me to do that," said the Doctor.
"Drop it now or else I shoot," replied the Guard.
"Ok then."
The Doctor then dropped the dome onto the ground. It shattered and Lisa began to grow. The guards watched as the once tiny girl was growing taller in front of them. Compared to her full size this was nothing. Her head was pushing against the ceiling.
The Doctor ran out of the building just as Lisa's head went through the ceiling. He got his gun out and fired it at her. She then disappeared back in the dome.
"Very good Lisa you help us escape," said the Doctor.
"Glad I could help Daddy," replied Lisa.
"When we get back to the T.A.R.D.I.S I'll give you a cookie."
"Yeah cookie."
But now the Doctor had to find out just how all those Kings and Queens came back to life. This would be difficult but he sensed that the Russian Royal family had something to do with it.
"Ok Lisa now we go to the Palace."
"What for?"
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Escape

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"There's someone I need to talk to," said the Doctor.
"Who?" replied Lisa.
"Well history will remember as the mad monk."
The Doctor then went to the Russian royal palace. Using a device or two he was able to get past the guards and into the palace. The Doctor looked at all the gold things around him. It was truly a palace fit for royalty.
He then went upstairs to the bedrooms. He heard someone praying to God. he went to that room and he saw a man with long black hair and a long beard. He looked at him with terror.
"Who are you?" he asked.
"I'm the Doctor," replied the Doctor. "And you're Father Gregory Rasputin. Am I right?"
"Yes I am but how did you know I was here?"
"Every man, woman and child in Russia know that you're here."
"Have you come to kill me?"
"No I need information."
"What about?"
"Why are all those dead Kings and Queens here?"
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Rasputin

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"I do not know what you are talking about," said Rasputin.
"You know the Russian royal family better then anyone," replied the Doctor. "You know something."
"Ok there is one thing I know. There's something in the lower parts of the palace."
"What is this something?"
"I don't know. The Tsar uses it to do Ungodly things. I beg of you help me get rid of it before he makes God angry."
"What does it do?” Rasputin was in silence. "What does it do?"
"It brings people alive from the dead."
"Take me to it."
Rasputin then took the Doctor downstairs to where the machine was kept. It was a lot bigger then anyone expected and Lisa looked at it in wonder. She questioned the Doctor about it.
"What's this daddy?" she asked.
"That is forbidden technology," replied the Doctor.
"What are you going to do with it?"
"Destroy it."

What happens next?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Forbidden machine

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"Can I stomp on it Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"No you'll burst out of the palace and we can't let that happen," replied the Doctor. "I just need to overload it."
But then the machine began to act up. The Doctor had pressed any buttons or pulled any of the levers. The Doctor put Lisa in his pocket for her own protection but he waited to see who came out.
A man walked out of the machine. At first he was only a skeleton but he began to get muscle and organs. The last things he got was skin and clothes. But when he finished the Doctor saw that it was Ivan the terrible.
"Where am I?" asked Ivan. "Who has brought me back from the dead?"
"Why are you here?" asked the Doctor.
"I want to know that myself."
"I think it has something to do with Tsar Nicolas II."
"Who?"
"The latest Tsar of Russia."
"What does he want?"
"I don't know."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Ivan the Terrible

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"Tell me or else I'll have you hung," said Ivan.
"Don't talk to my Daddy like that!" snapped Lisa. He then looked and saw Lisa in her dome. "No one talks to my Daddy like that."
"What are you going to do little girl?"
"When I get out of here I will stomp you."
"You couldn't even stomp an ant at your size."
"Please be quiet you two," interrupted the Doctor. "Arguing isn't going to solve anything. It'll only create more problems."
"Sorry Daddy," replied Lisa.
"Now all the deceased world leaders are here in Russia. This machine seems to have brought them back alive and well."
"What do we do?"
"We split up and find information. Ivan you go to the meeting and see what they're up to. Rasputin try and get some answers from the Tsarina.
"What will you do Doctor?" replied Rasputin.
"I'm going to find out how this thing ticks. It might take me a while."
"But what about guards?"

What will the Doctor do about guards?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Assignments

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor then showed Lisa to Ivan. He didn't think that such a tiny little girl could possibly help them. He laughed a little.
"You expect someone of such small stature to protect us?" asked Ivan.
"This is a very special little girl," replied the Doctor. "If I released her she would grow into a giant the size that you could never imagine. She's never failed me and she's my companion."
"Do you expect me to believe that?"
"I would give you an example but there's not much room. Anyway we better get going."
Ivan and Rasputin split up as The Doctor worked on the machine. Lisa was glad of what he had said about her. She wanted to hug and kiss her. But she was in her dome and if she was out she could easily crush him by accident.
"Thank you Daddy," said Lisa. "For what you said."
"Well everything I told you was the truth," replied the Doctor. "You are a very good girl."
"Thanks Daddy."
The Doctor continued to work on the machine. But meanwhile with Rasputin. He was just going to the Tsarina. She was sitting at a table writing something down on a piece of paper.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Lisa is protection

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Tsarina looked at Rasputin. She was surprised to see him up here. She tried to smile at him.
“Can I help you Father?” asked the Tsarina.
“Yes I need to know where the Tsar is,” replied Rasputin.
“I’m not too sure. He’s probably doing politics right now.”
“Also there was one more thing I was just wondering. There is a machine in the lower parts of the palace. Where did it come from?”
“I’m not too sure of that either. Nicolas just brought that in a few weeks ago. I have no idea what it does.”
Rasputin was having o luck with the tsarina. But he would try for the sake of everyone.
But meanwhile Ivan the Terrible went to the meeting where the Tsar was. He just said that he came in late and he was taken to a seat. He began to hear what the current Tsar was up to.
“Tonight we will strike a blow to the peasants,” said the Tsar. “We will remain in control of Russia.”
“But your plan can not possibly work,” replied President Washington. “This is immoral. Even by your standards.”

What does Ivan do?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: No luck

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Ivan then stood up and everyone looked at him. he began to think about what he was about to say.
"How do you expect to get the country under control?" asked Ivan. "From what I've heard you haven't been able to get the people to stop rioting."
"A good point," replied Nicolas II. "We have a weapon that even the peasants can't ignore."
"What weapon is that?"
"Have any of you ever heard of Nuclear weapons?"
Meanwhile with the Doctor he was putting the finishing touches to his research. He picked out a test. He wanted to recreate a random piglet. He typed everything in and the piglets came out. Lisa found it cute.
"Oh he's cute Daddy," said Lisa. "I could hug him and kiss him."
"Well when you're out of there you'd have to be very careful. You wouldn't want to accidentally crush him."
"No I wouldn't Daddy."
"Well at least we know how it works."
"What do we do with it?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Nuclear

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"We send all of these dead Kings and Queens back to where they came from," said the Doctor. "Having many different people who're suppose to be dead but not can really put a strain on time."
"But we've been all through time Daddy," replied Lisa.
"Two maybe three people won't affect it. But having this many will. If they don't go back and soon the entire universe might unravel."
"Is there anything I can do daddy?"
"For now no. But we need to get all of the Kings and Queens back here."
"How do we do that?"
"I have a cunning plan."
Meanwhile Ivan was still listening to Nicolas II. He didn't think that the Tsar was speaking much sense. personally he had never heard of a nuke. But the Tsar told them that it was the ultimate weapon.
"And where did you get this so called Nuke from?" asked King Lois VII of France.
"Roughly 30 years from now the United States created this weapon to end wars," replied the Tsar. "I just had to borrow one of the fine inventions and bring them back here for our cause."

Who do we stay with?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Get them back

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Meanwhile the Doctor was putting the finishing touches on the machine. He was making a certain setting that would take all of the dead kings and queens back to where they had come from. But this would still be dangerous.
"Ok Lisa there's one thing I really need you to do," said the Doctor.
"You want my help Daddy?" replied Lisa.
"Yes I need you to get everyone out of the building. I'll release you and then drive everyone outside. There my plan can be put into action."
The Doctor then went out of the building with Lisa. He smashed her dome on the ground and he watched as his companion grew in size. She soon reached her full size of 4500 feet tall. She looked at how small everything looked to her now.
She then took a tiny step towards where the Tsar and the others were. She started to call them out. She even ripped off the roof to take a look inside. Like the Doctor expected everyone inside began to panic.
The Kings and Queens ran out of the building to the outside. Then the Doctor turned on the machine in the basement and pure energy came out. He saw the kings and queens flying out and entering the machine. When they entered each one would disappear and go back to where they came from.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: lan into action

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"It's working Daddy!" said Lisa with her loud voice. now when she spoke it would make the ground shake. "Oops sorry." She whispered this time.
As the Kings and Queens were being sucked into the portal the Tsar Nicolas II came out and saw what was happening. he wasn't too happy.
"You've ruined everything," said the Tsar. "You will pay with your life."
The Tsar went to go to the Doctor but then Lisa put her giant sized flip flop in the way. The Tsar then looked up at Lisa. She picked him up with her huge hand and he was like a speck to her.
"No one tries to harm my Daddy!" shouted Lisa. Her voice was now deafening to everyone near her. It was also causing some earthquakes. "You got that little Man!"
"Yes of course," replied the Tsar.
Lisa was just about able to hear him nut she still wasn't too happy with the Tsar for trying to harm the Doctor.
"If you try to hurt him just one more time you'll have me to deal with!"
She then put the Tsar on the ground and he ran away. She then looked at the Doctor. She picked him up and gave him a little hug and kiss.
"Well done Lisa," said the Doctor.

What do they do next?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Tsra and Mega sized Lisa

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"Thanks Daddy," said Lisa. "But what now?"
"We leave," replied the Doctor. "Everything is how it should be."
"Ok."
The Doctor then put Lisa in her dome and he went back to the T.A.R.D.I.S. He set the controls and they disappeared from Russia.
He then went to the Mind Room and released Lisa. She soon grew to her full size and she sat on her bed. She picked up the tiny sized Doctor and she put him on the tip of her finger. She put him close to her eye so that she could see him properly.
"Daddy if you get any smaller I won't be able to see you," said Lisa.
"It's not me that's shrinking," replied the Doctor. "It's you that's growing. Well hopefully you've stopped by now."
"Can I be smaller?"
"Well I'm sure that there's a way."
"Please do daddy. It's fun being this size but I want to give you proper hugs and kisses. I can't do that if you're small."
"Well I'll see what I can do."
"Thanks."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Lisa wants to be smaller

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa gave the Doctor just one more big hug before putt him by her door. He left the mind room quickly and went to another room in the T.A.R.D.I.S. This room was like a lab. This was where he would create some of his technology. He started working on something that could shrink Lisa.
Meanwhile in Lisa’s room she was hugging some of her soft toys. She shed a tear because of her size. But at least in here she felt like she was normal. Everyone didn’t look like ants in here.
“Hmm why am I so big,” she said this to one of the cuddly toys. “If I was small then my Daddy would really be happy with me. I would be really happy with myself. But he’ll find something. I hope.”
“Lisa,” said a Voice.
“Who said that?” She looked around and saw no one. “Is that you Daddy?”
“No Lisa it isn’t the Doctor.”
“Who is it?”
“Someone who really wants to help you. I know that you want to be small. Is that right?”
“Yes.”

What is it?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Voices

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"Then do as I say and you will be normal size in no time," said the Voice. "That would make the Doctor very happy."
"Daddy would be happy?" replied Lisa.
"Yes and I know how much you like making him happy. Now firstly I want you to get me something."
"Can you tell me who you are first? I'm not suppose to talk to people I can't see. Please show yourself."
"Very well." Then was seemed to be a small piece of mist came in front of Lisa's huge eye. The mist was normal size. But compared to Lisa it was like a speck of dust. She couldn't see it too clearly.
"What are you?"
"My name is John Lumic."
"I've heard that name somewhere."
"You probably have. I was a great scientist and I need your help."
"What do you want me to do?"
"Go and get me the sonic screw driver."
"That belongs to my daddy."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: A ghost

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“Is your so called Daddy the Doctor?” asked John.
“Yep he’s the smartest man I know,” replied Lisa. “He’s going to fix my little height problem.”
“But I can fix it a lot quicker that he can. I will do it for you if you get me the Sonic Screwdriver.”
“But I’m too big to go into Daddy’s Time Machine. I’m always stuck in here.”
“You would like to explore the T.A.R.D.I.S wouldn’t you?”
“Yes I would.”
“Well with my help you will be able to. Call the Doctor in and get the screwdriver off him.”
“No I don’t want to trick my Daddy. He’s been too good to me.”
“But the Doctor will be very grateful for doing this to me. We were good friends back in the day. I can surprise him with my appearance. You want the Doctor to be surprised?”
“Yes I do.”
“Then call him.”
“DADDY!”
Lisa waited a few seconds for the Doctor to come. She really wanted surprise him like John Lumic had said.

Will he come?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Convincing

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor soon came rushing into Lisa room. The moment she went in Lisa picked him up and brought him up to her level. She was still on her finger tip and she tried to smile at him.
"Daddy can I see your sonic screwdriver please?" asked Lisa.
"Why would you want to see that boring thing?" replied the Doctor.
"Because I like it plus it'll give you a surprise."
"What kind of surprise?"
"On that you would really like. Can I please daddy?"
"Ok but be careful with it. They're hard to replace."
The Doctor then put the Sonic Screwdriver on one of Lisa's other finger tips. She then brought it close to her eye so that she could see it properly. But then the ghost of John Lumic appeared again and got the screwdriver.
"I've got it!" he said.
""Who's that?" asked the Doctor.
"Your old friend John Lumic," replied Lisa.
"You mean the creator of the Cybermen?"
"What's a Cyberman?"
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Bad guy

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"Very bad robots," said the Doctor. "What did he say to you?" Lisa didn't say anything at first. "What did he say?"
"He said that he wanted your sonic screwdriver," replied Lisa.
Just then the Doctor felt the Sonic Screwdriver leave his pocket and he saw the ghost of John Lumic with it in his hand he laughed at them.
"You really thought you saw the last of me?" asked John.
"Give me that back," replied the Doctor. "You have no idea what that thing can do."
"Oh but I do Doctor. But firstly I have a big problem namingly your companion."
"Leave Lisa out of this."
"Fine I'll send her somewhere where she won't be in the way. She wanted to be smaller well her wish is my command."
John then fired the sonic screwdriver at Lisa and she began to shrink rapidly. She quickly put the Doctor down but she was losing hundreds of feet in seconds. She called out for the Doctor's help but there was nothing that he could do.
Eventually he saw his companion at normal size but she was still shrinking fast. He dread to think of her becoming microscopic again. He only wished that there was something that he could do.

How small will Lisa become?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Lumic and the screwdriver

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa shrank smaller and the Doctor could only watch. But he was thankful to see her stop when she was the size of a doll. She was crying and the Doctor picked her up. But then he noticed that the room was shrinking. It was resetting itself to Lisa’s new size and he had to get out before he was crushed.
But the Doctor had to wait a minute to get off the bed. He had to wait until it was small enough for him to get off without hurting himself.
When it did get small enough the Doctor jumped down ands ran out of the door. He looked at Lisa and he wasn’t too happy.
“Sorry Daddy,” cried Lisa. “I didn’t know he was bad.”
“That’s alright,” replied the Doctor. “We’ll beat him so how. But he has my sonic screwdriver. He has the advantage.”
“Maybe I can help.”
“What can you do?”
“I don’t know but whatever it is just ask.”
“I’ll keep that in mind.”
Just then John came out of the Mind Room. Lisa was in some fear of being shrunk even smaller and she cowered behind the Doctor.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Doll sized Lisa

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"Now with this I can do almost anything | want," said John. "Even get myself a brand new body after you destroyed my perfect body."
"You are an evil parasite that takes life wherever you see it," replied the Doctor. "You sicken me."
"I don't destroy life Doctor. I create it. Just like I made those homeless people into true people."
"You turned them into Cybermen. You practically killed them."
"No I made them better." he then sees Lisa. She was still cowering in the Doctor's hand. "Seems that your companion is afraid of me."
"She should be you took her size away from her."
"That's what she wanted. She wished to be smaller. But she didn't say how small she wanted to be."
"You're a monster."
"No I have power."
John then pointed the sonic screwdriver to a certain item in the T.A.R.D.I.S and it seemed to come alive.
"Run!"

What happens?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Monster

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor then began to run away. He held Lisa tight and he went towards one of the safety rooms. But then something grabbed Lisa’s foot. She tried to hold on with all of her strength but at her tiny size it wasn’t enough. She was easily pulled off and she began screaming.
“Daddy!” she screamed.
“Lisa,” replied the Doctor.
But before he could react she was taken away from him and she was put back into the Mind Room. When she did sit converted back into her ideal room. It was scaled down to her size and she was crying. She ran to the door and tried to open it. But it wouldn’t open.
“Let me out!” she screamed banging the door. “Let me out!”
But there was nothing that could have been done. Lisa was lost for now and only the Doctor could go up against Lumic.
“It’s just me and you Doctor,” said Lumic.
“You will pay for what you’ve done a thousand times over,” replied the Doctor.
“Try me.”
“As you wish.”
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Trapped

choices: Lisa gets out of the mind room
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa was still banging at the doors. She really wanted to get out and help the Doctor. But there wasn’t anything that she could do. Even if she did get out she was way too small to help out anyway. All she could do was sit on her bed and hope that the Doctor would win and return her size to her.
Outside the Doctor was trying to get close to John Lumic. But with the sonic screwdriver he was keeping the Doctor at bay. If he didn’t get it back soon then the whole T.AR.D.I.S would be destroyed. He only wished that Lisa was with him and at full size to help him. But unfortunately he was on his own.
“Stop this madness,” said the Doctor.
“I ill if you grant me one request,” replied John.
“What is it?”
“You give me your body. If you do that then your tiny young companion can live. Do we have a deal?”
The Doctor began to think a little. He couldn’t risk Lisa’s life for anything. But if John Lumic had his body then he could commit crimes against humanity.
“Well what’s your answer?”
“No!”

What happens?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Choice

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor knew that there was only one thing he could do to get the sonic screwdriver back and stop this nightmare. He only had one shot at this. If he failed then all would be lost. Lumic’s insanity would destroy the universe.
There was something on the side where the Doctor was standing. It was a handy little device that had helped him out over the years.
“So what’s the answer Doctor?” asked John. “Your life or your companion’s.”
“Well since you put it like that I choose neither.”
“What?”
The Doctor then picked the device up and he fired it at Lumic. This made him drop the sonic screwdriver. Now that the Doctor had gotten it back to tables had been turned in his favour.
"That's impossible," said john. "You can't do that to me."
"I can and I have," replied the Doctor. "Now leave the T.A.R.D.I.S."
He then switched the Sonic Screwdriver on and John Lumic disappeared into thin air. The Doctor sighed in relief.
But then he went to the Mind Room and he opened the door for the still doll sized Lisa. She was happy to see him.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Victory

choices: Try and do something with her size
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“It’s alright Lisa John’s gone we’re safe now,” said the Doctor.
“What about me am I going to stay this size?” replied Lisa.
“No with this I can reverse what he did to you. But then you’re going to be full size again. Do you want that?”
“Yes I couldn’t help you when I was this size. I want to be big again so that he can’t hurt me again.”
“Ok step back.”
Lisa stepped back into the Mind Room. The Doctor pointed the sonic screwdriver at her and fired. Lisa felt a little weird but nothing around her seemed to change. But when she looked at the door the Doctor seemed to be tiny. She realized that she was back to full size again.
“Daddy I’m big again,” said Lisa.
“I can still find a way to make you small enough to be able to walk in a street without crushing everyone.”
“You can do. But for now I just want to admire what I have.”
“Ok Lisa.”
She then sat on her bed and she hummed to herself.

What does Lisa do next?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Big again

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.author_name: This site is dead.I wana leave
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
After a moment she stopped humming.
"Actually Daddy, I'd like to go out and walk around"
The Doctor raised an eyebrow
"Don't worry Daddy, I won't go too far, I just want to strech my legs a little."
The Doctor nodded
"Ok, but make sure you don't go too far, you know what will happen if you do"
"Yay! Thanks Daddy!" Lisa cheered, hugging the Doctor as lighlty as she could.
The Doctor set the tardis for the english countryside.
Lisa stepped out and looked around.
She smiled, althoughs he was still bigger than she liked, she was glad to be back and happy to be outside. She took a few steps (quite a distance to us), and looked around, enjoying the elvated view her height gave her. She walked around a little more, strecthing her colassal legs..
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Going out for a walk

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa admired the fresh air and the sunshine that she felt on her skin. But everything still seemed to be tiny to her. But she was being careful not to go too far away from the T.A.R.D.I.S. But there were so many places she wanted to go. But if she did she’d grow too big in a matter of seconds.
“How can I go over there without being too far from Daddy?” asked Lisa. She began to think a little. But she saw the T.A.R.D.I.S next to her colossal toe. She began to come up with an idea. “Well looks like I’ve gotta take Daddy with me.”
Lisa then carefully picked up the T.A.R.D.I.S and she put it in her hand. Now she could go wherever she wanted without the fear of walking too far away.
She began to walk the large fields. She was leaving some footprints. But thankfully there was no one around. So she couldn’t accidentally hurt anyone. This made her happy.
But eventually she accidentally tripped over and she landed on the ground hard. The Doctor felt the T.A.R.D.I.S fall onto its side. He went to the doors and tired to open them. But Lisa’s body was stopping the doors from opening.
“Lisa,” said the Doctor.
“What daddy?” asked Lisa.
“Can you move?”
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Fall

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"I think so," she said.
Lisa slowly picked herself and the T.A.R.D.I.S up. The Doctor was still not too happy with what had happened.
“I’m sorry daddy,” said Lisa.
“Ok just don’t do it again,” replied the Doctor. “I don’t want you to hurt yourself. But you have to be careful of things like those. Your size means that you can cause a lot of damage."
"I'll remember."
"Ok."
The Doctor then went back inside and Lisa looked over a hill. She could see a city not too far away. She really wanted to go but at her size she would probably destroy it by accident. She didn't want the Doctor to be mad at her so she decided not to go. She sat down on a high hill and she thought for a moment. She still had the T.A.R.D.I.S in her hand .
"What can I do now?" thought Lisa. "I could get my Daddy a present or something like that. But where?"
She began to look around.

What does she see?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Be careful

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa eventually came up to a large lake. It seemed to look nice. But she wanted to cool down a little. She took off her flip flops and she put her huge feet into the water. It was cool and refreshing even though it was as shallow as a puddle to her. But she still was happy.
“What a nice little lake,” said Lisa. “If I was smaller I would have gone for a swim. Maybe one day.”
She sat there and moved her feet a little in the water. She could feel tiny little brush against her feet. This made her feel a little relaxed and she put the T.A.R.D.I.S onto her hand.
But eventually she felt tired and she gave out a huge yawn. She got up and put her flip flops back on. She looked to the T.A.R.D.I.S.
“Daddy,” she said.
Eventually the Doctor came out. “What is it?”
“Can I come back in now? I’m tired.”
“Ok just put the T.A.R.D.I.S back on the ground first.”
Lisa then gently put the T.A.R.D.I.S on the ground. The Doctor then got the ray gun out and fired it at his companion. This made her appear in the small dome.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Lake

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor took Lisa back to the Mind Room where he released her. She grew back up to full size and she just sat on her bed. She got changed into some night clothes. But before she went to sleep she wanted the Doctor in the Mind Room.
When she called him he went inside and she gave him a big hug and a kiss. She was still careful.
"Daddy can you tell me about pirates?" asked Lisa.
"Why would you want to know about pirates?" replied the Doctor.
"I don't know. They kind of interest me. I might even become a pilot when I'm a little older."
"Well pirates are bad people. Believe me I've met a few in my time. They rob from people and are ruthless. I know you're not like that."
"I'm not?"
"No you're the sweetest person I've ever seen. I don't want to see you going down a wrong path."
"Ok Daddy I won't."
"That's my girl."
The Doctor eventually left and Lisa went to sleep.

Will anything wake her?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Pirates

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Nothing woke Lisa up while she slept. She just came around at her own pace. But when she did she seemed to be happy as usual. She even had a nice warm shower before putting her clothes back on. But she felt her stomach and she was hungry. She started to imagine up some food and it came right in front of her.
“I better not have ice cream in the morning,” said Lisa. “Daddy wouldn’t be too happy about it.” She then imagined up some cereal and she began to eat it. That was the advantage of the mind room. She could create any food she wanted and she would eat it.
When she was finished she called for the Doctor. When he came in she picked him up and gave him a small hug.
“Hi Daddy,” she said.
“Hi Lisa did you have a nice sleep?” replied the Doctor.
“Yes I did Daddy. Where are we going today?”
“Well I thought we could have a little holiday.”
“Where to?”
“Spain.”
“What’s a Spain?”
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: A holiday?

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“Well it’s a country.”
“I can’t wait for the holiday Daddy,” said Lisa.
“Well neither can I,” replied the Doctor. “I think I’m going to send us somewhere where you can stretch those extra long legs of yours.”
“Where are we going in Spain?”
“It’s a surprise. Now dress yourself into something for warm weather.”
Lisa started to pick out clothes in excitement. She was trying to find if there were any that were going to be perfect. She decided to keep the same footwear since they were ideal for warm weather.
Eventually she got something out that seemed to be ideal. She had a white t-shirt and a pair of shorts. She looked at herself in the mirror.
The Doctor went to her a little later to see what she was wearing. he was happy to see that she had picked out the right outfit.
"That looks perfect," said the Doctor.
"Thanks Daddy," replied Lisa.
"Well we've landed in Spain."
"Yay our holiday's here."

Where do they go?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Holiday time

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The T.A.R.D.I.S landed on the Spanish coast. The Doctor left the T.A.R.D.I.S with Lisa in her dome. When they were out he smashed the glass dome and Lisa grew to her full size. She was very excited. She was jumping in excitement but this was causing a small earthquake.
“We’re on holiday,” said Lisa cheerfully.
“Calm down Lisa,” replied the Doctor. “You are making an Earthquake.”
“Oh sorry Daddy.” Lisa then stopped jumping and she picked up the Doctor. But he was like a spec on her finger tip. “What now?”
“I don’t know relax a little maybe even take a swim.”
“Ok.”
“What wait?”
Lisa then began to walk in the water. She took her flip flops off first and then she walked. The water seemed to be shallow to her. But the further it went it got slightly deeper.
“This water is too shallow Daddy.”
“Well it’ll get deeper believe me.”
“How much deeper?”
"About 3 miles."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Swim

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"That's very deep Daddy," said Lisa.
"I know so don't go particularly far" replied the Doctor. "I really don't want you to get hurt ok."
"Ok Daddy."
"That's my girl. Now you can have as much fun s you want."
"Good." She then felt something swimming around her ankles. She looked down and she picked it out of the water. It was a whale and she smiled at it.
"What is it Daddy?"
"That's a whale."
"Can I keep him please?"
"No Lisa it needs to be in the water. It needs to be free and it won't survive on the T.A.R.D.I.S."
"Ok Daddy." She then put it back into the water and it swam away. She was a little disappointed and she waved it goodbye. "Bye Mr. Whale."
"He'll be fine Lisa."
"I hope so."
"Well he is in an endangered species group."

What does Lisa do next?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Whale of a time

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“What’s an endangered species?” asked Lisa.
“Well it means that there are not many of them left,” replied the Doctor. “If they all die then the species becomes extinct.”
“They can’t all die.”
“Don’t worry they won’t.”
“Can I save them?”
“Not one individual no matter how big or powerful can’t save the species. It has to be a group effort.”
“Will they save them?”
“If everyone makes their contribution then they’ll be saved. But if not they will be extinct.”
“No they’re cute animals.”
”Well whales are very popular creatures. Mankind will probably save them.”
“I hope they do.”
Lisa then continued to walk in the sea. She hit her foot on something metal and she found a sunken ship.
“Another whale.”
"No that's a ship."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Extinction?

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa eventually came up to really deep water. This was where the sea could got down for miles and miles. She looked at it and she jumped a little in excitement. She couldn’t wait to go down.
“Can I swim down there Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“Yeah sure,” replied the Doctor.
“No I can’t.”
“Why not?”
“Well if I went too deep the pressure down there would kill me. But you at your size you’d be able to survive down there.”
“But I don’t want to go down without you. I’ll get scared.”
“Come on Lisa you’re a brave girl. You’ve seen scarier things and you’ve barely flinched at them.”
“Do you think I can do it?”
“Yeah sure. But if you do go down there I’ll need to have something so that I can float in the water.”
“Let me thing.” Lisa began to thin a little. But eventually se took off the bobble in her hair and she put it on the water. “There you go.”

Will it float
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Swim

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The bobble seemed to float nicely in the placid water. Lisa smiled as she put the Doctor onto it. To him it was the size of a boat. He was perfectly safe on there and no sea animal would be able to get to him.
"Are you going to be alright there Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Yeah I'll be fine," replied the Doctor.
"Ok I'll see you in a minute."
Lisa then dived into the deep part of the water. She began to go further down. She couldn't really see that much it was still very exciting for her. She couldn't breathe but she could hold her breath for a very long time.
She felt a few small fish hit her huge body. She couldn't see them but she could definitely hear and feel them. She found it quite relaxing and she just stayed there for a little while.
But then she began to run out of air so she swam back up to the surface to take a huge gasp of air. She couldn't see the Doctor anywhere. She began to panic a little.
"Daddy!" she shouted.
"Lisa," replied a Little voice.
"Where are you?"

“I’m over here,” said the Doctor.
“Where?” replied Lisa.
“To your left.”
Lisa then looked and she was able to see the Doctor. She was happy again and she picked the bobble out of the water. She then gently picked out the Doctor and she rested him in her hand.
“Are you alright Daddy?” she asked.
“Yeah I’m fine thank you,” replied the Doctor.
“You scared me.”
“Well you don’t have to be scared now. I’m here now and I always will be.”

“And I love you too. Now let’s get ourselves some ice cream.”

“Chocolate.”

Will they get back to Land?

Lisa then began to walk back to land. She was looking forward to the ice cream and she could taste it in/ But then a sea gull flew into her mouth and she accidentally swallowed him. She coughed a little.
"Are you alright Lisa?" asked the Doctor.
"I think I swallowed a bird Daddy," replied Lisa. "It didn't taste very nice."
"Well I wouldn't recommend eating them. Chicken, duck, goose or turkey. But definitely not sea gull."

"Ok daddy."
But by this time Lisa had reached land. She put the Doctor on the ground and then he took her inside the dome.

“Ok Daddy.”
The Doctor then took Lisa to the mind room. She was released from her dome and she instantly grew back up to full size. She looked at herself a little and then she picked up the Doctor. She had some difficulty seeing him.

Lisa then began to eat the ice cream she had. It was delicious and she didn't take too long to eat the entire thing to be completely gone. Lisa gave out a small burp and she blushed a little.
"Excuse me," she said in a pleasant voice. "What else can I imagine?"
"Well you can imagine anything," replied the Doctor.
"I have the perfect thing." She then closed her eyes and began to imagine. In a matter of seconds she had imagined a dolls house that was large enough for her to play with. She looked at the inside and she was amazed by the details. She let the Doctor come in and everything seemed huge to him. But he was in the dolls house of a girl that was a little short off a mile tall.

"Lisa your imagination is amazing."
"I know but I can imagine anything I want. I could give you a new chair." She imagined and a chair appeared right next to the Doctor.
"Looks very comfy."

Then he saw Lisa's huge hand come into the doll house and she picked him up. She brought him close to her eye so that she could see him properly.
"Are you comfy in there Daddy?" asked Lisa.

"I think you need a new hat."

"It's been a while since I wore a hat. But back then I also a long scarf."
"When was that?"
"Oh years ago before you even existed."
"That was a long time ago."
"Maybe to you but to me it felt only like yesterday."

Will the Doctor tell her anymore?

"Well it was when I was a different person," said the Doctor.

"How many times have you regen er regener?"

"Unfortunately no."

"No."

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: What am I?

They hugged for a few more minutes before Lisa put the Doctor on the bed. She imagined a freshly made pie and it appeared in his hands. He was surprised at first but he soon got over it.
"Thanks Lisa."

Will she make him another one?

While he was eating the pie Lisa gently picked him up and she rested him on the tip of her finger. She made sure that he was safe.

She lost thousands of feet in seconds and she put the Doctor on the ground and she shrank until they were eye level.
“Daddy I’m your height.”

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Normal Lisa

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
"I'm not a giant anymore," said Lisa. She was jumping in excitement. "I don't have to be in that dome any longer."
"I guess you don't," replied the Doctor.
Lisa then went to leave the Mind Room. but then she saw her hand go through first. But when it did it instantly grew back to full size. But when she brought it back in it went back to normal size.
"What's happening daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Seems that you're only normal size in the Mind Room," replied the Doctor. "Does make some sense."
"No it can't do this to me." Lisa then broke down onto the ground and she cried. The Doctor went to her.

“This is not a toy,” replied her Opponent. “This is a lethal weapon that is going to kill you easily.”
“No weapons are bad.” She then threw it as far as she could. “See no more weapon. Now you can’t hurt anyone.”

“I’m sure you can find another one.” She then laughed a little and she just sat there playing with him a little.

"You're fun."
"No I'm not doing any damgae."
"You're not trying to hurt me are you?"
"Yes that's exactly what I'm trying to do."
"Why would you do a mean thing like that?"
"Because that's the point of the match."
"Is it? I thought I just had to knock you down a little."
"Yes."
"Ok." She then put him on the ground and she flicked him over. She laughed a little. But she didn't realise just how much it hurt him."
"Now it's one." He picked up a weapon and tried to hurt her again/ But she just took it off of him.
"You're really trying aren't you?"

What happens?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Hurt?

Lisa played with him her opponent a little more. She wasn’t hurting him at all but he realised that he had absolutely no chance of success so he just raised his arms and looked at the referee.
“I surrender,” he said.
“Ok,” replied the Referee.
The bell then rang and Lisa just sat there for a minute. She wasn’t sure what had just happened and she looked around.
“Here is your champion,” said the Announcer. “Lisa.”
“I-I won?” she replied. She then smiled. “I won.” She then stood up and she jumped up and down again. “I’m the champ.”
“Can you put me down please?” replied her Opponent.
“Oops sorry.” She then smiled at him and she put him down on the ground. He then walked away from her.
But Lisa was still happy. She was given a trophy and the prize gold that she had been after. She could now get her father back.
“I can get my daddy back,” she sang. “I can get my Daddy back.” She picked up Joe and skipped away.

Lisa now had a little problem. She didn’t know how to contact the group to get her father back. This upset her and she sat down in a field. She crossed her legs and she rested Joe in her hand.
“I have the gold but now I want my daddy back,” said Lisa. She then shed a large tear. “I really miss him.”

“I guess they will. The last thing you can do now is to lose hope. You’re on the verge of victory here.”

“Then I like this game.”

When will they show up?

Just then more began to appear. The gentle giantess began to get a little nervous and she stood up to her full height. She looked around and she saw more and more come. She soon realised that this was the gang again.

Is he lying?

Where does she go?

Now back in the Mind Room with Lisa and the Doctor.

Who do we stay with?

Will they see anything else?

"Greetings customer," he said. "Your Salveton model 24543 is getting close to its expiration date. We are already preparing a replacement to be sent to you automatically. If you do not wish the replacement and want to end the contract please contact us."
"What?" replied the Doctor.
He couldn't believe that Lisa was actually dying."

What will the Doctor do?

What does he do?

"Then what do you want?" asked the Alien.
"I want you to do whatever you can to save Lisa," replied the Doctor.
"Who?"

"Strange it is veyr rare that anyone gives a name to their slave drone. Has she done all the work you've wanted."

"Save her."
"That's quite impossible. We put a limited lifespan on each model so that it expires and we can sell the next brand."

“Not that I know of. The only thing you can do is get yourself a replacement. But obviously you don’t want one of those.”
The Doctor disappointingly left. He turned around and left the building. He knew that there was nothing here that could help him. He went into the T.A.R.D.I.S and he made it leave the planet.
No sooner had he done this he went to the Mind Room. Lisa was already in there and she was still lying in her bed dying. The Doctor could only comfort her as best as he could. But he saw Lisa smiling.

What does she do?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Lisa is happy

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“I love you daddy,” said Lisa. “You always took care of me. Right from when I was tiny until I was really big.”

“Because you never did anything naughty.”
“I love you Daddy.”
Lisa then gave the Doctor a kiss and then she lay back on her bed. Her eyes closed her breathing stopped. The Doctor shed a tear as he realised his companion was dead. He began to sob as he watched her body degrade into dust. All that was left of her was her clothes.
Almost instantly the Mind Room changed back into the empty room it had once been. The Doctor was still crying.
He eventually got up and took Lisa’s clothes away. He left the Mind Room and closed the door behind him. All he could do was sit on his chair and think. He remembered all the times he had with Lisa.
“Goodbye Lisa,” he said.

""Yeah sure."
"Thank you."
"Watch this."
The Doctor then blew a high pitch whistle and one of the dinosaurs looked down at him. It then lowered its head and Lisa got very excited. She looked over to the Doctor and she smiled.
"How did you do that?" she asked.
"I just whistled at the frequency of their brains," replied the Doctor. "Now you can stroke it if you want."
"Really?"
"Sure it's safe."
Lisa then began to stroke the dinosaur's head. She enjoyed this greatly and she giggled while she did this.
"His skin is funny."
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Stroke

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa enjoyed stroking the dinosaurs. They seemed to be friendly. She didn’t do anything to hurt it. She just wanted to stroke it. She was smiling all the time. It was like a dream come true to her.
“Thank you for this Daddy,” said Lisa.
“You’re welcome Lisa,” replied the Doctor.
Just then they heard a loud roar. The Dinosaurs quickly brought their heads back up to see what was happening. They began to move away and this upset Lisa a little. She wanted them to stay.
“Don’t go,” said Lisa.
“Lisa I think we should go,” replied the Doctor.
No sooner had he said that a large predator came into view. It roared at them and this scared them a little. They began to run away and it ran after them. But then Lisa saw the Doctor. This made her stop running and she turned around to the dinosaur. She didn’t move an inch.
“Lisa come on,” said the Doctor.
“You’re not hurting my daddy,” replied Lisa. “You’re just a big bully.” She then began to glow a little.

What does Lisa do?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Danger

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“Lisa come on,” said the Doctor.
But then he saw her begin to grow again. She seemed to be angry and she was standing her ground. In a matter of seconds she was 30 feet tall.
“No one tires to hurt my Daddy!” she said.
When the dinosaur reached her she dropped her teddy and she grabbed it by its neck. She began to choke it and she raised it up into the air. In a swift move she threw it to the ground and then there was a loud cracking noise. The dinosaur didn’t move after that and Lisa looked at the Doctor.
“Are you alright Daddy?”
“Yes I’m fine,” replied the Doctor.
“Good.” She then picked up her teddy and she walked towards him. She shrank while she did this until she was down to her previous height. She then gave the Doctor a big hug. “I love you Daddy.”
“I love you too Lisa.”
But now the Doctor had realised that Lisa was capable of destruction. But he had also noticed that it was to protect him. He hoped that she wouldn’t have to do anything like that to protect him.
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Lisa can destroy

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa seemed to be unfazed with what she had done. All she did was hug the Doctor and her teddy bear. But the Doctor realised what would happen if Lisa ever got angry. She had the potential to destroy everything around her. But the Doctor hoped that he could teach her otherwise.
“What now Daddy?” asked Lisa. “Can we see those long necks again? They were so darn cute.”
“Well maybe you’d like to see another dinosaur,” replied the Doctor.
“Will it be like the one who tried to eat you?”
“No it won’t be.”
“Ok.”
“Good now follow me.”
The Doctor began to walk away and Lisa followed him. She was very excited to see what dinosaur he was taking her to see next.
“What’s next?” asked Lisa.
“It’s a surprise,” replied the Doctor.
“Please tell me.”
“I can’t.”

What do they see next?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: What next?

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
The Doctor and Lisa then began to walk. They walked for a few minutes until they heard another groaning noise. Lisa thought that it was going to be another huge predator. But in the fields she saw a Stegosaurus. She didn’t know how to react. It was either excitement or concern for the Doctor.
“Are they dangerous?” asked Lisa.
“Yes and no,” replied the Doctor. “If we keep our distance and don’t startle it then we’re perfectly safe.”
“What is it?”
“That’s a Stegosaurus.”
“It looks funny.”
“You may think so. It’s an amazing creature. The only downside it has is that it has a very tiny brain.”
“How small is it?”
“As small as a peanut.”
“Is that small?”
“Very small.”
“I take it that it isn’t too smart.”
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Stegosaurs

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
“Can I stroke it?” asked Lisa.
“I’d advise against that,” replied the Doctor. “It could see you as an attack and it would try to kill you.”
“I don’t want to die.”
“I know you don’t but if you keep your distance you should be fine. But I don’t think you should get any closer than this.”
“Later can we see something that I can hug?”
“Yeah sure.”
They both watched the Stegosaurus eat. But then it looked towards them. It had never seen them before so it automatically thought that they were a threat. Lisa began to get a little scared.
“What now?” asked Lisa.
“Running would be a good idea,” replied the Doctor.
They both then began to run away from the Stegosaurus. Lisa was a little scared but she didn’t panic or anything like that.
“It’s gaining on us,” said Lisa.
“Then we’ll have to confuse it.”

What do they do?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Danger

Lisa wasn’t sure what to do. She felt like growing to stop the rampaging Stegosaurus. But she didn’t really want to hurt this one. She just picked up the Doctor under her arm and she began to run.
“What are you doing Lisa?” asked the Doctor.
“Getting you away from here Daddy,” replied Lisa.
“Ok but don’t run straight forward.”
“Why not?”
“It can be difficult for an animal that size to run to the side.”
“Ok Daddy.”
Lisa then took a turn and completely wrong footed the Stegosaurus. She then hid behind some bushes in hopes that he would leave. She waited there for a moment and the Stegosaurus went away.
“Is it gone?” asked Lisa.
“I think so,” replied the Doctor.
She then stood up and put the Doctor on the ground. She kept her Teddy close to her and she smiled a little.
“I saved you daddy.”

“I don’t know.”
“Please I’ll be a good girl.”
“Ok but just one more.”
“Thank you daddy.”
The pair then began to walk around a little. They were trying to find a good place to see a dinosaur. But then Lisa felt something on her shoulder. She was about to brush it away but then she saw what it was. It was a small flying reptile.
“Daddy look,” she said.
The Doctor looked and he was able to see the small reptile. Lisa began to stroke it a little. She seemed happy.
“I think he likes you,” said the Doctor.
“Yay.”


Will she scare it away?
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Continue

1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.content:
Lisa began to gently stroke the small reptile. It seemed to like it and it stayed on her shoulder. Lisa was also enjoying having it there. It made her feel warm inside and she smiled at it.
“Aren’t you just cute,” she said.
“I love you,” replied a Voice.
“Did you just talk to me?”
“No it is I the Doctor doing my voice.”
Lisa then turned a little and she could see the Doctor giggling. She put her hands on her hips and shook her head.
“Daddy!” said Lisa.
“Sorry I couldn’t help it,” replied the Doctor.
“That was a cruel trick.”
“No it wasn’t. I just thought you would have liked to talk to it. Just use your imagination and pretend its not me talking.”
“Ok.” She then turned her head back to the reptile. “And what’s your name?”
“Ralph.”
“Hello Ralph I’m Lisa.”
1522212121212112212111121111112111121111.title: Pet

“Can I keep him Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“Unfortunately no,” replied the Doctor.
“But why?”
“Because this is where he belongs. This is his natural habitat and I think he’d be a lot happier here.”
“I guess so.”
“Besides I think it would screw the balance of time if we took him.”
“Ok Daddy.”
Good girl. Now we best be going.”
“Ok.”
The flying reptile soon flew off her shoulder and went away. Although she was disappointed at this she still waved goodbye. She smiled while she did this and she continued to fly.
“Bye,” she said.

“Ok Daddy.”
They both began the walk back to the T.A.R.D.I.S

Will anything happen on the way?

He then pointed to a bar. There were some cables on it and she looked at it. She took a step towards it.
“Ok Lisa I want you to lift this thing up,” said the Doctor.

Lisa then easily picked up the bar and the Doctor typed something into the computer and the bar got heavier. But Lisa didn’t notice it.
“What now Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“I’m increasing the weight.” He then doubled the weight. “Feel anything?”
“No.”

“No Daddy.”

Will she get any more?

The Doctor continued to increase the weight of the bar. But Lisa was unmoved by it. She was still holding it up in the air as if it was weightless. She looked over to the Doctor and she smiled.

“Yes its ten tons,” replied the Doctor.
“I don’t feel a thing.”
“I didn’t realize that you were this strong.”
“How strong am I?”
“Stronger then any being I’ve ever seen.”
As the weight continued to increase Lisa still didn’t feel anything. She just stood there and held it up as best as she could. But eventually it reached it maximum of 100 tons and she still felt nothing.

“Can you put the bar down please?”
“Ok Daddy.”
She then gently put it on the ground.

152221212221111122111112.content:

She sees a passage way. Feeling she had nothing to loose she took it. The passage itself was dark and this made her afraid. But her love for the Doctor overpowered her fear of the dark. She pressed on. Eventually she got to a place where it was a low ceiling (To her). She had to bend down to go through. She felt lucky she didn't have another growth spurt or else she would have been in trouble. Eventually she found herself in a large almost empty room. She hadn't noticed the Doctor chained to the wall.
"Lisa I'm over here," called the Doctor.
Then she turned around and saw him. She started to run towards him.
"Daddy I've found you."
"Yes you have. My haven't you grown. It felt like only yesterday you were 5 inches tall. Oh wait it was only yesterday. Now do me a favour. Get my sonic screwdriver from out of my pocket."
"Your what daddy?"
"You'll know when you find it."
Lisa goes into his pocket and gets out the sonics screwdriver. It was very small compared to her. "Now what?"
"Now point it at the chain around my arms and legs and push the button." Lisa did so and the Doctor was free. "Good girl."
She then picks up the Doctor and hugs him. "Oh Daddy I thought I lost you forever."

1522212122211111221111121.content:
"That's great," said the Doctor. "But we need to get back to the T.A.R.D.I.S and quick. They're on their way to colonise the planet. And if they do millions if not trillions will die."

The Doctor points to a corridor. "That way."
They run down the corridor and they eventually they get to the T.A.R.D.I.S. The Doctor goes through the doors but Lisa is having a little more trouble.
"Daddy I'm too big to fit."
"Come on Lisa you can do it." The Doctor grabs her arm and tries to pull her in. Lisa is pushing the door so she could get in. After a few minutes Lisa was able to get in. She then stood up to her full height.
"At least I can still stand up in here Daddy."
"Yeah but for how long? Anyway we need to go right now." He fumbles with controls and the T.A.R.D.I.S lands on the other planet.

Plus to my right you have one of the sweetest not so little girls in the universe. But some of you may have seen wht happens when she gets mad."

His injury then healed. "Ah that's better. Now for you." he gets another device out of his pocket. It was round and it had a red button on top of it and a small scope.
"What's that Daddy?"
"This is a little something I picked up while on the Yonkon home world. It should help you." He shoots it and a blue ray hits Lisa.

Lisa starts to walk to the mind room. The door was too small. But when she touched it, it grew until it was right for her. When she walked into her room everything seemed the same. The room grew when she did so everything looked normal. She went to her bed and went fast asleep.

A little later Lisa woke up. Then the Doctor came into her room. He was still the same size and to him everything was huge. He carried a book with him.

He takes her over to her huge desk and chair. Lisa picked him up and sat him on the table.
"Ok what now."
"We'll go for the basics." He gets a pen and paper. And writes the alphabet in huge letters. "Ok this is the alphabet. These are the letters that make up words. And words make up sentences. Understand?"

"A."
"Good." he points to the B. "Now B."
"Err B."
"You're doing great."

What happens next?

A little while later the Doctor had finished teaching Lisa the alphabet. Now he wanted to teach her how to write. He got an over sized piece of paper and made several dots on it.
"Ok Lisa," said the Doctor. "Now what I want you to do is to join each dot together. You must connect them to the closest dot. And there are four different groups of dots to connect. So begin."
Lisa got her over-sized pencil and started to connect the dots. It didn't take her long. When she had connected the dots they spelt Lisa.
"Finished Daddy," said Lisa.
"Good now read to me what you just spelt."
"Ok. L-I-S-A. Lisa."

Where were they?

The T.A.R.D.I.S had landed in some sort of jungle.

"What is an Amazon?"
"It's a River. Now just wait here a second." The Doctor walks out of the T.A.R.D.I.S doors. He walks a couple of steps. Then he gets the teleporting device from his hand. He pushes the green button and Lisa appears next to him. Her head hit a branch of a tree.
"Ouch!"

"Trees Lisa."

What does Lisa say?

The Doctor then left. Lisa looked up and saw some birds fly past. To her this was her own heaven. Everything seemed peaceful. She even started to sing to herself. But then suddenly she heard a noise in the bushes.
"Is that you Daddy?" There was no answer. "Ok daddy now you're really starting to scare me."

Is it the Doctor?

Then Lisa felt a sharp pain in her neck. She quickly found that a dart had struck her. She quickly go it out and threw it to the floor. She then stood up to her full height. Then some natives came out of the bushes. One of them was carrying a wooden blow pipe.

They didn't answer. This made her angry. But she started to feel heavy. Eventually she fell over. The natives quickly moved so they didn't get crushed. Then she fell unconscious. The native started to crowd around her.

Then all the natives with great difficulty pick up Lisa and carry her away.
About an hour later the Doctor returned. He was surprised to see Lisa had vanished.
"I tell to stay and what does she do she wonders off," said the Doctor. He looks at the ground to see if he could see where she had gone. he saw her gigantic footprints. But he was disturbed to see many other footprints. At least an extra ten individuals. "Wait a minute that can't be right."

"Looks like they took a boat. With any luck there should be another one somewhere around here." He has a look and he sees a boat. "Bingo."

Will the Doctor get there in time to stop the ritual

"Oh Great Goddess Ekanti," said the Priest. "We give you this young woman to be your host so you may live again."
"Daddy please help me," said Lisa. "Daddy help me."

She walked up to the Doctor. Then she grabbed him by the neck and raised him to her eye level. "Hmm Lisa? That must be the name of my body. And let me see. From this body I have her memories. Ah you're the Doctor."
"Who are you?"
"I am the Ekanti and now you must die Doctor."

He looks at the alien bios he has. He was researching aliens who hijacked bodies. He found several. But when he wanted to find the word Ekanti he came up with only one match.
The Ekanti was supposed to be a being of eternal life. She uses hosts to live and when her host dies she finds another suitable one. As yet there is no known way for her to exit the body.

What kind of reward do they get
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Implode

A little later the Doctor and Lisa were in front of a huge crowd on stage. The Doctor sat on Lisa's shoulder and the Ruler was by her huge foot. When he was about to talk she put the Doctor on the ground and she squatted down.
"Doctor for saving our planet," said the Ruler. "I give you this."
The ruler gives the Doctor a wrist band that had a small dial on it.
"What's this?" asked the Doctor.
"Give it to Lisa." The Doctor did so. When Lisa held onto it, it grew until it was large enough to fit her wrist. "Now put it on and turn the dial all the way to the left."
Lisa did so. Then she began to shrink. She shrank until she was a few inches taller than the Doctor.
"Hey I shrank," said Lisa.
"Now turn it all the way to the right." She did so and she grew all the way back up to 100 feet. "Now turn it half way." She did and she shrank down to 50 feet. "What you have there is a size changing watch. it's designed to shrink whoever wears it."

What is the mayor discussing?

The Doctor saw Lisa fighting a Godzilla like monster. It equaled her size and strength but it had deadly extras.

What happens next?

"Ok now let's just see where this leads me," said the Doctor.
He walks down the tunnel. It seemed to be endless but he just kept going.
Meanwhile above ground Lisa was becoming very worried. The one thing she hated most was being away from the Doctor. All she could think of was him getting hurt. It was driving her insane.
Back in the tunnels the Doctor continued his journey. Eventually he comes into a large room.

What is in it?

The Doctor saw many machines. Each one was so high-tech he would have expected to find it on the T.A.R.D.I.S. In fact they were things you'd get in a T.A.R.D.I.S. Who gets hit?

What happens next?

Just then while he was trying to do the instructions there was a huge explosion that knocked the Doctor back. When he got back up he saw a a glowing light that seemed like a rip. then he was horrified to see 5 Daleks come through.

The Doctor helps her get them working again

the Doctor hadn't aged and he hadn't regenerated. he was missing Lisa and couldn't wait for her to wake up.

What do they do?

Where do they go next?

When the Doctor came back with the ice cream he nearly dropped them when he saw her. This was the first time he had seen a giantess since she had gone into a coma. He was able to stop himself from dropping the ice cream.

Lisa then shrinks herself back down to the smallest she could be. She then starts to eat the ice-cream. The Doctor was enjoying having her around again. He had deeply missed her.
Lisa enjoyed eating her ice-cream. Although it bought back memories of what had happened in Blackpool but she put it out of her mind and just licked the ice-cream.
