choices: A member of the royal family
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Eventually the T.A.R.D.I.S appears in the Middle Ages. The Doctor and Lisa both get out and see the forests of a by gone age. Here there were bears, wolves and Beavers (All extinct in Britain).
"Where are we Daddy?" asked Lisa.
From the smell of the air I'll say we're in Cambridge," replied the Doctor. "He takes another whiff. "In 1254. Great year that was."
"Are we still in England?"
"Yes but at a different time. It's very good here at this time. Just under a century before the Black Death."
"What's the Black Death Daddy?"
"Let's just say it wasn't very nice. But it hasn't happened yet so we don't have to worry. And I must warn you. Don't use your growing powers because people at this time were very superstitious."
"Ok Daddy I won't use them unless it's an emergency."
"Good girl."
"Now can we have more Ice-Cream?"
"Sorry Ice Cream hasn't been invented yet."
"Shame."
"These guys don't even have potatoes."

Who pops up?

Just then they saw a man with a bow and arrow came out of the woods. he was the Doctor's height with blond hair and blue eyes. The instant he saw them he readied himself.
"Who are you?" he asked. "And why do you dress strangely?
"I'm the Doctor and this is my companion Lisa," replied the Doctor.
"Hi," said Lisa.
The hunter stared up at her. "She's the tallest person I've ever seen," he said.
"She likes her milk," replied the Doctor.
"Now state your business here."
"We're just visiting here. We mean you and your people no harm."
"How do I know you're not lying?"
"You don't but we can still trust each other."
The Hunter looked the Doctor in the eye. Lisa was a little worried. But then the Hunter put his bow and arrow down.
"So where are you from?"
"Let's put it like this. We're from a place a long way away from here."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The Hunter

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"What are you doing here?" asked the Hunter.
"We're just visiting," replied the Doctor.
"Come to my village. We will make your visit very pleasant."
The Hunter then takes the Doctor and Lisa to his village. Everyone couldn't get over Lisa's height. But the Doctor everyone that she could get a lot bigger. She felt a shiver run down her spine. At first she expected to have another growth spurt. But when nothing happened she put it out of her mind.
In the village the Doctor and Lisa stayed at an inn. The Doctor had the money they needed. But they needed a room with three beds because they had to put two together for Lisa.
The next morning when they woke up they found no one in the inn. When they went outside there was no one there.
"Where is everyone Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"I don't know. They may still be asleep still."
"I didn't know people slept to this late."
"Usually they don't I've got a strange feeling."
"Maybe they're just hiding Daddy. We just have to go around and find them."

What does the Doctor say?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Missing people

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Somehow Lisa I don't think that they're hiding," said the Doctor.
"Then where are they?" replied Lisa.
"I'm not sure."
"Do you think I might have scared them away?"
"No you're too small to do that." Then an idea popped into his head. "Lisa can you grow to full size and see if you can see anyone?"
"Ok Daddy." The Doctor stepped back as his companion began to grow up to her full size. When she was more than 100 times her size she looked around and saw nothing. "I can't see anyone Daddy."
"Thanks just shrink down and we'll come up with something else."
She then shrank down to her near normal size. She was still a little confused. But she knew that the Doctor would figure something out eventually.
"So what now Daddy?"
"We look for any clues of their disappearance. If we find anything that would give us a lead."
"You mean like that?"
She pointed to an alien like footprint in the floor. The Doctor examined it.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: No one's there

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"What is it Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"I recognise it somewhere," replied the Doctor. "From the looks of it, it was made by an alien from the Neutron region."
"The what?"
"Far away from here."
"What's it doing here?"
"A very good question Lisa. If I had a sweet you would have just earned it."
The Doctor looked at the footprint. He still wasn't too sure exactly which species it was.
"Daddy do you think we should follow them?"
"Sounds like the best thing to do for now. But we have to be very careful."
"Got it."
The Doctor and Lisa then begin to follow the footprints. Eventually they found another pair. This showed them that there was more than one of these aliens.
Lisa was a little nervous. The Doctor denied her request to grow. If she did then it would have given their position away.

Will they find anything?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Follow the prints

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Eventually after following the tracks they find themselves in the bushes near a huge spaceship. There seemed to be a company logo on the side of it. And it looked like it was a zoo ship.
"What is it Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"I have an idea what it is," replied the Doctor. "These guys are taking the humans away and putting them in a zoo."
"What's a zoo?"
"A place where you go and see animals in captivity. Not really a place for humans."
"So what are we gonna do?"
"Nothing yet. We don't know who's behind this yet. If they're dangerous then we need to take extreme caution. If not then we should be alright."
The Doctor and Lisa then see some Yonkons walking past talking to each other. The Doctor couldn't believe that they were back and kidnapping people. Lisa still remembered her first adventure with the Doctor against the Yonkons. They still gave her some nightmares. She wanted to grow and stomp the hell out of them but she knew that the Doctor wouldn't want her to do that yet.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The return of the Yonkons

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor and Lisa stuck their way onto the ship. They saw all the humans locked up in cages. The Doctor used his sonic screwdriver to free everyone. They all ran out of the ship causing mass panic.
The Yonkons didn't know what was happening. Then they saw the Doctor and Lisa coming out of the ship.
"Hey you released the animals," said a Yonkon.
"Did we?" replied the Doctor. "I guess we did."
"For that you and your companion will die."
The Yonkons went to attack but Lisa grew to 60 feet and stood in front of the Doctor. The Yonkons stopped in fear. They remembered a tail about a giant woman defeating the Yonkon army and they figured it was Lisa.
"You do not threaten to hurt my Daddy," said Lisa. "DO YOU UNDERSTAND!"
"Yes ma'am."
"Good now get back onto your ship."
The Yonkons do as they were told. When they did get on Lisa grew to her maximum size and picked up the ship. She then threw in it back into space. After that she shrank back do to be with the Doctor.
"Did I do well Daddy?"
"Yeah did marvelous," replied the Doctor.

What do they do now?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Yes ma'am

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"So what now?" asked Lisa.
"If you want to we could stay here for the rest of the day," replied the Doctor.
"I'd like that."
The Doctor and Lisa went back to the village where they were before. When everyone saw them they cheered. To them they were heroes.
"They saved us from the beasts," said a random person. "They're heroes."
The Doctor had had a few crowds like this. But this was the first for Lisa. She blushed a little and smiled.
The village had a great feast to celebrate their freedom. Lisa was eating more than they could give her. She just said that she was a growing girl. The Doctor ate like he usually did. He ate enough to fill himself up.
But after the feast they went back to the T.A.R.D.I.S and then left the time period. Lisa went to her room and went to bed. Obviously she gave the Doctor a hug and a kiss first.
The Doctor himself stayed up for a while and looked at some charts.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Feast

choices: They are waiting for their Goddess to appear
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
When Lisa woke up the next morning she had a shower and she washed her clothes. When she left her room she found the Doctor looking at some old relics. he goes over to him and stands over him.
"What's that Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Well these are ancient Egyptian artifacts," replied the Doctor.
"Wants an Egyptian?"
"It's anything from Egypt. And Egypt is a country on Earth that is rich in history."
"Can we go there?"
"Sure." the Doctor goes over to the controls and sets a course to Egypt 3,000 BC. "Now Lisa you might have to wear some more appropriate wear."
"What's wrong with these clothes?"
"You won't really fit in. Just go to the clothes chamber and get some Egyptian clothes."
"Yes Daddy."
Lisa then goes to the Clothes chamber and gets herself the right clothes. This consisted of a white dress and strapped sandals. She put her other clothes to one side. She knew she was gonna put them back on later on.

What happening in Egypt?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: To Egypt

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
In Egypt the country was sad due to the passing of their beloved Queen. But they had a prophesy about their next Queen. It said that their next Queen would be very tall and would come from the stars.
The high Priest was at his alter telling the people about their new Queen. Then suddenly they saw the T.A.R.D.I.S appear right next to him. They all were ready to attack when the Doctor came out. But when Lisa came out of the T.A.R.D.I.S everyone bowed down to her.
"Our new Queen has arrived," said the Priest.
"All hail the new Queen," said everyone.
The Doctor and Lisa look at each other. "What's a Queen Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"I'll tell you later," replied the Doctor. I've parked in the wrong place let's go."
The Priest held onto Lisa's arm. He wouldn't let go and she was confused.
"You can not leave my Queen," he said.
"Maybe I'm not your Queen," replied Lisa. "What ever that is."
"But the Prophecy foretells the Queen having a magic power."
"You mean like this?"
Lisa then turned the dial and she grew to 60 feet. Now everyone was convinced that she was the New Queen.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Queen Lisa?

choices: Tells the Guards to release the Doctor
Tries to convince Lisa that it's for the best (Bad idea)
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa smiled as the people bowed to her. She didn't realise why they were doing it. To her they just looked funny.
"You little people are very funny," said Lisa.
"Shrink Lisa," said the Doctor.
"But Daddy."
"I said shrink."
"Ok Daddy."
Lisa then shrinks down to her super tall height. But the Egyptians still bowed to her. The Doctor stepped in front of her.
"People Lisa is not your Queen she is just a young woman and her size changing isn't magic."
The Priest got back to his feet. If looks could kill the Doctor would be dead and buried.
"If not magic then what is it?" asked the Priest.
"Technology."
"I will not listen to your foolish comments any longer. Guards take him away."
The guards grabbed the Doctor and began to drag him away. Lisa saw this and turned to the Priest.
"Release my Daddy," said Lisa.
"But your highness."
"Release him now or else I'll do something I'll regret later."

What does the Priest do?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: She's not  a Queen

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Priest gives the sign to the guard and he releases the Doctor. Lisa runs over to him and gives him a big hug. She then looked at the Priest.
"Remember this no one hurt's my Daddy," said Lisa. "Got it?"
"Yes your highness," replied the Priest.
"Good."
The Doctor couldn't believe that Lisa was talking like a Queen. He thought maybe she was the Queen that had been promised. But then he thought that she couldn't be a Queen. She was just a young woman. Besides he couldn't stay here and he knew that Lisa couldn't be away from him even for a second.
The Priest then got Lisa to her feet. Then he led her to her throne where she sat on it. It was a little small for her but she had to make do.
The people bowed down to her and she found it humorous. But she still didn't know why they were doing it.
Lisa ordered that the Doctor was to be safe and with her at all times. The guards had no choice to do what she wanted or else they would suffer her wrath.
But all in all Lisa was very gentle and big hearted. But there was still some thought whether she would stay Queen or not.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The Doctor is released

choices: There is an assassination attempt on Lisa
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor and Lisa were forced to stay in Egypt for a few days. They were stopped at every attempt they had of leaving. But they did treat them like royalty. Lisa was given the best clothes and food available.
Lisa did do a little something for the slaves of Egypt. She finished building a pyramid they were building and she freed them.
This displeased many of the high priests but they didn't have anything that could stop her. They knew that her weakness was the Doctor but getting them apart was few and far between. They also knew if they put the Doctor at risk Lisa would go into a rampage.
We see Lisa sitting on a throne and the Doctor is standing right next to her. Even sitting down and at minimum height she was still taller than him.
"You know we can't stay here," said the Doctor.
"I know Daddy but it's not too bad here," replied Lisa. "It's warm and I'm getting a healthy brown tan."
"That's all good but I fear you're upsetting some people."
"Did I do something wrong?"
"No you did something right. It's just that they didn't like you doing it."
"That's their problem not mine."

What happens?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Freeing slaves

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
A few days later we see some cooks making Lisa some dinner. It was food fit for a Queen. But one of the chefs added an extra more deadly ingredient.
When the meal was done it was taken to Lisa. She was still sitting on her throne and she was giving her blessings to some people. When she was given the food she felt that it seemed a little strange.
Just before she took a bite and bird swooped down and took a piece of meat. But when it had eaten it the bird dropped out of the sky and died. The Doctor saw this and stood up.
"Lisa don't eat it," said the Doctor. "It's poisoned."
"Poisoned?" replied Lisa. "They tried to kill me?"
"Yes Lisa."
"But why?"
"Let's find out."
Lisa stood up from her throne and went to the high Priest's temple. He was there expecting to hear news of thee Queen's death but instead he saw Lisa himself. He couldn't believe his eyes.
"Your highness," said the Priest.
"Don't you your high ness me. You tried to kill me." Lisa then used her wrist device to increase her size to make herself seem more scary.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Poison

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"You never threaten me like that again," said Lisa. "Or my Daddy. And if you do I'll."
Lisa lifted her fist. But then the Doctor got in the way and Lisa stopped.
"Daddy what are you doing?"
"Don't kill him. It'll solve nothing."
"But he tried to kill me."
"He was only misguided. Now just calm down and we'll leave this place. How does that sound?"
"Fine Daddy." She then shrank until she was the smallest she could become.
The Doctor then held her hand and he led her to the T.A.R.D.I.S. The Doctor had noticed that Lisa had changed a little when she became Queen. But he knew that power like that would corrupt her. He just hoped that she would return to normal.
When they got onto the T.A.R.D.I.S Lisa got back into her normal clothes and then she went to her mind room. She sat on her bed and started to read a book that was for children. She was still getting the hang of reading. She remembered what it was like to be a queen. A small part of her wanted to be queen again. But the other part knew what would happen.
Eventually she switched off her lights and the mini giantess went to sleep.

Where does the T.A.R.D.I.S go now?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Leaving Egypt

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
When Lisa woke up she left the mind room and went to the Doctor. She gave him a morning hug and even a little kiss.
"Good morning Daddy," said Lisa.
"Good morning Lisa did you sleep well?" asked the Doctor.
"Yes thank you. And where are we going now?"
"Well I was thinking Liverpool on the 12th March 2007."
"Why there and then?"
"Why not. Nothing interesting happened on that day."
"Ok Daddy. Do I need to get changed again?"
"No keep what you've got on that should be fine."
The Doctor started to work with the controls and the T.A.R.D.I.S began to shake. Lisa grabbed onto something so she wouldn't fall over.
A few minutes later the shaking stopped and Lisa let go off the bars she was holding onto. She looked at them and saw that they had been bent out of shape. She looked at her hands and then she looked at the Doctor.
"Everything alright?" asked the Doctor.
"Yes Daddy I'm fine," replied Lisa.
"Good then let's get going."
The Doctor and Lisa leave the T.A.R.D.I.S and go into the streets of Liverpool.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Bent bars

Lisa was almost run over a few times and she had some harsh language thrown at her. She would ask the Doctor what they meant. But he would tell her that it was best not knowing.
They went into clothes shop to have a look around. Lisa couldn't believe how small all the clothes were. Unfortunately they didn't have anything in her size.
Everything seemed to be normal in Liverpool. The Doctor was glad to go to one place where there was no World wide threat happening. It also gave Lisa some good experience with people.
Just then Lisa saw someone disappear into thin air. She went over to the spot and found nothing. She was a little freaked and she went to the Doctor.
"Daddy I just saw someone disappear," said Lisa.
"Where about?"
"It was near here. They were there one minute and gone the next."
"Strange. I'll take a look."
The Doctor goes to the spot where the person had disappeared. He started to make an analysis.

Does he find anything?

The Doctor examined the spot for a while but he found nothing. He thought Lisa might have been seeing things. He chuckled a little.
"Good joke Lisa," said the Doctor.
"I wasn't joking Daddy," replied Lisa. "That person really did disappear."
"Well I can't find anything that supports your theory. There's no energy signal, no DNA and no footprints."
"But I did see it."
"Well maybe you're seeing things. Maybe the Egyptians gave you something that's messing your eyesight?"
"Maybe Daddy."
"Ok now let's just have a look around here and I'll look at your eyes later."
"Ok."
Lisa and the Doctor look around the shop a little more. But when they left Lisa saw someone in the street disappear. She immediately told the Doctor.
"Daddy someone else disappeared."
"Are you sure this time?"
"Yes I'm sure."
"Ok let's take a look."

???:I am known to the universe as the last of the ancients ascended or otherwise. But I am known as Peter.

Ghost Rider:Everyone in the universe who serves any darkness knows and fears him. They say he's the most powerful being in existance.


Peter:I ascended to a higher plane of existance. Bu since this new threat all of the universe appeared I chose to resume my physical form to help save the universe. Come we have much to discuss.

Lisa:Come where?

Suddenly everything is englufed in a white light.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The last of the ancients

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa found herself in a room with lots of advanced Technology. But she had seen more advanced on the T.A.R.D.I.S. Ghost Rider and Ronan were also there.
Peter walked up to her. He was slightly taller than the average man but compared to Lisa he was a midget.
"We'll need all the help we can get if we're gonna defeat this evil," said Peter. He saw Lisa close to tears. "What's wrong? Are you afraid?"
"No I'm not afraid," replied Lisa wiping away the tears. "I just wish that my Daddy was here."
Peter's hands began to glow. "I have located the being you call Daddy. hmm a Time Lord I thought they were extinct."
The Doctor then appeared. He looked around to see where he was. But the next thing he knew Lisa was hugging him.
"Daddy you're here," said Lisa.
"How did I get here?" asked the Doctor.
"That was my doing," replied Peter. He walked closer to the Doctor.
"Wow an ancient. I thought you guys were all extinct."
"Like I thought all of the Time Lords were."
The Doctor looks up at Lisa who is still hugging him. "Err Lisa you can put me down now."

Will she?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The Last Ancient and Time Lord

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Oh sorry Daddy," said Lisa. She then put the Doctor back on the ground.
"Thank you for that Lisa," replied the Doctor. "And now I need some answers. Like what exactly is happening here?"
"There is a creature of immense power coming to this world," answered the Ancient. "I have seen many planets fall under his might and I'm not going to stand by and let him do it to another."
"Good but I need more information on him. What species is he?"
"I don't know Time Lord you're guess is as good as mine."
"And how far away from Earth is he?"
"Three hours at the most."
"Ok so we don't have much time." He turns towards Ghost Rider. "Ghost Rider what do you know about him?"
"He has turned star systems into dust," replied Ghost Rider.
"Many creatures can do that you need to be a little more specific."
"He's about the same size as Lisa at her full size."
"Only momentarily my friend because she's still growing. And by my calculations she long overdo for a growth spurt."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: More specific

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"But Daddy I can't go to full size," said Lisa. She took off her wrist device and she didn't grow.
"Wow that's weird," replied the Doctor.
"Sorry about that," replied the Ancient. "I forgot to restore her powers."
He then clicked his fingers and Lisa shot up into the air. She soon reached full height and she was thankful that there seemed to be no ceiling. Everyone marveled over her size and she soon put back on the wrist device and she shrank back down to her normal height (To her).
"Well that's one mystery solved," said the Doctor. "Now let's think a being who's 700+ feet tall and able to destroy a solar system. That narrows it down a little. What does he look like?"
"I'm not too sure," replied the Ancient. "I never got a good look at him."
"A lot of help that'll give us."
"Wait I remember a little something. When ever he roared his breath smelled like rotten apples."
"Yes thanks you very much that's a lot of help. I know what it is."
"What is it Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"It's a..."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Getting er size back

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Phalanx," said the Doctor.
"What like the one's in the X-Men comics?" replied Ghost Rider.
"Not exactly. The Phalanx are very rare and powerful. And if I'm correct it's one of those that's coming to Earth."
"What do we do Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Well there's not much we can do Lisa. I'll try and research a weakness but it may take me several hours."
"We don't have several hours," replied the Ancient.
"Well try and stall him whatever way you can." He then looks at Lisa. "Ok Lisa you need to be a big girl for me. You have to do whatever you can to try and stall the Phalanx until I find something to properly fight them. Do you understand?"
"Yes Daddy."
"That's my girl. Now I'll see you in a few hours. Be brave."
The Doctor walks away and Lisa waves him goodbye. "Bye Daddy."
He then presses a button on his wrist and he teleports away back into the T.A.R.D.I.S. He goes to his super computer in there and he tries to find something that could stop this Phalanx from destroying the planet.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Phalanx

choices: Use her to achieve ultimate power
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Hours past and the Doctor still researched as much as he could. But for him time was running out.
Back with the others the Ancient had discovered tat the Phalanx had landed near an industrial town in the heart of Russia. he teleported them to the location and now four beings had to fight a monster of incredible power.
When they landed there they saw the huge Phalanx. It looked part computer generated part machine. It was slightly smaller than Lisa at full size. It also looked humanoid.
Lisa grew to her maximum size and the others prepared themselves for the fight of their lives.
"This is all you could bring?" asked the Phalanx. "You must really be desperate."
"No we have enough power to kill you," replied the Ancient.
Lisa went to attack but the Phalanx easily fended off the attack. Ronan also attacked. He was the strongest person on Earth but to the Phalanx it was nothing. Ghost Rider tried to wrap his fire chains around him but it failed.
The Phalanx saw the Ancient fleeing and he laughed in triumph. He then saw Lisa on the ground. She was still maximum size and he had an evil idea.

What is this idea?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Defeated easily

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
He grabbed her around the neck and he lifts her up. The Phalanx was using his powers to corrupt Lisa's pure soul.
"You will become my servant," he said.
"No I won't," replied Lisa. "My Daddy will stop you."
"No he won't and I know why. He hates you."
"My Daddy doesn't hate me he loves me."
"All he wants to do is get rid of you. You can barely fit in anywhere at normal size. When he gets rid of you he'll replace you with someone who's normal."
"No he won't my Daddy would never do that to me."
"Oh but he would. He'll do it at the first opportunity he gets."
Lisa's depression was only helping the Phalanx take control of her. Soon she fell asleep and he put her back on the ground.
"Now my servant rise," he said. She then uncontrollable got to her feet. "Your soul is mine and you will do as I say without question or reason." Lisa then opened her eyes. They were now full of darkness. "I will grant you great power. Do you accept."
"I do master."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Corruption of the innocent

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Meanwhile back in the T.A.R.D.I.S the Doctor had just discovered a weakness to the Phalanx. He wasn't sure how he was going to find the right ingredients for what he needed but he still thought that it was best for him to go back to the Ancient and Lisa. He used the T.A.R.D.I.S to travel back to where they were but he only found the Ancient. He was worried as he went to him.
"Where is everyone?" asked the Doctor.
"They were defeated in battle against the Phalanx," replied the Ancient. "Yet they have a fate worse then death."
"What's happened to Lisa?"
"You don't want to know."
"I do know now tell me where is Lisa?"
Then suddenly a huge hand came through the wall the Doctor and the Ancient were able to get out of the way. But he recognised that hand. He then saw Lisa' face.
"What are you doing Lisa?" asked the Doctor.
"Lisa is dead I am her replacement and I serve my master."
She then went to grab them again but this time she was successful.

What happens?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Weakness found

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Put me down Lisa," said the Doctor.
"I'm sorry I can't do that Doctor," replied Lisa. He noticed that this was the first time that Lisa called him anything but Daddy. "My master wants you."
She then begins the walk away. Her grip was so tight that it choked the Doctor. This was more proof to him that Lisa was under the Phalanx's spell. She wouldn't do anything to hurt him. But in her eyes he could still see a little of his companion.
Eventually she reaches the Phalanx who was sitting on a hill. he saw the tiny Doctor in her hand. He gave him an evil smile.
"So Doctor you're the one that my slave thinks so fondly of," said the Phalanx.
"Release her she doesn't deserve this," replied the Doctor.
"Now why would I do that? I must admit whatever you did to her made her especially strong against my corruption powers. But they were too strong for her and now she will be your be your murderer."
"No she won't kill me."
"Oh she will." He snapped her fingers and Lisa increased her grip. But she couldn't do it enough to kill him. This angered the Phalanx. "Do it my slave or suffer the consequences."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Captured by Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa tried to increase her grip on the Doctor but she still couldn't do it much to the Phalanx's despair.
"Why can't you kill her?" he asked.
"I'll tell you why," replied the Doctor. "Because a small part of my Lisa still exists in your twisted version. And she won't let you kill me."
"Hmm seems I underestimated her. But if you want something done right you have to do it yourself. Now my slave hand me the Doctor."
Lisa then gave the Doctor to the Phalanx. He had an evil grin on his face.
"Any last words Doctor?"
"Yeah Konoculas."
Then the spell over Lisa was lifted and she began to come to her senses. Just when she did the Phalanx snapped the Doctor's neck thus killing him.
"DADDY!" shouted Lisa. Then the Phalanx threw him onto the floor. "You killed my Daddy." She then felt a serge of power in her entire body. She then began to grow and the Phalanx watched her grow up to over 1,000 feet tall. "Now I'm gonna kill you."
The two colossal beings engage in combat. But nobody noticed what was happening to the Doctor.

What is he doing?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Death of the Doctor

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor became a ray of blinding light for a few seconds. He then stopped glowing and he looked at himself. He still wore his clothes but his appearance was totally changed. He had longish blond hair, blue eyes and a little beard. He felt his teeth.
But then he felt an Earthquake. He soon realised that it wasn't an earthquake but Lisa and the Phalanx squaring off.
Lisa was now bigger and stronger than the Phalanx and she was angry. This was a dangerous combination for the Phalanx.
"You think that your growth spurt can do me any damage?" asked the Phalanx.
"Yes I do," replied Lisa.
She then gave him an earth shattering right fist. This made the Phalanx fall down. Lisa then jumped onto him and she started to continually punch him.
The Phalanx used his powers to push Lisa away. The Doctor had to move so that he didn't get crushed.
Lisa was just getting more and more angry and she was being more of a skilled fighter. She kicked him in the chest and then she ran and punched him.
Then she picked him up and continued to punch him.
"These are for all the people you've killed including my Daddy," said Lisa.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Lisa vs Phalanx

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
But before Lisa could react the Phalanx used his powers to disappear. She could hear his evil laugh and then she looked down at the ground. She cried because she thought that the Doctor was dead. Then she sees someone. She picks him up thinking that it was the Doctor. It was him but his appearance had changed.
"Where's my Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"I am the Doctor," he replied.
"You're not my Daddy. You're an imposter."
"No Lisa it really is me. When I first got you, you were microscopic and then you began to grow and grow into the colossal size you are now. You've been a Queen, vessel for another being and you've been teleported from Stonehenge. And you're favourite past time is hugging me."
Lisa let out a tear. She could tell that this was the Doctor. She hugged him. "Daddy. But why are you so different?"
"Well when I get killed I regenerate and now I look like this. What do you think?"
"I preferred your old look."
"Well you get used to it. Now shrink down. I want to see how small you can become."
Lisa then put the Doctor on the ground and then she shrank. She could only go down to 10 feet.

What happens next?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Convincing Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Oh I'm still huge," said Lisa.
"But at least you have more chance of staying in a house," replied the Doctor.
Then there was a flash of light and The Ancient, Ghost Rider and Ronan appeared. Lisa was happy to see them.
"Hey there you guys are."
"Congratulations Lisa you defeated the Phalanx," said the Ancient.
"But he got away."
"I don't think that he'll be bothering us for a very long time. Oh yeah are you forgetting someone?"
"No who?"
The Ancient clicked his fingers and the teddy that Lisa had earlier appeared in her arms. She hugged it but she was disappointed that it was smaller. The Ancient clicked his fingers and the Teddy grew a little until it was perfect for her.
"I got Mr Wiggles back," said Lisa.
The Doctor then held onto Lisa hand. "Ok Lisa is time we got back to the T.A.R.D.I.S," said the Doctor.
"Ok Daddy."
He then used his teleportation device to teleport himself and Lisa back into the T.A.R.D.I.S.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Mr Wiggles

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The pair then reappears in the Mind Room. It was still tuned to Lisa's mind and it was twice the size of any normal room and everything was twice the size. There was still an army of fluffy cuddly toys on her bed.
"Hey we're back in my room Daddy," said Lisa.
"Great I didn't know who long I was going to last," replied the Doctor. He then fell onto the ground and Lisa instantly went down to him.
"Daddy!" She then picked him back up. "What's wrong?"
"I need to rest after my regeneration. Just put me somewhere to rest." He fell unconscious. Lisa then came up with an idea.
She turned the dial on her wrist device to maximum and she grew to her 1,000 foot body. Nothing seemed to grow it seemed that the Doctor shrank. but really everything else just grew. She also imagined a doll's house and one appeared. It was the right size and she was able to put the Doctor in a comfy bed.
"There you go Daddy," said Lisa. "I'll stay here until you wake up I promise."
Lisa then sat on her bed and just looked at the doll's house.

When will the Doctor wake up?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Doctor needs to rest

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
A full day later the Doctor began to wake up. He slowly got to his feet and the first thing he saw was the wall open and then he saw Lisa. He was a little confused with where he was. Then he realised that it was Lisa.
"Lisa?" asked the Doctor.
"Daddy you're awake," replied Lisa. And she put on the biggest smile imaginable. "I've been waiting for you."
"Thank you for putting me somewhere soft." He then notices bags under Lisa's eyes. "Did you get much sleep?"
"I haven't slept or eaten since you fell asleep Daddy. And there's someone here to see you." She then picked up Mr Wiggles and she held it in front of her. "Mr Wiggles wants to say Hi Daddy."
"Oh Hi Mr Wiggles. Now Lisa I think that it's best you go to sleep. Firstly put me by the door."
"Ok Daddy." She then picks him up and puts him by the door. She opens it a little. "Now what?"
"Now climb into bed and take Mr Wiggles with you. Have nice dreams and call me when you wake up."
"Ok Daddy. Goodnight."
"Goodnight Lisa."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Waking up

choices: About the empty child in WWII
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Nine hours later we see the Doctor reading another one of his books. He was enjoying it until he heard Lisa call for him. He then went to the mind room and when she saw him she picked him up and kissed him.
"Good morning Lisa did you have a nice sleep?" asked the Doctor.
"It was very nice daddy," replied Lisa. "I even had a little dream."
"Oh what did you dream about?"
"I was sitting on this hill and looking at a beautiful view. You were on my shoulder and we were talking about pancakes."
"Pancakes? Why pancakes?"
"I don't know but I was loving it. Daddy can I put you on my shoulder?"
"Sure you can."
Lisa then put the Doctor on her shoulder. The Doctor wrapped some of her hair around himself and Lisa picked up Mr Wiggles and she hugged him.
"You really love that bear," said the Doctor.
"But not as much as I love you daddy," replied Lisa.
"Oh aren't you the sweetest little girl I've ever met."
"Probably Daddy. Can you tell me about some of the other places you've been to."

What does the Doctor tell her?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Lisa wakes up

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Well I've fought a deadly foe called the Cybermen," said the Doctor. "I've fought them many times."
"What do they do Daddy?" asked Lisa. "Are they scary?"
"Yes very scary. They remove the brains form human bodies and put them in empty Cybermen cells. Then they remove the emotions and personality of the person and they become a Cyberman."
Lisa was holding onto Mr Wiggles and she was shaking a little. She was truly scared. She shed a tear for the Doctor.
"Are they really like that Daddy?"
"Yeah they are but don't worry I got rid of them all. They won't hurt anyone else."
Lisa smiled again. "That's good Daddy. You deserve a kiss for that." She then raises him up to her lips and she gives him a kiss. "I love you daddy."
"And I love you too. Now where do you want to go next?"
"Anywhere that doesn't have any danger Daddy."
"Let's go to the British Countryside. It's really beautiful and I'll get a nice sunny day."
"Ok daddy."
She then puts him on the ground and he leaves the Mind Room.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The tale of the Cybermen

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor then set the T.A.R.D.I.S to go to a modern day British countryside. The T.A.R.D.I.S then started to shake and even Lisa could feel it in the Mind Room. It shook for a minute and then it stopped.
He opened the T.A.R.D.I.S doors and he saw the beautiful countryside. He then went back to the Mind Room to fetch Lisa. She shrank to her minimum size and she left the T.A.R.D.I.S. She loved the look of the countryside and she even grew to her full size much to the Doctor's discomfort.
"Lisa why did you grow again?" asked the Doctor.
"Well I thought I could have a little run around and it's more fun when I'm big," replied Lisa. "You don't mind do you?"
"No go ahead as long as you don't hurt anyone or cause any damage."
"Thanks Daddy."
Lisa then began to walk away and the Doctor felt the earthquakes of her footsteps. He was glad to see her happy. She had been through a lot lately and she needed a little fun. He also liked that she had Mr Wiggles. The Teddy could be hugged as hard as Lisa wanted and he would still be fine.
Lisa continued to jog a little. She nearly tripped over a hill but she was able to keep her balance.

Who does she meet?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: In the countryside

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa continued to walk across the countryside. She was admiring the views and then she noticed something by her huge flip flop. She bent down to take a look and she saw what seemed to be a young boy. He was about 6 years old and he also had a teddy with him. Lisa smiled at him and she sat down. When she did there was a small tremor and she picked up the boy and raised him to her level. She still kept an arm around Mr Wiggles.
“Well hey there little guy,” said Lisa. “What’s your name?”
“J-Jake,” replied the Boy. “You’re big.”
“I know it’s great at times. And my name is Lisa.” She then holds up the huge Teddy. “And this is Mr Wiggles.”
The pair both smiled and they began to talk for a few minutes. Jake told Lisa about how he got there and where his parents were. Lisa told Jake about her adventures with the Doctor and about her growth. To them it was all fun and games.
But then Lisa began to feel a burning feeling at the bottom of her spine. She stood up with Jake and Mr Wiggles still in her hands and she looked at her back. The pain was getting worse and she was almost in tears. Then she noticed something. There was something poking out of her mini dress. It was getting longer and eventually it broke out. Lisa watched as it grew into some kind of tail. It looked like one that a monkey had.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The boy and the tail

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
When the tail finished growing out of her she moved it a little. She then touched it and it felt nice. She began to move it more and she found that it could bend in several places. She saw it as being a third hand. She then looked at Jake in her hand.
"I have a tail," said Lisa. "I wonder what Daddy will say when he sees it?"
"It looks like one a monkey has," replied Jake.
"What's a monkey?"
"It's an animal that lives in trees."
"Is it?" Lisa then used her tail to grab Mr Wiggles from her arms. This was like a little test for her. "Do you want to see my daddy?"
"Is he nice?"
"Yeah he's my daddy. He wouldn't do anything to upset. And hurting you would upset me."
Lisa then started to walk towards T.A.R.D.I.S. She couldn't wait to see the look on the Doctor's face when he sees her tail. She imagined ever freaking out a little or being curious. But she knew that he wouldn't be angry with her. It wasn't like it was her fault that she had one.

How will the Doctor react when he sees Lisa's tail?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Like a third hand for a giantess

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa soon arrived back at the T.A.R.D.I.S. She hid her tail by putting it up her dress. She still had Mr Wiggles in her arms and she still had Jake in her other hand. She saw the Doctor just leaving the T.A.R.D.I.S. She shouted him and he turned around to her. He saw that she had someone with her.
“You’re back Lisa,” said the Doctor. “And who do you have there?”
“This is Jake,” replied Lisa. “He’s my new friend. And Daddy I have something to show you.”
“What’s that?”
The Doctor looked up at Lisa and he didn’t notice her tail come out of the bottom of her miniskirt. She then used it grab the Doctor and bring her up to her level.
“I have a tail Daddy.”
“Wow you do.” He then feels the tail. “Seems to be that of a primate. How did you get this?”
“I don’t know. I just felt some pain in my back and then it just grew out. Can I keep it. It makes thing easier for me.”
“Ok you can keep it. But I’m still not sure how you grew a tail. Humans don’t grow tails.”
“But remember Daddy. I’m not human.”
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Curious Doctor

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Oh yes that's right," said the Doctor. But you're still my little girl."
Lisa then holds Jake in front of her and towards the Doctor. "Jake wanted to meet you."
The Doctor looked at Jake and he had a worried look on his face. The Doctor was a little curious.
"Jake where are your Mom and Dad?"
"I don't know," replied Jake. "They're just gone."
"Where did they go?"
"They just went." He was close to tears.
"Err Lisa could you comfort Jake a little?"
"Ok Daddy."
She then put the Doctor in the same hand as Jake. She then used her tail to hold onto Mr Wiggles and freeing her other hand. She then used her finger tips to gently stroke Jake.
"There there does that feel any better?" asked Lisa.
"That should be fine Lisa," replied the Doctor. "But I really want to know why a boy of his age was left here by himself."

What happens next?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: No parents

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Where did you last see your parents?" asked the Doctor.
"Where Lisa found me," replied Jake.
"Ok Lisa you know where to go."
"I sure do Daddy," replied Lisa.
Lisa then began to walk back to where she had found Jake. She admired the scenes of the beautiful landscapes. But she eventually got to the spot where she found Jake. She put him and the Doctor on the ground and she then sat down. This caused a small Earthquake. She then put Mr Wiggles back in her arms.
The Doctor then began to examine the ground. It seemed to be a lot muddier then in other places and it hadn't rained today. The Doctor began to take samples and he put them in a test tube and he put it into his pocket.
"There's a little something to take back to the T.A.R.D.I.S," said the Doctor. "I should have results in no time."
"Do you want me to take you to your time machine Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"No I'm alright thank you." He then got his teleportation device out of his other pocket. "I'll just beam myself there. Stay here with Jake and only come to me when it's an emergency."
"Ok daddy."

The Doctor then teleported away from the location and back to the T.A.R.D.I.S. Lisa just looked at Jake in her hand and she smiled.
"Will he find my mommy?" asked Jake.
"Yeah my daddy can do anything," replied Lisa. "He's best daddy in the world."
"Do you have a mommy?"
"A what?"
"A mommy. Its like a daddy except its a girl."
"Oh. No I don't have a mommy. Is that a bad thing?"
"Yeah I think it is."
"Where can I find a mommy?"
"I don't know. I've had mine as long as I can remember."
"I'll ask daddy to see if he can get me one."
Meanwhile back in the T.A.R.D.I.S the Doctor was still making progress with the sample. He was now testing it but it the sample came up negative. it didn't belong to any known species in the universe. This got the Doctor really thinking. He wanted to get back to Lisa and Jake. He feared that they were going to be in big trouble. But he couldn't locate them with his teleporter.

Where are they?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: What's a mommy

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa had decided to take Jake to a lake. There they could see their reflections in the clear water. She figured that the Doctor would see her if she stayed at her maximum size. This was also a little relaxing for them both.
"Look at all the fishes in there Lisa," said Jake.
"What's a fish?" asked Lisa.
"Animals that live under the water. They swim around all day."
"Nice life."
"You want to be a fish?"
"No I like to stay with my Daddy and hopefully he can get me a Mommy like you said."
Just then they saw the Doctor come to them. He was shouting something at them and Lisa was only able to pick it up. But just when he reached them some mud men came up from the ground and grabbed him. Before she could react they took him down to into the earth.
"DADDY!" shouted Lisa.
She then began to dig the ground where the Doctor had been taken. She was panicky.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Mud people

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa got down to the ground and with all of her mighty strength she began to dig up the ground looking for the Doctor. Jake stayed to one side as he saw her panicking. She just kept digging and digging in hopes of finding him.
“Daddy,” said Lisa. “Where are you? Please come back to me.” She still digged as much as she could. She found some old fossils and she put them to one side. But eventually she just broke down and cried her heart out. “DADDY!”
Jake decided now was the best time to go back to her. She was still crying and her tears were creating a small lake. He went around this lake and he went to her face.
“Lisa please stop crying,” said Jake.
“I lost my Daddy,” cried Lisa. “I’m nothing without him.”
“We’ll find him. Like we’ll find my Mommy and Daddy.”
Just then Lisa felt something around her feet. When she looked she was sinking into the ground. Jake was also sinking but she was able to pull him out in time with her tail. She kept Mr Wiggles in her arms and she sank.

“Well you can tell Mr Wiggles hopefully we won’t be too long here.”

The Doctor and Lisa then began to creep away. Lisa kept Mr Wiggles tied up in her tail and she walked with the Doctor. The ceiling was too low for her and this made it very uncomfortable for the now mini giantess.
Eventually they sneak back to the top of the surface. They could breathe a little but now they had to find out what these aliens were doing here? The Doctor had to make sure Lisa was down. One false move and everything would be lost to them. They couldn’t risk be seen.

What do they do?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Out of the cells

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"We need to blend in so we don't get noticed," said the Doctor.
"How do we do that Daddy?" replied Lisa. "We look nothing like them."
"We don't have to. We just need something they wear that can cover us up." Then the Doctor saw one of the aliens with a spacesuit on. "I think I know what to use."
Then the Doctor went back inside the cells to try and find a spacesuit. He was able to find one easily and he put it on. But there weren't any that would fit Lisa. This made her upset.
"Daddy I'm too big," she said.
"Well maybe you don't have to wear a disguise. Maybe I can use you as something else."
"Like what?"
The Doctor thought for a moment. He came up with an idea and he put a chain around Lisa's neck.
"What are you doing daddy?" asked Lisa. She began to cry. "I thought you loved me."
"I do but this is as cover," replied the Doctor. "When we're finished you can eat as many bananas as you want." This made Lisa smile. "Now let's go."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Blending in

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor began to walk leading the gentle mini giantess to where he was walking. Some people stared but they just assumed he was a bounty hunter. Lisa could hear them talking about her. This upset her but she didn't want to blow their cover.
They made their way to the giant building and no one took much notice of them when they went inside. But eventually they were halted by a guard. He was more muscular than the normal aliens.
"What is your business here?" asked the Guard.
"I'm here to pick up the bounty for this giantess," replied the Doctor.
"Have seen no wanted posters for her."
"Well she's only just escaped. I was able to recapture her before she got away from us."
"Very well proceed."
The Doctor then led Lisa into the building. She had to duck for the low ceilings and when it came to a door it was a tight squeeze but it would take her a second to get her before she could start walking again.
"Are you alright Lisa?"

Will they get caught?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Leading away

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"I'm fine Daddy," said Lisa.
"Please don't call me that name while we're here," replied the Doctor. "It'll blow our cover."
"Sorry Mister Bounty Hunter."
"Strange but better."
Then suddenly they were surrounded by guards. The Doctor tried to talk himself out of the predicament.
"Don't take another step forward Doctor," said the Guard.
"Well you have to admit it was pretty sneaky that we got this far," replied the Doctor.
"No more talking from you."
Just then Lisa's tail grabbed one of the Guard's spears and she began to attack them with it.
"Everyone get the giantess!"
They got their spears out towards Lisa but she defended herself. She also made sure that the Doctor was safe.
"Leave them to me Daddy," said Lisa.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Cover blown

choices: The electric probs did their job
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa gave the Doctor Mr Wiggles to hold onto. He was the only person she trusted with the bear. But she was whipping the aliens with her huge tail. She even doubled her size so that it would give her an even bigger advantage.
But the Aliens were jabbing her with electric prods. these were painful and it was making the normally placid giantess turn very angry. She kept increasing her size until she hit the ceiling. She still had the Doctor with her.
"STOP TRYING TO HURT MY DADDY!" she shouted.
Then she brought her huge foot down stomping on one of the aliens. She then raised her foot and continued to do it on some of the others. The guards started to retreat as they were quickly being defeated by the giantess.
Eventually when they were gone Lisa calmed down. She sat on the ground and looked at the Doctor. She smiled at him.
"Looks like you got rid of them Lisa," said the Doctor. "But we'll have to move fast or else more will come."
"Daddy I feel a little sleepy," replied Lisa.
She then fell unconscious on the ground. The Doctor tried to wake her up but it was no use.

What has happened to her?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Lisa can stomp

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Ok I'm on my own," thought the Doctor. He then went to Lisa's wrist device and he turned it to minimum. She then shrank down to her normal size and the Doctor tried to help her up. But she was very heavy. "She's a lot heavier than she looks. But that's physics for you."
The Doctor had no choice but to drag the 10 foot giantess and he put her somewhere where she was hidden despite her massive size. He wanted to make sure that his companion was safe away from the aliens.
When he was sure that Lisa was safe the Doctor then went on his own through the tower. He knew that everyone in there would be on his tail in a matter of minutes so he had to be fast.
"Come on where's the control room in this place," he thought. "Knowing my luck it's right on the very top."
The Doctor then made his way up the tower. He could hear some sounds behind him and he knew that it belonged to the other aliens.
Meanwhile downstairs Lisa was waking up. She yawned a little and she stood up. But she looked around and she couldn't see the Doctor.
"Daddy where are you?" she asked.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Knocked out Lisa

choices: They go back to the T.A.R.D.I.S
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor then felt the building begin to shake violently. At first he thought it was an earthquake but he could hear the word “Daddy!” He realised that Lisa must have regained consciousness. She was panicking and increasing her size.
“Great that’s two problems I have,” thought the Doctor. “First disable then go to Lisa.”
He then went to the control room and found the controls. He started to turn them to switch them off. But the building wasn’t going to last any longer with Lisa growing.
Eventually he switched everything off and he saw the landscape around the dome revert back to their pre-desert looks.
When he was sure that it was fine he went out of the door and shouted for Lisa.
“Lisa calm down I’m here,” said the Doctor.
“Daddy?” replied Lisa. “Where are you?”
“I’m up here. Just stay calm and shrink. I’ll be down to you in a minute.”
Then the building stopped shaking. The Doctor went downstairs and saw destruction. But he eventually found Lisa. She gave him a really big hug and she cried a little.
“Why did you leave me daddy?” she asked.
“I had no choice,” replied the Doctor. “But I’m back now and that’s all that matters.”
“Thanks daddy.”

What happens?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Panicking Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Then suddnely a lot of the guards came back. They were annoyed that they had made everything like it was suppose to be. But before they attacked Lisa had already made herself super-sized and she was glaring down at them. Although she had Mr Wiggles in her arms it gave her some of her innocence but she was still very angry.
"LEAVE NOW!" she shouted.
The guards knew that they couldn't fight nher so they ran away and Lisa looked at the Doctor. She smiled at him and she picked him up.
"Well you did it again Lisa you saved the world," said the Doctor. "Or at least Portugal."
"Thanks Daddy."
She then gave him a hug along with Mr Wiggles. She also wrapped her tail around him for an extra special hug.
"I love you Daddy."
"And I love you too Lisa. But now we need to get back to the T.A.R.D.I.S."
"Why daddy?"
"Because I need something to eat."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Lisa scares off guards

choices: it'll take several weeks before she hatches
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
But just as the pair turned around to walk away one of the guards came. He set his staff to full power and he shot a beam threw Lisa. She fell to the ground. The Doctor turned around and saw him. But he quickly fled with the rest of his kind.
The Doctor went back to Lisa. She was lying there dying. She looked up at the Doctor.
"Daddy what's happening to me?" asked Lisa. "I feel cold."
"Don't worry Lisa," replied the Doctor. "I'll find something that'll help."
But it was too late. By the time he said this the gentle giantess was dead. He could help but cry his heart out. Lisa had been a special companion to him. The others had lives before they met him. But she was the first to spend her entire life with him.
But then Lisa's body began to glow. The Doctor covered his eyes. But he could make out that Lisa was shrinking. Now only was she shrinking but she was transforming as well.
When the glowing subsided he saw an egg no bigger than that laid by a chicken. He picked it up and looked at it.
"Welcome back Lisa," said the Doctor.

What happens to Lisa?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The death and Rebirth of Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor then picked up Mr Wiggles that had reverted back to normal. He then made his way back to the T.A.R.D.I.S. he made sure that Lisa's egg was safe. he didn't want her to die.
"When he reached the T.A.R.D.I.S he put the egg on a pillow under a warm lamp. The Doctor set it to the ideal temperature for the egg to incubate.
For weeks the Doctor waited for his companion to hatch. He had taken x-rays of the egg and saw her development. She was almost ready to hatch. The heartbeat was normal and then she began to break out.
She pounded on her egg shell and it began to crack. She kept pounding it and eventually she broke open. She was like a new born baby and she began to cry. But she was only the size of a chick. The Doctor wrapped her up in some blankets and he raised her up a little.
"Hello Lisa," said the Doctor. "Long time no see." He then picked up a now tiny size Mr Wiggles and Lisa wanted it. He gave it to her and she hugged it. "I knew you'd like that now let me take you to your room."
The Doctor then took Lisa to the mind room. It transformed to that of a baby's room. It had toys and a little cot for little baby Lisa.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Baby Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor noticed that Lisa also had her tail. Although it was smaller then it use to be it would grow along with the rest of her body in time. The Doctor even got a bottle of milk for her.
"They you go Lisa," said the Doctor. "Drink up and you'll become big and strong like you were before."
Then Baby Lisa began to drink the milk in the bottle she had her tail wrap around it as well. But when she had finished she slowly drifted asleep and the Doctor put covers over her.
He then left the mind room and went to the controls. He started to pull a few levers and then the T.A.R.D.I.S began to move. He sat down on one of his chairs and started to read a book. But it wasn't a fictional book. It was about taking care of babies.
"Ok let's see make sure nappy is clean at all time," read the Doctor. "Hmm looks like I've gotta get some nappies for the little lady."
The T.A.R.D.I.S eventually landed in London in 2007. He put a hearing device in Lisa's room so he would be able to hear her if she were to wake up. But the last time he saw her she seemed bigger then a normal baby.

What happens in London?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Need to get nappies

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor then started to look in the shops to see which ones sold nappies and clothes for Lisa. He found a place that had clothes idea for her. He found one with a little bee on it that would make her happy. He had all the right money for it and he started to walk back to the T.A.R.D.I.S.
When he got inside he checked and little Baby Lisa was still asleep. She was grabbing her blanket and hugging Mr Wiggles. He didn't have the heart to wake her up so he just went back to reading his book.
About an hour later he heard Lisa start to cry. He went into the mind room and he picked her out of the bed. He put the nappy on and he put on her new clothes. They fitted perfectly and he gave her some food. After that he tapped her on the back so she would burp. She then began to laugh at him.
"Glad to see you happy," said the Doctor. "And one day you can tell me when you're happy or not."
He then put Lisa on the floor and she began to crawl around. She kept her beloved teddy bear wrapped in her tail and she played with some of the other soft toys. She was laughing all the way. She even sat down sometimes and clapped her little hands.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Things for Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Do you know who he is?" asked the Doctor pointing to Mr. Wiggles in Lisa's tail. "That's Mr. Wiggles your friend."
Lisa then smiled and laughed. She still didn't have any teeth in her mouth. She picked up another one of her toys with her hands. She hugged it. The Doctor remembered how much Lisa enjoyed hugging things. He just smiled at her and she just laughed.
"That's a good little girl," said the Doctor. "Let me just get you your milk."
The Doctor then stood up and walked out of the Mind Room. Lisa crawled after him and she made her way out of the door. She kept on crawling and she was amazed by the sights of the T.A.R.D.I.S. She clapped her hands in excitement and she continued to crawl.
Eventually the Doctor came back with the milk. He was horrified to see that she was gone. He was worried that she had shrunk into nothing. But then he saw the mind room reverting to a basic empty room. He knew that she wasn't in there anymore.
"Lisa where are you?" asked the Doctor. "I've got some milk here for you. Come out please."

Where is Lisa?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: LIsa's advanture in the T.A.R.D.I.S

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Meanwhile Lisa was just crawling into the control room. She could see everything in it and she smiled. She then used her flexible tale to climb up onto the controls. She then began to push buttons and pull levers.
When the T.A.R.D.I.S began to shake the Doctor ran into the control room. He found Lisa at the controls. He picked her up and looked at her.
"Bad Girl Lisa," said the Doctor. This made Lisa cry. But the Doctor tried to calm her down. "Ok it was an accident. Now let's see where we're going."
The Doctor looked at the screen and it was going back in time. It went back 2,000 years. Eventually it stopped and he looked out of the T.A.R.D.I.S. He saw that he was still England. But he could see Roman soldiers there now.
"We're back in the time of the Romans," said the Doctor.
The Doctor then quietly got out of the T.A.R.D.I.S and he looked around. He made sure that he was hidden. He still had little baby Lisa in his arms and he was still giving her the occasional little hug.
"Now this is amazing."
"Halt who goes there?" said a Man.
The Doctor then turned around and saw a Centurion.

What does the Doctor do?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Romans

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"I mean you no harm," said the Doctor.
"What is your name?" replied the Roman.
"My name is the Doctor."
"Doctor Who?"
"Just the Doctor."
The Roman then saw little baby Lisa in the arms of the Doctor. "Who is the baby?"
"This is my Companion Lisa. She's my Daughter." The Doctor had to tell this white lie so the Roman didn't get suspicious.
"What kind of name is Lisa?"
"It was chosen by her mother. She died in child birth."
"I am sorry to hear that. Be on your way."
The Roman then walked away and the Doctor walked away. Lisa was still laughing and smiling at the same time. She held out her arms and the Doctor could tell that she wanted a hug. So he gave her one and this made her even happier.
"Well don't get use to hugging me like that," said the Doctor. "One day you'll be big enough to lift me off my feet."
This made Lisa clap her hands in excitement.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Be on your way

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
But the Doctor saw people begging on the ground. He tried to avoid them but a few of them he gave them some money. But eventually he ended up outside a house belonging to a rich family. They were feasting and he could hear music. There was someone out the house. The Doctor went up to him. He could smell something a little odd about this place.
"Are you on the list?" asked the Man.
"Probably not," replied the Doctor.
"State your name."
"I'm the Doctor."
"Good we need a Doctor. Someone has been injured and requires your help."
"Well I'll see what I can do."
The Doctor was allowed entry to the house. He was instructed to put Lisa down with the other babes. They weren't too sure about the clothes she was wearing but as long as the Doctor came to help she was welcome.
Eventually the Doctor saw a man lying in a pool of blood. The Doctor was able to sit him up.
"Ok this might hurt."

What does the Doctor do?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Need a Doctor

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor got a cloth and he dabbed it on the man's head. He screamed out with pain but the Doctor was doing the best that he could. He could see that the man would die if he didn't do something fast.
In the end he got his sonic screwdriver and used it on the man's head. It started to heal back up and the man seemed to be alright. But the other Romans were a little suspicious but they were still happy.
"By Jupiter it's a miracle," said One of the Romans.
Meanwhile in the area where the other babies where Lisa was. She was exploring the area around her and she could hear everyone celebrating. She grabbed onto something as she began to stand up on her feet for the first time since her death. She was hungry and she wanted some milk.
Lisa looked up and saw some milk on top of a table. It was in a cup and she wanted to get to it. But for now she was vertically challenged. She started to go around to see if there was a way to the top.
Eventually she found a chair by the table and she tried to climb up it so she could get to the milky goodness at the top. She couldn't stop looking at it and she was almost there.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Lisa and milk
