Normally it would have been difficult for a baby to get on top of the chair. But with her tail she used it to grip onto various things to get to the top. She still had Mr. Wiggles in her arms and she eventually got to the top of the table.
She picked up the cup of milk and she began to drink it. She was giggling to herself and she then saw the Doctor walk in. She had her hands held out to him and he picked her up.
"Oh there you are Lisa," said the Doctor. "I was beginning to wonder where you were." She smiled at him. "Well we've been invited to a feast later. You promise me you'll be on your best behaviour. Now why should I ask that? You're always on your best behaviour."
The Doctor then went to the other room with Lisa. He made sure that her tail was safely hidden in her clothes. She just wanted to have a little fun. She held onto the Doctor for dear life and slowly went to sleep.
"Ah you're back," said One of the Guests.
"Well I just went to find Lisa," replied the Doctor.
"Well good thing you found her."
"She was just having a look around."

What does Lisa do at the feast?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Victory

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor went to the feast with baby Lisa in his arms. She gave out a yawn and then she fell asleep. Everyone couldn't believe how cute she was asleep. He put him down somewhere where she wouldn't be disturbed.
The Doctor then returned to the feast. Everyone was eating different things and they even had a conversation with him.
"So where are you from Doctor?" asked One of the guests.
"I'm from a village just outside of Rome," replied the Doctor. "I've come here to pay my respects to the Emperor."
"Not just anyone can see the Emperor."
"I know but Lisa wanted to see him really badly. i can't refuse her like that."
"She's a baby she can't talk yet."
"Believe me her mind's a lot more advanced then the normal baby. Anyway do we have anymore roast boar?"
The Doctor was given some more roast bore and he ate it. but he had to be careful. He remembered what the Romans would put in there food to give it an extra flavour.
"Very nice thank you."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Sleepy Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor enjoyed the feast. But he saw quite a lot of the guests going to throw up somewhere so they could carry on feasting. He would also go and check on Lisa from time to time. But she was just asleep and cuddling Mr. Wiggles as tight as she could. He didn’t have the heart to wake her up when she was sleeping so peacefully.
When he went back to the feast there were Roman soldiers everywhere. He wasn’t sure what was going on.
“What’s going on?” asked the Doctor.
Just then a man wearing a white robe came in. he was followed by several other roman soldiers.
“Presenting Giaus Julius Caesar,” said a Soldier.
He then walked over to the Hostess and kissed her hand.
“Welcome Uncle Julius,” said the Hostess. “Thank you for coming.”
“No thank you for inviting me,” replied Caesar.
He then sat down with the others so they could feast. He started on some exotic fish from the far reaches of his new empire. He saw the Doctor and he smiled.
“I don’t believe I’ve seen you in Rome before,” said Caesar.
“Well it’s my first time,” replied the Doctor.

What happens next?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Caesar

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
“So how was your conquest in Gaul?” asked the Doctor.
“Terrific they didn’t stand a chance,” replied Caesar. “But the thing is warfare is easy. But all the politics that’s the hard part.”
“I can understand that.”
“And I’ve heard that you have a young child with you.”
“Oh yes my daughter Lisa.”
“May I see her so I can give her my blessings?”
“Yes sure.”
Caesar was then taken to see Lisa. She was still sleeping and he looked at her. He even smiled.
“You have a beautiful baby,” said Caesar. “Who is her mother?”
“There isn’t one. Sadly she died in child birth.”
“I’m sorry to hear that. If you wanted me to I could get you a wife or a slave to take care of her.”
“No I’m alright thank you.”
“Very well so be it.”
Then Lisa slowly began to wake up out of her sleep.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Talking to Caesar

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Out of the story we see Lisa at her full age again. She's 15 feet tall with a party hat on. There was a banner behind her saying 200. That’s because we’ve reached the 200th chapter of this story.
"I'm back to my normal age," said Lisa. "But I'm lonely here."
Then the Doctor and everyone else who's appeared in the story appear. They all had drinks and party hats with them. The Doctor hugged his very tall companion and then he had a bit of a drink.
"Welcome back Lisa," said the Doctor.
"Daddy!"
She then picked him up and gave him a bigger hug. She was happy to see everyone. But then some music came on and everyone started to dance.
"My favourite song daddy."
"Well enjoy it because it's the last time you'll hear it until you understand it."
"What?"
"Well until you're old enough to understand it."
"Oh."
The party continued and everyone had a good time.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: 200 party

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Caesar saw Lisa waking up. He then held her in his arms and he got soem water and did a marking on her forehead. The Doctor didn't try to stop him because he wasn't causing Lisa any harm.
After Caesar was finished he gave Lisa back to the Doctor and she smiled at him. He smiled back at her.
"Now your child is truly blessed," said Caesar.
"Thank you," replied the Doctor.
"It's the least I could have done with the way you helped that man."
"It was nothing really."
"Medical knowledge like that is very hard to come by Doctor. You would be valued highly in the field."
"I know but I'm more of a traveler."
"Everyone needs to settle down somewhere. And I other you Rome to be where you settle down."
"That is a very generous offer and I'll consider. But I need to leave with Lisa."
"Very well Doctor I hope you have a safe trip."
"You're welcome."

Does the Doctor truly leave?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Blessing]

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor left the party with baby Lisa in his arms. She was still hugging his arm and he knew how comforting her hugs were when she was bigger. But for now this was the best thing he had to it.
But the Doctor didn't go to the T.A.R.D.I.S instead he looked around Rome a little more. He went to see a Gladiator match. He didn't really want Lisa to see it so he averted her eyes away and he made her occupy herself on other things.
After that he decided to go back to the T.A.R.D.I.S. Lisa was getting hungry and he needed to get the milk for her. He poured her some for her and she drank it quickly. Normally he wouldn't have let her have anymore. But he knew that she was a growing girl and she needed her milk to become big and strong.
"Did you like that Lisa?" asked the Doctor. Lisa just looked at him with a pleasant smile. "Yeah you liked that. But I think it's your bedtime."
The Doctor then took Lisa away to her room. He lay her down on the bed and she went to sleep. He kissed her forehead and then he left. He had a smile on his face because he knew that she was going to grow up into a kind and loving person.
"Oh well back to the books," thought the Doctor as he walked to the Library. He picked up a book and began to read it.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Look around first

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Meanwhile in the Mind Room Lisa woke up. She yawned and then used her tail the climb out of her crib. She tried to crawl out of the Mind Room but she got distracted by Mr. Wiggles. She sat down and hugged him. She slowly went back to sleep.
A little later the Doctor came in to check on her. He found her on the floor and he picked her up and put her back in her crib.
"Now don't get out again," said the Doctor. "You don't want to get hurt now do you?" Lisa was still sound asleep. "That's alright just remember the last thing I want is to see you get hurt."
He then kissed her on the forehead and she still slept. He then went out of the Mind Room and he went back to the Library. He sat down and read a book. This one was from 20th century England. He read it and thoroughly enjoyed it. He even said to himself that it was a good century.
Later he made himself some coffee and he sat down to drink it. But then he heard Lisa wake up. She was hungry and she cried out for some milk. He brought her in a bottle and she drank it.
"There you go drink that up," said the Doctor. "You'll grow up into a big and strong young girl."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Crib

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
A year later Lisa had grown up a little. She was the size of a normal one year old child. She was starting to walk around a lot and she would get some help from the Doctor. He would teach her simple things and he didn't push her too much.
We see the Doctor just putting Lisa to bed. He lay her down in a bigger crib and he gave her Mr. Wiggles. She grabbed onto the bear and gave him a big hug. This made the Doctor smile.
"You're getting a big girl now Lisa," said the Doctor. He then looked at her hair. It was turning brown like it should. "One day you won't have to look up at me no one will have to."
The Doctor then gave her a kiss goodnight and he left the mind room. Lisa stood up in the crib and looked at the door that the Doctor had just left.
"Daddy," she said.
This was her first word and she just lay back down in her bed and she went to sleep. She had her dummy in her mouth and she had Mr Wiggles in her arms.
The Doctor went to the controls of the T.A.R.D.I.S and he set a course to present day Earth. he wasn't sure where about he was going but he was ready for almost anything. He was happier then he had ever been.
"Things are looking up."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: A year later

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The T.A.R.D.I.S began to travel through time and space. This would take a while so the Doctor sat down and relaxed a little. He even fell asleep in his own chair. Right now he didn't have a care in the world.
But a few hours later in the Mind Room Lisa woke up and started to get out of the crib by using her tail. She remembered to take Mr. Wiggles with her and she looked around. Her toys were on her floor and she began to play with them. She was happy and cheerful today. But she wanted to see the Doctor.
She went to the door and tried to open it. But she was way too small and even with her tail she could reach it. But she was able to find a toy with a plastic hook on it. She used her tale to get it up high enough to reach to door handle.
It worked and she was able to open the door. She then picked up Mr. Wiggles and she walked to where the Doctor was. He was still asleep but then she said Daddy. This was able to wake him up.
"What did you just say?" asked the Doctor.
"Daddy," replied Lisa.
"Oh you're saying your very first words Lisa. You really know how to make me proud don't you."

What happens next?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Words

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor was about to hug baby Lisa. But then the T.A.R.D.I.S shook violently. He was able to keep a hold of Lisa. But now he realised that he had landed. He went outside to check where they were.
"Looks like we're here," said the Doctor. "But maybe in the wrong time."
Instead of being in an urban region he was surrounded by forests. It seemed to have accidentally gotten off too soon. He was hundreds of years in Earth's past. He could tell that it was the medieval times.
"Well since we're here we may as well take a look around," said the Doctor.
"Daddy," replied Lisa.
"You'd like that wouldn't you."
The Doctor then began to walk through the forests. Lisa was curious with what she saw. She had never seen so many trees at once. She was excited with what she was seeing. But then she began to get scared. The Doctor noticed this.
"What's wrong Lisa?" Just then he heard the voice of men. "I think we should get out of here."
The Doctor then began to go back towards the forest. But then she dropped Mr. Wiggles and she cried out for him.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Forest

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor quickly turned around to pick up Mr. Wiggles. He quickly gave it back to Lisa and she hugged him. But when he turned back around there were two men in front of him. They wouldn’t allow him to escape.
“Where do you think you’re going?” asked the One Man.
“I’m trying to get home,” replied the Doctor.
“You’re far away from your home I’m afraid. You’re coming with us. You and the little girl.” The man tried to take Mr. Wiggles away from Lisa. But she held onto it tight.
“What’s up you’re weaker then a child,” replied the Second Man.
“Shut up!” He continued to pull but Lisa just held on. She wasn’t too happy and she was getting annoyed. She eventually punched him in the face and he went flying. She then continued to hug Mr. Wiggles. “That little Runt.”
“Don’t touch her,” said the Doctor.
“What are you going to do about it little man?”
“I’ll set her on you. She just took you down with one punch. Imagine what she would do to you if I told her to do something.”
At first the man wasn’t scared. But he knew that Lisa was no ordinary baby. He didn’t want to give up.

What does he do?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Strong Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The man went to hit Lisa. But it wouldn’t look to good to him hitting a young child. Anyway she was just hugging Mr. Wiggles and she was giggling a little. But the men had to get the Doctor back to their village.
"You don't ever do that to Lisa again," said the Doctor. "If you do you have to face my fury."
"We are still taking you away," said the Man. "You either come quietly or we use force if needed."
The Doctor thought about it for a few minutes. He didn't want to risk Lisa's safety so he complied with them.
This had gone for the better. The men just led the Doctor and Lisa to their village. It contained a few huts but that was about it. People were trying to exist as best as they could. But it was difficult for them.
"What now?" asked the Doctor.
"Now you need to see our mayor," replied one of the Men.
"This place has a mayor?"
"Yes like it should do. Now follow me to the hall."
The man then led the Doctor away.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Village

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Eventually they came to a larger building. The Doctor and Lisa were taken in and they saw a man behind a desk. He smiled at the Doctor and looked around at the other guards who were with him.
"State your name," said the Mayor.
"My name is the Doctor," replied the Doctor.
"Doctor who?"
"Just the Doctor. This is Lisa."
"Cute little baby. How old is she?"
"One."
"She doesn't have to hear what we have to say. There are toys in the other room for her. She will be perfectly safe.”
A guard took Lisa away. She was kicking and screaming. She called out for the Doctor. He was sad that he couldn’t go to her.
“What’s this all about?” asked the Doctor.
“Well you’ve just magically appeared out of nowhere.”
“I have my ways.”
“But that’s what we want.”

What happens next?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The Mayor

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
They then heard Lisa crying even more in the room behind them. It was deafly loud and the mayor had no choice had no chance but to send the Doctor to her. He picked her up and rocked her slightly.
"There there Lisa I'm here," said the Doctor.
"Daddy," replied Lisa.
"Yes no need to cry now." he saw Lisa hold onto Mr. Wiggles tighter. "Just hold onto him and go to sleep."
Lisa then slowly went to sleep in the Doctor's arms. He put her down on the ground and he put a blanket on her so that she would stay warm.
After that the Doctor went back to the mayor. This time there were more guards around him then before.
"Back to business Doctor," said the Mayor.
"Well how I got here is nothing to do with you," replied the Doctor.
"Well we'll just have to find out one way or the other."
"You're not finding out."
"Guards take him away."
The Guards then grabbed the Doctor.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Crying Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
At that moment, two of the guards grabbed the doctor and took him to a cell filled with different torture devices.
"Tell us what we want to hear and we won´t hurt you", said one of the guards.
"That´s not your business. Now let me go!", replied the Doctor
"Sorry. But that´s not an option"
From the Mayors office, the Doctors screams of pain could be heard, and Lisa was the first to notice.
Back in the cell, the Doctor was in agony. He´d just been tossed to the ground.
The guards still insisted that the Doctor talk.
"I´m not saying", replied the Doctor, just before being interrupted by a loud noise.
Just then, the ground began to shake and the guards ran for their lives.
The Doctor used the little energy he had left to get up and leave as well.
When got out he could see that Lisa had grown to about 50 ft tall and seemed to have aged a few years. She seemed to be about 6 or 7 years old now.
"Daddy!!!", she screamed loudly.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Bigger and older Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor was able to see Lisa. The clothes that she had been wearing had grown with her. But really they were for someone a lot younger then her. She knew that she had to get her attention.
“Lisa down here!” shouted the Doctor.
Lisa looked around for where this voice had come from. She eventually saw the Doctor and she was overwhelmed with happiness.
“Daddy!” she said. She then picked him up with her tail and she hugged him with her arms. She also picked up Mr. Wiggles. The bear had grown to suit her. “I missed you Daddy.”
“Don’t worry Lisa I’m here for you.”
“But I’m so big Daddy.”
“You’ve been bigger Lisa. But for now there’s something on the T.A.R.D.I.S that’ll help you now.”
“Where is it?”
“Just walk to the woods and I’ll lead you there. When we do get there I’ll give you some ice cream.”
“Yay Ice Cream.”
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Big hug

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa then began to walk towards the T.A.R.D.I.S. She was still hugging the Doctor and Mr. Wiggles. She was still as sweet and innocent as she was when the Doctor first met her all those years ago.
When she reached the T.A.R.D.I.S Lisa put the Doctor on the ground and he went inside. He came back out with her old wrist device. But it had been improved since she last had it on. He passed it to her and she looked at it.
"What's this daddy?" she asked.
"That'll make you small so that you can fit into the T.A.R.D.I.S," replied the Doctor. "Just put it on."
The device grew in Lisa's hand until it was big enough for her. She put it on her wrist and she looked at it. It was now pink and had flowers on it.
"It's pretty but what now?"
"Turn the dial to the left."
Lisa did and she shrank rapidly. In a matter of seconds she was the height of an average girl her age. She looked up at the Doctor and she hugged him.
"Now for the ice cream."
"Can I have chocolate?"

Is there any chocolate?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: The device again

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Yeah I'm sure that there's some chocolate," said the Doctor.
"Yay," replied Lisa.
The Doctor then picked up Lisa and he took her to the T.A.R.D.I.S kitchen. He went to the freezer and scooped her some chocolate ice cream. he gave it to her in a cone and she began to lick it.
"Do you like that?"
"Yes Daddy. Can you hold onto Mr. Wiggles for me?"
"Yeah sure I can."
The Doctor was then given Mr. Wiggles and he held onto it while Lisa was eating her ice cream. She was enjoying it. Some of it went onto her clothes but she was going to change it soon so it didn't really matter.
When she had finished the Doctor cleaned her up and then he took her to the wardrobe. She went inside to pick some clothes out. Strangely she picked out the same clothes as last time. Except they were a little smaller then they were before.
"I like these clothes Daddy," said Lisa.
"Well they do suit you well," replied the Doctor. "Now let's see where else we can go. Maybe Swaziland."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Yes

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
“What that Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“Somewhere where you’d really like to go,” replied the Doctor. He then began to move some of the controls and the T.A.R.D.I.S and it began to shake. “Ok we’re on our way. Is there anything you want to do Lisa?”
“Can I have a Piggy back please?”
“Sure you can.”
The Doctor then picked up Lisa and put him on his back. He began to walk around and she was having the time of her life. She was cheering and happy.
“Giddy up horsey,” said Lisa.
“Neigh,” replied the Doctor.
They were having fun for sometime until the T.A.R.D.I.S suddenly stopped in mid air. The Doctor was a little unsure what had just happened.
“What happened daddy?”
“Let me find out.”
The Doctor then went to the T.A.R.D.I.S doors and opened them. He was able to see out into a universe. He was amazed. Lisa was also watching and she never seen so many small lights before in her life.

What happens?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Piggy back

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The Doctor and Lisa looked out of the T.A.R.D.I.S door. Lisa was till amazed with what she could see. She laughed a little and looked up to the man who had treated her like his own daughter.
“Daddy what’s all this?” asked Lisa.
“This is a star system,” replied the Doctor. “Beautiful isn’t it?”
“Yes Daddy.”
Just then a meteor flew past them and shook the T.A.R.D.I.S. This made Lisa drop Mr. Wiggles and he went down through the empty vacuum of space. Lisa tried to grab him but she couldn’t. She then began to cry her heart out.
“Mr. Wiggles come back,” cried Lisa. “Come back.”
The Doctor could see who upset she was. He just knelt down and hugged his companion.
“Don’t cry Lisa,” he said.
“But Mr. Wiggles is gone.”
“I’ll get you another bear.”
“No I want Mr. Wiggles.”
“I’ll get him back for you.”
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Mr. Wiggles falls

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Oh thank you Daddy," said Lisa. She then gave the Doctor a hug. But she was holding him with a firm grip. She was accidentally suffocating him. She didn't know her own physical strength. "I love you too."
"Too tight too tight!" replied the Doctor. Lisa then loosened her grip and she still hugged him. "That's better and I love you too."
But then the Doctor picked Lisa up and he went to the controls. He put her down on the ground and he started to work the controls.
"Now we just find Mr. Wiggles. Shouldn't be too hard he would leave a certain pattern that we can follow."
"I miss him."
"Don't worry you'll get him back."
The T.A.R.D.I.S then began to shake and the T.A.R.D.I.S began to chase after Mr. Wiggles. But he had landed on a planet. But they were getting close to him every second. Lisa wanted to hold him in her arms again.
Eventually the T.A.R.D.I.S landed on the planet. It looked similar to Earth except the gravity was a little less. Lisa jumped off the T.A.R.D.I.S and she began to shout the name of her beloved bear.

Where is he?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Chasing after him

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
“Mr. Wiggles!” shouted Lisa. “Mr. Wiggles where are you?” She looked around for her beloved teddy bear. She even grew to full size to see if she could find him. “MR WIGGLES PLEASE COME BACK!”
“Lisa calm down,” replied the Doctor. “We need to go and look for him.”
“But where is he?”
“Luckily with this little thing.” He then got out what seemed to be a tracking device. “I can find him where ever he is.”
“Thank you Daddy. She then quickly picked him up and hugged him. She did this for a few minutes until she sat him on her shoulder. “Where is he?”
“Wait a minute.” He then began to look at the device. “Here we go. He’s about three miles that way.”
“Ok.”
Lisa then began to walk in the direction the Doctor had pointed out. It wouldn’t take them too long to get there with Lisa’s size. The Doctor was still relieved that she had retained her sweet personality. If she was evil then no one would have been safe from her.
“How much further?” asked Lisa.
"Not too far."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Search

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Eventually the Doctor and Lisa seemed to get to a tribe. It seemed to be one from the dark ages but the first thing Lisa noticed was Mr. Wiggles in the centre. She gave out a huge smile and she ran towards him.
"Mr. Wiggles," she said. She then picked him up and hugged him. But then she felt sharp pains in her ankles. She looked down and saw the natives of the tribe stabbing her with their spears. "Daddy they're trying to hurt me." She then began to cry a little. "Why would they do that?"
"Don't worry Lisa I'll find out," replied the Doctor.
Lisa then carefully put the Doctor on the ground and he held his hands up to say that he surrendered.
"We come in peace," said the Doctor. "We only want the bear and we'll leave you in peace."
"The bear is ours," replied a Native.
"No he actually belongs to my companion Lisa. Believe me you don't want to take that bear away from her."
"She is but a child!"
"But a child with enormous size and strength."

What do the natives do?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Foud at a tribe

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The tribe wasn't going to give up Mr. Wiggles without a fight. Lisa quickly picked the Doctor back up so that he was out of harm's way.
"Daddy they're still attacking me," said Lisa. "And my ankles are starting to bleed." She then began to cry. "It hurts."
"Don't worry Lisa," replied the Doctor. "Just turn and get back to the T.A.R.D.I.S right now."
"Ok Daddy."
She then started to walk towards the T.A.R.D.I.S but each step gave her great pain. She was still crying her heart out and the Doctor couldn't do anything to help her for now. All he could do was tell her to get to the T.A.R.D.I.S.
When they got there she shrank to her normal size and the Doctor took her inside. She was put onto a chair and the Doctor took off her flip flops. He then tended to her wounds. He used new technology and traditional methods.
"Any better?" asked the Doctor.
"Yes Daddy," replied Lisa. She then hugged him. "I love you."
"And I love you too."
The pair hugged for a few seconds.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Got him back

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
When the hug was over Lisa put her flip flops back on and she hugged Mr. Wiggles. The Doctor smiled at her. But she then yawned. He realised that she must have been tired after everything that had happened.
“Are you tired Lisa?” asked the Doctor.
“Yes daddy,” replied Lisa. She then yawned again. “Can I go to bed now?”
“Yeah let me take you there.”
The Doctor then picked up his companion and he walked to the Mind Room. It had already transformed into Lisa’s ideal room and he put her on her bed.
“Goodnight Lisa,” said the Doctor.
“Daddy can you tell me a story?” replied Lisa.
“About what?”
“About some of your other adventures. Tell me about Earth.”
“Well earth has some of the greediest people I’ve ever known. But they also have some of the bravest. I’m fond of the planet.”
“Why’s that?”
“Well it’s a big mish mash of everything.”
“What’s everything?”

Does he tell her?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Bedtime

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
“Ok I’ll tell you about when I had to fight a giant Spider,” said the Doctor. “That was a good one.”
“What happened daddy?” replied Lisa.
“Well they were planning to destroy earth to reborn their race. But I stopped them in time. You should have seen their Queen. She was huge with Big pointy teeth. She could have easily killed me.”
“Did she kill you Daddy?”
“Of course she didn’t. If I was dead then I wouldn’t be telling you this story.”
“Oh yeah. Silly me.”
“Anyway I was able to stop them and have Christmas Dinner.”
“What’s a Christmas?”
“Well it’ a celebration held by certain people on Earth. Some celebrate it. Some don’t.”
“Why’s that?”
“Well it’s complex to say. I’ll tell you when you’re older.”
“Ok.”
“Now give me a goodnight hug.”
The Doctor and Lisa gave each other a goodnight hug. She then lay down on her bed and hugged Mr. Wiggles.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Story

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The next day Lisa woke up a little later then usual. She yawned a little and she slowly got out of bed. She went into her own little bathroom. But the sink was way too high for her. She concentrated a little and the sink came down to her level.
"That's better," she said. She then washed her face and cleaned her teeth. She smiled into the mirror and her teeth were still white. "That'll make my Daddy happy. I wonder where he is."
She then left the Mind Room and she saw him sleeping on his chair. She didn't want to disturb him so she just sat down and looked at him until he woke up. This took two hours but he was pleasantly surprised to see her.
"Hi Lisa," said the Doctor. "How long have you been there for?"
"About two hours Daddy," replied Lisa.
"You didn't have to sit here. You could have played with your toys for a while. or even get something to eat."
"I am a little hungry."
"Then let's get you some breakfast shall we?"
"Ok."
He then stood up and held Lisa's hand. They both walked to the kitchen.

What will they have?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Morning Lisa

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
There was a bowl of cereal for Lisa. She was excited and she saw on a chair and she began to eat it. Obviously she put some chocolate milk in there first. She began to eat it and it was delicious. She smiled and looked up at the Doctor.
"Thank you daddy," said Lisa.
"Well you're growing girl," replied the Doctor.
"You need all the milk and food you can get."
"I'm the biggest grill ever."
"Right now no. But when you twist that little thing on your arm then you will be."
"Can I?"
"Not here. Besides you wouldn't have much breakfast would you?"
"I guess not."
"Now eat up. I'm taking you somewhere today."
"Where?"
"It's a surprise."
Lisa finished eating her breakfast and she went to the bathroom to get washed. She made sure that she was clean and her teeth were white. She gave them a few scrubs and she smiled in the mirror.

Where si the Doctor taking her?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Cereal

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
The T.A.R.D.I.S eventually landed. Lisa came out very excited and she saw everything around her. She was still in amazement.
"Where are we Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"This is a theme park," replied the Doctor. "You come here to have fun. And today I've brought you here so that you can have some fun."
"Yay thank you Daddy."
The Doctor then took Lisa to the entrance and he paid for the tickets. She was still very excited and she couldn't wait to go on the rides. The Doctor didn't want her to go to any of the big scary rides.
She first went to one of the games. It was a bottle game and she still had Mr. Wiggles in her arms. She had a look at some of the other prizes and she saw what seemed to be another large teddy bear but it was definitely female.
"Can I have a go please?" asked Lisa.
"Sure you can little girl," replied the Host.
He then gave Lisa a ball and he didn't expect her to win. But she threw the ball very hard and they were all knocked down. The bottles were glued onto the table and he was amazed to see them fall.
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Theme park

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa was given the bear and she hugged it tight. Just hugged both Mr. Wiggles and the new bear tightly. She didn’t want to let them go. She was very happy here with the Doctor.
“So what are you going to call your new bear?” asked the Doctor.
“I’m going to call her Mrs. Wiggles,” replied Lisa. “So that Mr. Wiggles has someone to love.”
“That’s very thoughtful of you Lisa. Now would you like to have a go on the tea cup right?”
“Ok Daddy.”
They both then walked to the tea cup ride. They didn’t have to queue up long for it and when they got to the tea cups they were strapped in.
“Is this safe Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“Yeah sure you are. In fact statistics show that you’re actually safer on a ride then you are on a roller coaster.”
“Ok.”
Just then the ride slowly began. Lisa was getting excited and she held onto the rail like she was suppose to.
"Here we go."
"I'm scared."

Will everything be fine?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Mrs. Wiggles

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
“It’s alright you’re safe,” said the Doctor.
As the ride began to speed up a little Lisa held onto the Doctor quite tight. This was crushing his hand since she didn’t know her own strength. He had to gently loosen her grip a little. She even had her tail wrapped around him.
But then it began to loosen a little. She seemed to be screaming with joy. She was enjoying herself and this made the Doctor smile.
“This is fun Daddy,” said Lisa.
“That’s the whole idea,” replied the Doctor.
The ride continued for a few more minutes. But eventually it finished. Lisa was a little disappointed but the Doctor just picked her up. They got the two bears before they left.
“What are we going on next?” asked Lisa.
“Well there’s a story ride if you want to go on that,” replied the Doctor. “You’ll enjoy that.”
“Ok Daddy.”
The pair went on their way to the ride. Lisa was more skipping along. She was extremely happy. The Doctor had never seen his companion so happy. When she was happy he would be happy.
"Well here we are."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Fun fun fun

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Lisa looked at the story book ride. She smiled in excitement and she went to join the queue. But there was one thing about the ride. No adults could go on it. It was only for young children.
"Daddy I want you to come onto the ride with me," said Lisa.
"But I can't," replied the Doctor. "I'm too big."
"But I wanted to ride it with you."
"Well we'll go on another ride. But it's not going to be scary. It'll be fun for you. I'll stay here and hold onto Mr. and Mrs. Wiggles."
"Ok Daddy."
"Now just give me a little hug."
The Doctor squatted down to give Lisa a hug. But after that she gave him Mr. and Mrs. Wiggles and she went onto the ride. She was a little nervous. But she saw that other kids were excited and this relaxed her a little.
When the ride started up they waved to each other before she was out of sight. She then saw a huge caterpillar with glasses and a book in front of her. She thought it was real at first. But it was only a model.
"Greeting children," said the Caterpillar.

Will anything happen?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Lisa's ride

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
“Welcome young adventurers,” said the Worm. “You are about to embark on a fun and exciting quest. Do you want to go?”
“Yes,” replied the Children.
“Then keep your hands and feet in the cart at all times. You’re going onto an adventure into a magical land.”
Then the cart began to move again. The kids were still excited. Lisa was definitely the most excited out of them all. She could barely stay in her seat. But she was strapped in there so that she didn’t hurt herself.
It began to go down a little and then Lisa could see some wax models moving. They were of animals wearing human clothes.
All the kids cheered at the animals. The animals even talked to the children. This made it seem more realistic to them.
"I can't wait to tell this to my Daddy," said Lisa.
But behind the scenes the animals were just looking at the kids. Their eyes actually moved as if they were living things. No one really noticed this and the ride just went on as usual.
"This is exciting."
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Ride of her life

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
Eventually the ride came to an end and Lisa got off the ride. The Doctor was there waiting for her and she ran over to him. He had Mr. and Mrs. Wiggles with him and she hugged them both.
“Did you like the ride?” asked the Doctor.
“It was very exciting,” replied Lisa. “Can I go on it again?”
“No not yet. But maybe later. There are plenty of other rides for us to go on. I know one that you’ll particularly like.”
“What is it?”
“You’ll find out in a minute.”
The Doctor took Lisa to a ride with a lot of dinosaurs. It was more like a safari from the dawn of time. Lisa looked up at them.
“What are those Daddy?” asked Lisa.
“Those are dinosaurs,” replied the Doctor. “These are creatures that lived here millions of years ago.”
“Are there any left?”
“No they extinct.”
“Can I see one for real?”

What will the Doctor say?
1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.title: Dino safari

1522212122211111221111121121112222112111.content:
"Yeah I’ll take you one of the days," said the Doctor. "You’ll be able to stroke them as much as you want."
"I like stroking animals," replied Lisa.
"I know you do but I must warn you about something."
"About what Daddy?"
"Well you're very very strong. You don't realise just how strong you are. If you stroke an animal too hard you'd probably kill it. You don't want to hurt an animal do you?"
"No Daddy."
"I thought you didn't."
The ride eventually came to an end and Lisa got off. She saw a man selling some candy floss. She jumped around in excitement.
"Can I have some Candy Floss Daddy?" asked Lisa.
"Sure you can," replied the Doctor. "But not too much that stuff rots your teeth away."
"Then why sell it if it does that?"
"Well it tastes nice. If you don't eat too much you'll be fine."
"I won't eat that much."
"That's a good girl."

Then Lisa saw a man who was wearing a Tiger suit. It seemed to be a theme to the theme park. She looked at him in amazement. Then she looked over to the Doctor and she looked up at him.
"What's that Daddy?" asked Lisa.

The Doctor then went up to the man in the Tiger suit. He said something to him. The Tiger man then bent down and held his arms out. Lisa then gave him a hug. She was careful and she didn't use too much of her unbelievable strength. She liked the hug off him and she smile at him.

How does Lisa feel?

Lisa saw some of the other animals in the zoo. She found them all cute and she wanted to hug them all. But she knew that she couldn’t. But that didn’t stop her from thinking about it.

What happens next?

She then saw everything shrink around her as her body developed and aged. The Doctor took a step back as Lisa changed. Her clothes did grow with her so she wasn’t going to be naked.
When she had she was 7 feet tall and she looked like she was 17. She looked at herself and she looked at the Doctor.
“Daddy everything got smaller,” said Lisa.
“No everything’s the same,” replied the Doctor. “You just got bigger.”
“But how?”

Lisa then giggled a little. “You know I’m taller then you Daddy.”

But meanwhile in the Adventure ride it wasn't working. They had to close it and they got some of the maintenance people to take a look at it. But they soon found out what the problem was. Some of the wax characters from the ride had somehow come to life and the maintenance people didn't stand a chance.
Meanwhile the Doctor and Lisa were just going onto one of the big rides. He just hoped that Lisa wasn't going to get too scared on it. She seemed to be fine. He sat next to her. But she even wrapped her tale around him so that she would feel safer.

"I know Daddy but you can never be too careful," replied Lisa. She then gave him a pleasant smile when the ride started up.
"Here we go."

Will Lisa get scared?

The ride went up a steep slope. Lisa could see everything around her. She couldn't believe how big this place was. But she was too excited to really care since the ride began to speed up. The Doctor expected Lisa to be scared but instead she was laughing and enjoying herself.
"This is fun daddy," said Lisa.
"Well I'm glad you like it," replied the Doctor. They then went upside down. "Now this is the good part."
The rollercoaster went upside down a few times and Lisa just screamed in excitement. She had never had this much fun in her life.

"Yay thank you daddy." She then bent down and gave him a little kiss. "Come on before the queue gets too long."

The pair went back into the queue. Thankfully it wasn’t too long and Lisa was jumping with excitement. Some people stared at her in amazement. They had never seen someone of her height and she was still only a teenager so there was a goods chance that she would become even taller.
When they got on top the ride Lisa was still in excitement. She was more excited then she ever had been in her life. She couldn’t stop looking down at the Doctor. She was one of the few people who he had to look up at.

“I’m ready,” replied Lisa.
Meanwhile not too far away the wax droids from the rides began to come out of the rides. Some people thought that they were simply people in suits. But when someone was shot the mood quickly turned. There was screams coming from all over the place and people ran away.
The Doctor and Lisa were just on the ride when they saw everything happening below them. They couldn’t do anything until the ride itself stopped. Lisa felt a little helpless. She tried to get out. The Doctor was surprised to see that she was strong enough to remove the safety belts.

What happens to her?

But then Lisa fell to the ground. People screamed in terror as she hit the ground hard. Many of he bones had been broken. But she was able to sit herself back up. She snapped all of her bones back into place and the healed over extremely fast. She was back to full health in a matter of seconds.
But then she was shot by something. At first blood came out of her wound but it soon simply healed over. She looked up and saw some of the clay models from one of the rides she was just on.

Is this the end of the models?

What does he ask her?

Another bolt of electricity went through the chains. These hurt her greatly and she began to cry.
"No!"

The voltage went up making her hurt even more.

Lisa was in tears and her body was aching with burns and injuries. But she was surprised to see herself begin to heal over the main wounds. This came to the shock over everyone even her captors.

What does he do with it?

What does she say?

What else does he find?

“Ok daddy.”
The pair then left the room and started to go to the lab where Mr. and Mrs. Wiggles were. Lisa was looking forward to hugging her bears again. But she then saw a guard. But before it could spot her she knocked him out with he long monkey like tail. It was still strong and flexible.

Did she hurt herself?

They were then led into what seemed to be a lab. There were large glass capsules filled with a liquid in them. Lisa took a look at them. She recognised them as looking liek herself. but she wasn't sure what it was about.
"Daddy this one looks like me," said Lisa.
"What?" replied the Doctor. He took a closer look and indeed it did look like Lisa. He looked at the others and they had the same results. "These are all clones."
"Yes of your companion," replied the Man. "You see your companion is possible the most pwoerful single person in the universe. If there was an army of her they would be unstoppable."

"To save the world?"

"Themselves. Let's face it the planet earth is chocking to death. In another century or two it'll practically be dead."

"I'm gonna do what I need to do Daddy."

She didn't take any notice. Cautiously she stepped into the rip. Instantly she couldn't move. Then the flesh in her feet started to disintegrate. it was going all up to her legs. Only her bones remaind.

Then the rest of her body became a skeleton. The rip closed and she just fell into a heap. The Doctor ran to her over-szied skeleton.
"I'm sorry Lisa I'm so sorry." He began to cry. Then he was approached by the ruler.
"I'm sorry Doctor," replied the Ruler. "She will be buried heroine.
The Doctor said nothing. he just picked up one of Lisa's fingers and went back to the T.A.R.D.I.S. He went to his picture room and placed the finger by the pictures.
Over the years the Doctor regenerated many more times. he had more companions. But he would always remember the one that called him "Daddy."
